title: Lavash Pizza Recipe

directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). title: Easy Parmesan Garlic Ramen Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '3'}]

directions: ['Bring 6 cups water to a boil in a large soup pot; add noodles and boil for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. title: 4-Ingredient Potato Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]

directions: ['Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. title: Pan-Fried Pork Chops Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'boneless pork chops, 3/4-inch thick'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cooking oil'}]
directions: ['Do not pat chops dry, so seasonings and flour will stick.', 'Season both sides of pork chops with salt and pepper, then sprinkle with flour on both sides. Use the back of a spoon to distribute the flour over the entire surface.', 'Heat oil in a 12-inch non-stick skillet over medium heat until it shimmers. Carefully add pork chops and pan fry until brown, about 4 minutes. Do not disturb the chops until ready to turn.', 'When you see the edges of the chops turn brown, turn, and pan fry the other side until no longer pink on the inside and brown on the outside, an additional 4 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Reduce heat, if they are browning too quickly. Serve warm.']

title: Prosciutto-Wrapped Pork Tenderloin with Crispy Sage Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 pound pork tenderloin'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'pork tenderloin'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh sage, leaves removed and stems discarded, divided'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'prosciutto'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil, or more as needed'}]
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Lightly season pork with salt and black pepper. Arrange about 6 sage leaves over tenderloin. Wrap prosciutto around tenderloin and sage, overlapping prosciutto slightly; wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate to allow prosciutto to set on pork tenderloin, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove plastic wrap.', 'Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Fry wrapped tenderloin in the hot oil until prosciutto is crispy and lightly browned on all sides, 8 to 10 minutes. Transfer wrapped tenderloin to a baking dish, reserving oil in the skillet.', 'Bake tenderloin in the preheated oven until pork is cooked through, about 20 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).', 'Heat reserved oil in the skillet over medium heat; fry remaining sage leaves until crispy, adding more oil as needed, about 5 minutes.', 'Slice tenderloin and serve with crispy sage leaves.']

title: Simple Deep Fried Turkey Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3 Â½', 'Unit': 'gallons', 'Name': 'peanut oil for frying'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10 pound)', 'Name': 'whole turkey, neck and giblets removed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper, or to taste'}]
directions: ['Heat oil in a large stockpot or turkey fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Make sure the fryer is located outdoors in a safe area, preferably on dirt or pavement, and far away from buildings, wooden decks, or other objects. Keep a fire extinguisher handy, just in case.', 'Ensure that the turkey is completely thawed. Cut any extra skin away from the neck area and make sure neck hole is at least 1 inch in diameter.', 'Pat the bird completely dry with paper towels, then rub liberally with salt and pepper on both the outside and the inside.', 'Place turkey into a drain basket, neck-side first. Working slowly and carefully, gently lower the basket into the hot oil to completely cover the turkey.', 'Maintain the temperature of the oil at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and cook turkey for 3 1/2 minutes per pound, about 35 minutes.', 'Carefully remove basket from oil, and drain turkey. Insert a meat thermometer into the thickest part of the thigh; the internal temperature must be 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). Allow to rest for 15 minutes before slicing.']

title: Simple Baked Chicken Breasts Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]

title: World's Best Honey Garlic Pork Chops Recipe

title: Foolproof Rib Roast Recipe

title: Brown Sugar and Pineapple Glazed Ham Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '20'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(6 pound)', 'Name': 'fully-cooked, bone-in ham'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh pineapple'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(6 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Place ham, cut-side down, into a roasting pan.', 'Cut skin off pineapple with a sharp knife and slice off any brown spots or skin left behind. Cut pineapple into 1/2-inch-thick rings and use a round cutter to remove cores. Pin rings onto ham with toothpicks.', 'Bake ham in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.', 'While ham bakes, mix pineapple juice and brown sugar in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on medium power until glaze is boiling and slightly thickened. Work carefully because glaze will be sticky and very hot.', 'Pour 1/2 of the glaze evenly over ham and pineapple rings. Bake ham for 30 minutes more, then pour remaining glaze over ham.', 'Continue baking ham until a meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of ham reads 140 degrees F (60 degrees C), 30 to 60 minutes more.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Parchment Baked Salmon Recipe

directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). title: BBQ Chicken Breasts in the Oven Recipe

title: Easy Crispy Baked Chicken Recipe

title: Cheese Omelette Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 omelette'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'milk, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': 'Â¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded Emmentaler cheese'}]
directions: ['Whisk eggs in a bowl; add milk and season with salt and white pepper. Whisk until egg mixture is foamy, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Melt butter in a small, nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Lift edges with a spatula and tilt the skillet so uncooked egg can flow towards the bottom of the skillet to set. Repeat until no visible liquid egg remains.', 'Carefully flip omelette; cook until warmed through, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Sprinkle Emmentaler cheese down the middle of omelette; fold in half. Cook until cheese is melted, about 20 seconds. Slide omelette onto a plate.']

title: Pan-Roasted Chicken Breasts Recipe

title: Simply Roasted Artichokes Recipe

title: Sous Vide "Poached" Eggs Recipe

title: Breaded Air Fryer Pork Chops Recipe

ingredients: [{'Quantity': 'â…“', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'oyster sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'soy sauce, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs, coarsely chopped'}, {'Quantity': 'Â¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced shallots'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'minced Thai chilies, Serrano, or other hot pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'very thinly sliced fresh basil leaves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'hot cooked rice'}]
directions: ['Gather ingredients.', 'Whisk chicken broth, oyster sauce, soy sauce, fish sauce, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a bowl until well blended.', 'Heat large skillet over high heat. Drizzle in oil. Add chicken and stir fry until it loses its raw color, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Stir in shallots, garlic, and sliced chilies. Continue cooking on high heat until some of the juices start to caramelize in the bottom of the pan, about 2 or 3 more minutes.', 'Add about a tablespoon of the sauce mixture to the skillet; cook and stir until sauce begins to caramelize, about 1 minute.', 'Pour in the rest of the sauce. title: Easy Lasagna Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 9x13-inch lasagna'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'lean ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(32 ounce) jar', 'Name': 'spaghetti sauce'}, {'Quantity': '32', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'cottage cheese'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'dried parsley'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '9', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lasagna noodles'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients and preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 8 to 10 minutes. Drain and discard grease. Stir in spaghetti sauce and simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Combine cottage cheese, 2 cups of mozzarella cheese, eggs, 1/2 of the grated Parmesan cheese, dried parsley, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.', 'Spread 3/4 cup of sauce in a 9x13-inch baking dish. title: Baked Chicken Schnitzel Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil, or as desired'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken breasts, cut in half lengthwise (butterflied)'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': 'Â¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground paprika'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'seasoned bread crumbs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'lemon, zested'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil and drizzle olive oil over foil. title: Blackened Fish Recipe

ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'dry mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, melted, divided'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '(4 ounce) fillets', 'Name': 'trout'}]

While the pan is heating, pour 3/4 cup melted butter into a shallow dish.', 'Dip each fillet into butter, turning once to coat both sides.', 'Sprinkle both sides of fillets with spice mixture; gently pat mixture onto fish.', 'Working in batches, place fillets into the hot pan without crowding. Turn fillets and spoon about 1 teaspoon melted butter over each.', 'Continue cooking until bottoms are charred, 1 to 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining fish. Serve and enjoy!']

title: Savory Sea Scallops and Angel Hair Pasta Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'Name': 'angel hair pasta'}, {'Quantity': 'Â¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'sea scallops, rinsed and patted dry'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese to taste (Optional)'}]
directions: ['Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add angel hair pasta and cook, uncovered, for 4 to 5 minutes or until al dente; drain.', 'While pasta is cooking, melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in garlic and cook just until fragrant and softened, about 1 minute.', "Slice any scallops over 3/4-inch thick in half so they'll cook evenly.", 'Stir scallops, basil, and parsley into the skillet. Cook and gently stir just until scallops feel slightly firm when pressed with a finger, about 2 to 3 minutes. Scallops will become tough and chewy if overcooked.', 'Reduce heat to low; stir in lemon juice and season with salt and pepper. Pour in cream if you like a thicker sauce and cook just until the sauce begins to simmer.', 'Ladle scallops and sauce over hot pasta and sprinkle Parmesan cheese over top.']

title: Japanese-Style Deep-Fried Shrimp Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'medium shrimp, peeled (tails left on) and deveined'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko crumbs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'quart', 'Name': 'vegetable oil for frying'}]

Place eggs in a second bowl and panko in a third bowl.', 'Heat oil in a deep fryer or deep skillet to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Dip each shrimp into flour mixture, then into egg, and finally into panko crumbs to coat.', 'Fry a few shrimp at a time in the hot oil until golden brown, about 5 minutes.', 'Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels before serving.', 'Serve and enjoy!']

title: Quick Chicken Piccata Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour for dredging'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'capers, drained'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': 'Â¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': 'Â¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cold unsalted butter, cut in Â¼-inch slices'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh Italian parsley'}]
directions: ['Place chicken breasts between 2 sheets of heavy plastic on a solid, level surface. Firmly pound chicken breasts with the smooth side of a meat mallet to a 1/2-inch thickness.', 'Season both sides of chicken breasts with cayenne, salt, and black pepper; dredge lightly in flour and shake off any excess.', 'Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Place chicken in the pan, reduce heat to medium, and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side; transfer to a plate.', 'Cook capers in reserved oil, smashing them lightly to release brine, until warmed through, about 30 seconds. Pour white wine into the skillet and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon. Cook until reduced by half, about 2 minutes.', 'Stir lemon juice, water, and butter into the reduced wine mixture; cook and stir continuously to form a thick sauce, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to low and stir parsley through the sauce.', 'Return chicken breasts to the pan and cook until heated through, 1 to 2 minutes. Serve with sauce spooned over the top.']

title: Beer Batter Fish Made Great Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'quarts', 'Name': 'vegetable oil for frying'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '(4 ounce) fillets', 'Name': 'cod'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can or bottle', 'Name': 'beer, or as needed'}]

Rinse cod fillets, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper.', 'Mix flour, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper in a large bowl; add egg and stir well to combine. Gradually mix in enough beer to make a thin batter.', 'Dip cod fillets into the batter to coat. Carefully lower fillets, one at a time, into the hot oil.', 'Fry several fillets at a time, turning once, until cooked through and golden brown, about 2 minutes per side.', 'Drain on paper towels. Repeat to cook remaining fillets. Serve warm.']

title: Air Fryer Tilapia with Fresh Lemon Pepper Recipe

title: Blackened Salmon Fillets Recipe

title: Air Fryer Lobster Tails with Lemon-Garlic Butter Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 lobster tails'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(4 ounce)', 'Name': 'lobster tails'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, grated'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'wedges', 'Name': 'lemon'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat an air fryer to 380 degrees F (195 degrees C).', 'Butterfly lobster tails by cutting lengthwise through the centers of the hard top shells and meat with kitchen shears. Cut to, but not through, the bottoms of the shells.', 'Spread tail halves apart. Place tails in the air fryer basket with lobster meat facing up.', 'Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add lemon zest and garlic; heat until garlic is fragrant, about 30 seconds.', 'Transfer 2 tablespoons of butter mixture to a small bowl; brush this onto lobster tails. Discard any remaining brushed butter to avoid contamination from uncooked lobster. Season lobster with salt and pepper.', 'Cook in the preheated air fryer until lobster meat is opaque, 5 to 7 minutes.', 'Spoon reserved butter from the saucepan over lobster meat. Top with parsley and serve with lemon wedges.']

Drain; transfer pasta to a serving bowl and keep warm.', 'Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in shrimp and garlic; cook and stir until shrimp turns pink, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Stir in white wine and pepper; bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 30 seconds.', 'Pour shrimp with sauce over pasta in the serving bowl; toss well. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and parsley.', 'Serve with lemon wedges.']

title: Steamed Lobster Tails Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'sea salt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '(6 ounce)', 'Name': 'lobster tails'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, melted'}]
directions: ['Gather ingredients.', 'Pour about 1 inch of water into the bottom of a large stockpot and bring to a boil. Add salt and place a steamer insert inside the pot so that it is just above the water level. Place lobster tails on the steamer rack and cover the pot.', 'Steam lobster tails for 8 minutes (without peeking!).', 'Remove lobster tails from the steamer and serve with melted butter.']

title: Easy Sausage Pancakes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'pancake mix'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water, plus more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sausage patties'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'syrup for dipping'}]
directions: ['Combine pancake mix and water in a bowl and stir until just blended (there may be a few lumps).', 'Heat half of the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat until melted.', 'Dip half of the sausage patties in the batter until evenly coated and place in the skillet.\xa0 Cook undisturbed until lightly browned and slightly puffed, 2 to 3 minutes.\xa0 Flip and cook until the pancake is cooked through, 2 to 3 more minutes.', 'Repeat with remaining batter and sausage.\xa0Serve with syrup if desired for dipping.']

title: Pistachio Cream Cinnamon Rolls Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mascarpone cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(17.3 ounce) package', 'Name': 'puff pastry,'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped pistachio'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pistachio cream,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': "confectioner's sugar"}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment or grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.', 'Combine 1/2 cup mascarpone, white sugar, brown sugar, cinnamon, melted butter, and 1/8 teaspoon salt in a bowl and mix until smooth.', 'Roll pastry sheets out on a lightly floured surface. Divide sugar mixture among the 2 sheets and spread into a thin layer going almost to the edges. Sprinkle each sheet evenly with chopped pistachios and drizzle each with 2 tablespoons pistachio cream.', 'Roll each sheet into a log and place seam side down on the cutting board. Use a sharp knife to cut each log into 6 pinwheels. Place cinnamon rolls, cut side up, into the prepared pan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, add remaining mascarpone, pistachio cream, heavy cream, and salt to a bowl and beat with an electric mixer until smooth. Gradually add powdered sugar and beat until smooth and slightly fluffy. Spread frosting over warm cinnamon rolls and sprinkle with additional chopped pistachios if desired.']

title: Cheesecake Crepe Roll-Ups Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'Quantity': 'Â½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': "confectioners' sugar"}, {'Quantity': 'Â¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mixed frozen berries, slightly thawed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': "confectioners' sugar, or as needed"}]
directions: ['Whisk together the flour, milk, eggs, honey, and salt in a bowl to make a smooth batter.', 'Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a nonstick crepe pan over medium heat until the foam disappears. Pour about 2 tablespoons of the batter into the pan, and swirl to cover the bottom of the pan with a thin layer of batter. Cook until the crepe is no longer runny, about 1 minute; flip and cook the other side for an additional 1 minute. Repeat with additional butter and crepe mix, to make 4 crepes. Set the crepes aside on paper towels.', "In a bowl, mix the cream cheese with 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar to make a creamy spread. Very gently stir in the berries. Spread the cream cheese filling evenly over the crepes and roll up. Refrigerate until chilled; slice in 1-inch sections to serve."]

title: CafÃ© Tropical Burrito Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 breakfast burrito'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'strips', 'Name': 'bacon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'patty', 'Name': 'frozen hashbrown'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded Cheddar and Swiss cheese mixture'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': '(12-Inch) flour tortilla'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and crisp, about 10 minutes.', 'Drain most of the bacon grease out of the skillet. Add hashbrown patty to the remaining hot bacon grease and fry over medium heat until hot, crispy, and golden brown, about 5 minutes. You can also use canola or grapeseed oil instead of bacon grease', 'Meanwhile, pour beaten eggs into a nonstick pan or flat top; let cook undisturbed until the bottom of the eggs begins to firm, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in Cheddar and Swiss cheese and season with salt and pepper.', 'Cook and stir until eggs are nearly set, light, and fluffy, 3 to 4 minutes more.', 'While eggs are cooking, heat tortilla on the stovetop until lightly browned and warm.', 'To assemble the burrito, place hashbrown patty onto the tortilla. Top with scrambled eggs and bacon. Fold two sides of the burrito to the center, roll up, and serve.']

title: Cottage Cheese Blueberry Breakfast Cake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 loaf cake'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour plus 1 tablespoon for dusting'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'whole wheat flour'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cottage cheese'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'coconut oil, melted, or neutral oil of choice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh blueberries'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan. Line pan with parchment paper, leaving a 2-inch overhang.', 'Whisk Â¾ cup all-purpose flour, Â¾ cup whole wheat flour, baking powder, and salt together in a large bowl.', 'Combine cottage cheese, honey, oil, lemon zest and juice, and vanilla in a blender container. Cover and blend until smooth.', 'Stir eggs into cottage cheese mixture.', 'Add cottage cheese mixture to flour mixture; stir to combine.', 'Toss blueberries with remaining 1 tablespoon of flour in a bowl. Fold blueberries into batter. Pour batter into the prepared pan.', 'Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 1 hour. Let cool in pan on a wire rack 10 minutes.', 'Remove from pan and cool completely on a wire rack before slicing and serving.']

title: Overnight Baked Oatmeal Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Refrigerate Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '9 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk or unsweetened plant milk of your choice'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'maple syrup'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup packed', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'rolled oats (not quick cooking)'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'amaranth'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Grease a 2-quart rectangular baking dish.', 'Whisk eggs, milk, maple syrup, brown sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt together in the prepared dish.', 'Stir in oats and amaranth. title: Overnight Breakfast Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '9 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '(32 ounce) package', 'Name': 'hash brown potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'pork sausage'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Monterey Jack cheese, shredded'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Grease a 9x13 baking dish with cooking spray. Spread hash browns in the prepared baking dish.', 'Cook sausage over medium heat in a large skillet until starting to brown, about 2 minutes.', 'Add bell peppers, onion, garlic, and oregano to skillet. Continue cooking until vegetables are tender and sausage is no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Add spinach; cook until wilted, about 1 minute.', 'Spread vegetable and sausage mixture over hash browns in the baking dish. Sprinkle cheese over the top.', 'Beat eggs, milk, mustard, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Pour egg mixture over casserole. Cover and refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.', 'Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).', 'Bake casserole, uncovered, in the preheated oven until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.']

title: Boursin Omelet Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 omelet'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chives'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'ounce', 'Name': 'cheese, such as'}]
directions: ['Whisk eggs, water, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until yolks and whites are completely combined and eggs are light and frothy, about 30 seconds.', 'Melt butter in an 8-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat. Pour eggs into skillet and stir rapidly for 20 to 30 seconds until eggs are just starting to set. Spread top of eggs in an even layer and let cook until just slightly underdone and shiny. If necessary, move extra raw egg around to the edges of the skillet. Lower heat to medium-low to prevent browning, if necessary.', 'Sprinkle cheese down the middle of the omelet, along with 2 teaspoons chives. Fold one side over the cheese in the middle, followed by the other side, so the omelet is folded in thirds. Remove to a plate and sprinkle with remaining chives.']

title: Halloumi Breakfast Sandwiches Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'bell pepper, any color'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'olive oil cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2 (2 ounce)', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'breakfast sausage patties'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'halloumi cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'English muffins, toasted'}]
directions: ['Add eggs to a small bowl; stir in bell peppers and onion, and season with salt and pepper.', 'Heat a skillet over medium heat, and spray with olive oil spray. Place two egg rings in the skillet, and pour in the egg mixture, dividing equally between the rings. When eggs are opaque and starting to solidify, about 8 to 10 minutes, release the egg by running a knife around the inside of the ring. Flip the egg and cook about 30 seconds to 1 minute.', 'While eggs are cooking, heat olive oil in another skillet over medium heat. Cook sausage patties on one side of the skillet, turning once, until heated through, 3 to 4 minutes. On the other side of the skillet, cook halloumi slices until they are just starting to turn light golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes per side.', 'To assemble the sandwich, place cheese on the bottom half of an English muffin. Next, layer egg on the cheese and top with a sausage patty. Repeat for the second sandwich.', 'Season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.']

title: Carrot Cake Baked Oatmeal Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2 1/3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'rolled oats'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'walnuts'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pumpkin pie spice'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'maple syrup'}, {'Quantity': '1 3/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'half-and-half'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butte'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'vanilla bean paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'golden raisins'}]
directions: ['Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with nonstick spray. Set aside.', 'Stir oats, 1/4 cup walnuts, cinnamon, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, and salt together in a bowl. Whisk maple syrup, half-and-half, egg, butter, and vanilla bean paste together in another bowl; stir into oat mixture.', 'Place carrots in a microwave-safe bowl; microwave on High for 45 seconds. Stir carrots and raisins into oat mixture; pour into the prepared baking dish. Sprinkle remaining nuts on top.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the top is nicely golden and a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean, 25 to 35 minutes.', 'Remove from the oven to cool completely. Cut into squares to serve.']

title: Leftover Mashed Potato Egg Cups Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'mashed potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'thin pats', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'grated Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions or chives, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).', 'Spray 4 (6 ounce) ramekins with cooking spray. Place 4 ounces mashed potatoes into each ramekin. Using the back of a spoon, mold into nests, and brush with 1 lightly beaten egg.', 'Break 1 of the 4 remaining eggs into each ramekin. Drizzle each with 1/2 teaspoon milk, top with 1 pat of butter, and 1 tablespoon Cheddar cheese.', 'Cook until yolk is starting to set and cheese is melted, 15 to 20 minutes (cooking time will depend on how you want your eggs cooked). Remove from the oven, and let stand until residual heat finishes cooking the egg whites, 1 to 3 minutes.', 'Season with salt and pepper, garnish with green onions or chives, and serve immediately.']

title: Everything Bagel Grilled Cheese Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'everything bagel,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'slice', 'Name': 'American cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'slice', 'Name': 'rovolone cheese'}]
directions: ['Preheat a skillet over medium heat. Slather 1/2 tablespoon mayonnaise on each cut side of bagel.', 'Place 1 bagel half, mayonnaise side down, in the skillet. Place both slices of cheese on top; then place second bagel half, cut side up, on top of cheese.', 'Press down on sandwich with a spatula, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 4 minutes. Flip sandwich over, press down, and cook until browned, 2 to 4 minutes more.']

title: Million Dollar Bacon Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]

directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place oven rack in center of oven and preheat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Line a large rimmed baking pan with foil. Place a wire rack on top of foil.', 'Lay bacon in a single layer on wire rack.', 'In a small bowl combine brown sugar, crushed red pepper, black pepper, and cayenne pepper, if desired.', 'Rub bacon with brown sugar mixture.', 'Drizzle with maple syrup. Bake until caramelized and at desired doneness, 40 to 50 minutes .']

title: Boursin Scrambled Eggs Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'half-and-half'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'garlic and fine herbs spreadable cheese (such as BoursinÂ®)'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley or chives, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Whisk eggs, half-and-half, and a pinch of salt together in a small bowl.', 'Melt butter in a medium nonstick pan over medium-low heat. When butter starts to bubble, pour in egg mixture. Using a silicone spatula, gently swirl the eggs around in circles from the outside in, without stopping, until you start to see small curds, about 20 to 30 seconds.', 'Switch from making circles to making long sweeps across the pan until you see larger curds, about 20 seconds. When eggs are about 75% cooked, gently fold in cheese. The eggs now should be softly set and still a little runny in places.', 'Remove the skillet from the heat, and set aside for about 20 to 35 seconds to allow the residual heat to finish cooking to your preferred consistency.', 'Garnish with parsley or chives, and serve immediately.']

title: Easy Pecan Sticky Buns Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'nsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'rown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'hopped pecans'}, {'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'oney'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'anilla bean paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'eavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(12-count)-', 'Name': 'Hawaiian rolls'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a 8x8 cake pan with parchment paper.', 'Combine butter, sugar, salt, and honey in a pan set over medium heat. Mix until the pecans are fully coated and set aside to cool slightly', 'Pour all of the sauce in the pan into the prepared cake pan and spread it out into an even layer. Add Hawaiian rolls, top side down.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the sauce is very bubbly and the buns are slightly browned , 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Let it cool for up to 5 minutes before flipping onto a cutting board or plate']

title: Ham and GruyÃ¨re Scones Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Refrigerate Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '10 scones'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cooked ham'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'GruyÃ¨re cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}]
directions: ['Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Use a pastry cutter to cut butter into flour mixture until it resembles rice or coarse meal. Stir in ham and GruyÃ¨re until evenly mixed.', 'Moisten flour mixture with cream, until dough begins to come together. Add a bit more cream, milk, or water if dough seems dry.', 'Turn out on a floured work surface and fold dough onto itself. Gently stretch dough, turning and folding 3 or 4 times. Lightly flour a rolling pin and roll dough out 1/2- to 3/4-inch thick, turning dough a quarter turn occasionally.', 'Cut scones with a lightly floured 3-inch biscuit cutter; press cutter straight down, without twisting. Pat dough scraps together and cut as needed. Line a baking sheet with parchment; place cut scones on the sheet.', 'Whisk egg, water, and pinch salt together in a small bowl. Brush tops of scones with egg wash, and refrigerate for about 20 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (235 degrees C). Brush the top of the scones with the egg mixture again.', 'Bake scones in the center of the preheated oven until tops are crispy and lightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.']

title: Breakfast Margarita Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'fluid ounces', 'Name': 'tequila'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'fluid ounce', 'Name': 'orange liqueur, such as Cointreau'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'orange, juiced'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'orange marmalade'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'orange slice, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Fill a shaker halfway with ice; pour in tequila, orange liqueur, orange juice, and lime juice. Shake until the outside of the shaker is frosted, 15 to 30 seconds. Pour into a glass; garnish with an orange slice.']

title: Roscoe's Chilaquiles Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Soak Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chile peppers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chile pepper,'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Roma tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'white onion'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'garlic cloves,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'beef bouillon cube'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'culantro leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['For salsa roja, pour boiling water over peppers and let sit until softened, 15 to 30 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, add 2 tablespoons olive oil to a skillet over high heat, and sear tomatoes, onions, and garlic until charred for about 2 minutes.', 'Place softened peppers, charred vegetables, and 1 cup of the chile soaking water in a blender. Reserve remaining 3 cups chile water.\xa0 Blend until smooth. Strain the sauce; pour back into the pan.', 'Cook sauce over medium heat, scraping any charred bits from the bottom of the pan; add 2 cups of remaining chile water. Simmer until sauce is reduced by 1/3. Stir in bouillon cube and last 1 cup chile water, culantro leaves, lime juice; stir until bouillon cube dissolves. Season with salt and pepper.', 'For chilaquiles, heat oil to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C) in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add tortillas and fry until crisp and golden. 2 minutes per batch.', 'For each serving, heat 1 tablespoon oil in a small nonstick pan over medium heat. Crack an egg into the skillet, and cook until outer edges become opaque, about 1 minute. Turn egg over and cook until whites are completely opaque, 1 to 2 minutes more.', 'Add a handful of chips to the salsa roja, and turn to coat completely. Remove to a serving plate with a slotted spoon.', 'Drizzle with crema, top with an egg, cotija cheese, avocado, cilantro, squeeze of lime juice, and drizzle with more salsa roja. Sprinkle with oregano. Repeat with remaining ingredients.']

title: Full English Breakfast Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'Name': 'baked beans'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ketchup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'HP sauce'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'bacon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bangers (British sausages)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes on the vine'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'whole', 'Name': 'cremini mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}]
directions: ['Place beans in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Add ketchup and HP sauce, and heat until warmed through, about 5 minutes.', 'Heat a large skillet over medium heat, and add bacon and sausages. Cook until sausage is browned and bacon is cooked to your taste, about 10 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.', 'Add tomatoes and mushrooms to the skillet, and sear in bacon fat for 2 minutes; remove from the pan.', 'Add 1 cup water to the pan, crack in eggs, and simmer until whites are opaque and yolks are still runny. Spoon beans onto a plate, and arrange eggs, bacon, bangers, tomatoes, and mushrooms around them.']

title: NYC Deli Bacon, Egg, and Cheese Sandwich Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 sandwiches'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'strips', 'Name': 'bacon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'rolls'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs,'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'American cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ketchup, for serving'}]
directions: ['Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until crisp, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels.', 'Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large nonstick pan or griddle over low heat. Add Kaiser rolls, cut sides down, and toast until lightly golden, about 3 minutes. Remove and set aside.', 'For each sandwich, melt 1 tablespoon butter in the skillet. Pour half the eggs into the pan, and cook as if making an omelet, pushing eggs aside and lifting to allow uncooked egg to run underneath. Layer 1 slice of cheese, 2 slices bacon, and 1 slice cheese onto half of the cooked egg, and fold the other half over the top. Add this to a toasted Kaiser roll, and wrap the roll in foil to steam. Repeat with remaining sandwich ingredients.', 'Slice in half and serve with ketchup.']

title: Ramen Omelet with Spinach, Mushrooms, and Cheese Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(3 ounce) package', 'Name': 'ramen, seasoning packets discarded'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'splash', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Bring 2 cups of water to a boil in a saucepan; add ramen and cook until tender, about 3 minutes. Drain and set aside.', 'Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet. Add mushrooms; cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes. Add spinach and cook until wilted, stirring constantly, about 2 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.', 'Mix eggs with splash of milk in a bowl. Melt remaining 1 tablespoon butter in the same skillet. Add eggs, top with half of the ramen, 1/2 of the mushroom-spinach mixture, and 1/4 cup cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Once eggs are set, fold omelet in half and top with remaining mushroom mixture and remaining cheese.']

title: Puppy Chow Crispy Treats
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rest Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12 serving size: 1 (3-x-3.25-inch) piece'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': '72% dark chocolate chips'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'creamy peanut butter'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounce', 'Name': 'rice cereal squares'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'powdered sugar'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'miniature marshmallows'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'creamy peanut butter (such as Skippy)'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place chocolate chips, 3/4 cup peanut butter, and 4 tablespoons butter in a large microwave-safe heatproof bowl. Microwave on HIGH until melted and smooth, stirring every 30 seconds, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes; stir in salt.', 'Place cereal into a very large bowl. Pour melted chocolate mixture over cereal; fold until cereal is evenly coated. Let rest for 15 minutes. Rinse and dry bowl used to melt chocolate mixture and set aside.', 'Add 1 cup powdered sugar to cereal mixture; fold until evenly coated (itâ€™s ok if some powdered sugar dissolves). Spread into an even layer on a large-rimmed, parchment-lined baking sheet and set aside. Rinse and dry bowl used to coat cereal mixture and set aside.', 'Place remaining 4 tablespoons butter and marshmallows in reserved large bowl. Microwave on HIGH until marshmallows have puffed and start turning into one mass, about 45 seconds. Stir well and add 2 tablespoons peanut butter. Microwave for 30 more seconds, and stir again until smooth. Place cereal mixture back into reserved very large bowl and pour marshmallow mixture over cereal. Quickly fold and stir until evenly coated.', 'Spray a 13-x 9-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Spread cereal mixture into pan, lightly pressing into an even layer; let sit at room temperature until set, about 1 hour.', 'Sift remaining 1 tablespoon powdered sugar over cereal mixture, cut into 12 (3-x-3.25- inch) pieces and serve.']

title: Spanish-Style French Toast (Torrijas) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'orange, zested'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon, zested'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole cloves'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}]
directions: ['Combine milk, white sugar, salt, orange zest, lemon zest, cinnamon, cloves, and vanilla in a saucepan, whisk, and bring to a simmer over medium-heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer gently for 5 minutes.', 'Strain milk through a mesh strainer and transfer 2 cups into a shallow dish in which to soak stale bread; set aside.', 'Transfer remaining 2 cups infused milk into a saucepan to make the custard sauce; add yolks and whisk thoroughly. Return saucepan to medium-low heat, and cook, stirring with a spatula and scraping the bottom constantly, until the mixture gets hot and thickens enough to coat the back of a spoon. Remove from heat; immediately pour through a fine mesh strainer. Let cool and refrigerate until needed.', 'Soak stale bread in milk, turning a few times, until most of milk is absorbed and bread is saturated. Remove to a pan or plate and refrigerate until needed.', 'Beat whole eggs in a wide shallow bowl. Coat bread on both sides in the egg.', 'Pour olive oil, 1/4\xa0 to 1/2 inch deep into a nonstick skillet, and heat over medium heat. Fry soaked bread in the hot oil until browned and puffed, about 4 minutes per side. When fully cooked, the bread will spring back when touched in the center.', 'Remove to a plate. Top each slice with 1 tablespoon turbinado sugar. Use a blowtorch with a low flame to brÃ»lÃ©e the surface. Serve immediately with custard sauce.']

title: Bloody Maria Recipe

title: Bloody Caesar Recipe

title: Croque Monsieur Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sourdough English muffins'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'half-and-half'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'sliced ham'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'Swiss or Gruyere cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'nutmeg'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking dish. Melt 6 tablespoons butter.', 'Place English muffin cubes in a large bowl and top with melted butter and Dijon mustard. Toss until well coated and place spread out in an even layer on a baking sheet. Bake until lightly browned and lightly toasted, 12 to 14 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, whisk together eggs, half-and-half, 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper in a bowl until well combined and set aside.', 'Place half of bread cubes in the prepared baking dish. Fold half of the ham slices and tear into 1 Â½-inch pieces and disperse ham between bread cubes. Top evenly with 2 cups of grated Swiss cheese.', 'Top with remaining bread, ham, and grated Swiss cheese. Pour egg mixture over casserole and press lightly to submerge most of the bread. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes.', 'Bake casserole until egg mixture is absorbed, 45 to 50 minutes. Cover with foil during the last 20 minutes of baking time if casserole is browning too quickly.', 'Meanwhile, melt remaining butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in flour and cook, stirring constantly, about 1 minute. Whisk in milk until smooth. Bring mixture to a boil and reduce heat to simmer, stirring occasionally until thickened, about 3 minutes. Add in remaining salt, pepper, and nutmeg and stir. Cook about 8 minutes on low, stirring occasionally, and remove from heat.', 'Remove casserole from oven and turn on the ovenâ€™s broiler. Pour cream sauce over casserole and top with grated Parmesan. Place casserole back in oven and broil until bubbly and lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Let stand for 5 to 10 minutes. Sprinkle with chives and serve.']

title: Halloween Zombie Guts Cinnamon Rolls Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rise Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8 to 10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'red velvet cake mix'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour, plus up to 1/4 cup more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'powdered sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'milk'}]
directions: ['Combine yeast, sugar, and water in the bowl of a stand mixer and stir until just combined. Let sit for 5 minutes or until foamy. Add cake mix, salt, and 1 1/2 cups flour and mix until a soft dough forms.', 'Transfer mixture to a lightly greased bowl and cover with plastic wrap. Let stand at room temperature in an area free from drafts until about doubled in size, about 2 hours.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease an 11X7-inch baking dish.', 'Transfer dough to a lightly floured surface and roll out to form a 20x14-inch rectangle. Spread butter evenly over dough, leaving a 1/2-inch border around the edges. Sprinkle brown sugar and cinnamon evenly over butter. Starting from the long edge, roll dough into a log and place seam side down on a cutting board. Make cuts every 1 1/2 to\xa02 inches to form â€œrollsâ€.', 'Unroll each roll and then carefully roll each one from the long edges around the filling again to form long tube-like shapes. Freeform the tube shapes in the prepared dish to resemble â€œintestines.â€', 'Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned around the edges, and the center dough is fully baked and no longer sticky, about 20 minutes.', 'Whisk powdered sugar and milk together in a small bowl and drizzle over rolls. Cut into squares and serve warm or at room temperature.']

title: Caramel Apple Overnight Oats Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4 (serving size: about 1 1/4 cup oatmeal mixture)'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'rolled oats'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'apple cider'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'caramel sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chia seeds'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'apple pie spice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'Granny Smith apples'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'M&Mâ€™S'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Stir together oats, apple cider, yogurt, caramel sauce, chia seeds, apple pie spice, and 1 cup of the apples in a medium bowl until combined.', 'Drizzle caramel sauce inside 4 (12-oz.) jars.', 'Spoon oat mixture evenly into prepared jars (about 1 1/4 cups each). Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or up to 4 days.', 'When ready to serve, top each with 1/4 cup remaining apples and drizzle with additional caramel sauce. Top as desired.']

title: Lemon Poppy Seed Pancakes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rest Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2 to 3'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 pancakes'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lemon zest, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'poppy seeds'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon wedges'}]
directions: ['Combine sugar and lemon zest, and stir to combine. Let stand about 15 minutes.', 'Whisk flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Set aside.', 'Add poppy seeds, egg, and melted butter to the bowl of sugar, and whisk thoroughly. Add lemon juice, milk, and flour mixture. Whisk gently just until flour disappears. Let batter rest for 10 to 15 minutes before using.', 'Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat, and generously grease with melted butter or vegetable oil.', 'Transfer about 1/3 cup of batter into the pan for each pancake, and cook until a few bubbles start to pop through the surface, 3 to 4 minutes. Flip and cook the second side 3 to 4 minutes. Serve immediately.']

title: Individual Bourbon-Pecan French Toast Bakes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'maple syrup'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Bourbon whiskey'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '5 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole-grain or challah bread cubes'}]
directions: ['Grease 4 (8 to 10 ounce) ramekins. Whisk together milk, eggs, maple syrup, bourbon, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl. Add bread. Toss to combine. Divide among prepared ramekins. Chill, covered, at least 2 hours or up to overnight.', 'Meanwhile, make Toasted Pecan Butter: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Spread pecans on a rimmed baking sheet.', 'Toast in the preheated oven, stirring once or twice, until lightly browned and fragrant, 12 to 15 minutes. Watch closely so they donâ€™t burn. Let cool to room temperature.', 'Pulse butter, brown sugar, and vanilla in a food processor until combined. Add cooled pecans. Pulse until mixture reaches desired consistency. Chill Toasted Pecan Butter in an airtight container up to 1 month.', 'To assemble: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). For streusel, stir together flour and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Cut in butter with a pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse crumbs; stir in pecans. Sprinkle streusel over bread mixture in ramekins.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until puffed and a knife inserted into centers comes out clean, about 30 minutes. Serve warm with Toasted Pecan Butter and garnish with powdered sugar.']

title: Smoked Salmon Breakfast Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'rye bagels'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'Swiss or provolone cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'smoked salmon'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fresh dill'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'capers and lemon wedges, for serving'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Coat a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.', 'Spread half of the toasted bagel pieces in prepared dish. Garnish with additional dill and serve with capers, lemon wedges, and/or additional sour cream.']

title: Chilaquiles Breakfast Casserole Recipe

directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Add enchilada sauce, salsa, Hatch chilies, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, oregano, and green onions to a bowl and whisk thoroughly.', 'Toss Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses together; set aside.', 'Transfer 1 ladle of sauce into the bottom of a 9x12-inch baking dish. Top with half the chips, arranging into an even layer. Ladle over half the remaining sauce. Top evenly with half the cheese mixture.', 'Top with remaining chips, arranging into an even layer. Ladle over remaining sauce. Top evenly with the remaining cheese mixture.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the casserole is heated through and cheese is starting to brown, 20 to 25 minutes.', "In the last few minutes of baking time, prepare the eggs by frying or poaching, or bake them on top of the casserole as shown in the video. See Chef's Note for directions.", 'Serve casserole hot, topped with avocado, queso fresco, cilantro, sour cream, and hot sauce. Add a fried or poached egg to the top of each serving.']

title: Baked Feta Eggs Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'feta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh basil'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C), and spray 2 oven-safe ramekins with cooking spray.', 'Combine tomatoes, red onions, and garlic in a small bowl and divide evenly between ramekins. Sprinkle with feta cheese, drizzle with olive oil, and sprinkle with oregano. Place ramekins on a baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 8 minutes. Remove from oven; do not turn oven off.', 'Gently stir feta into tomato mixture. With the back of a spoon, make indentations in tomato mixture. Crack an egg into each indentation.', 'Return ramekins to the oven, and bake until egg whites are opaque but yolks are still runny, or cooked to your taste, 10 to 14 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, garnish with basil, and serve.']

title: Breakfast Nachos Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rest Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cilantro leaves and tender stems'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'parsley leaves and tender stems'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, coarsely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'red wine vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'For chimichurri: Place cilantro, parsley, garlic, vinegar, crushed red pepper, and salt in a small food processor; pulse until finely chopped, about 10 pulses. With processor running, pour oil through food chute, and process until fully incorporated, about 20 seconds; set aside.', 'For steak: Sprinkle steak evenly with 1/2 teaspoon of the salt, 1/4 teaspoon of the black pepper, and cumin, as desired. Heat a medium cast-iron skillet over medium-high for 5 minutes. Add steak and 1 tablespoon of the oil, swirling to distribute oil evenly. Cook, undisturbed, until nicely browned and a thermometer inserted into thickest portion of steak\xa0registers 120 degreed F (49 degrees ) for rare, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer to a cutting board, and let rest 10 minutes. Do not wipe skillet clean.', 'Meanwhile, whisk together eggs and remaining 1/4 teaspoon each salt and black pepper in a medium bowl until thoroughly blended. Heat cast-iron skillet over medium. Add remaining 1 tablespoon oil and eggs; cook, stirring occasionally, until just set, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a bowl; cover, and set aside.', 'Preheat the ovenâ€™s broiler and place a rack about 12 inches from the heat source. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with aluminum foil.', 'To assemble nachos, arrange half of tortilla chips in an even layer on prepared baking sheet. Thinly slice steak across the grain, and cut into 3/4-inch pieces. Sprinkle tortilla chips evenly with half of steak, half of beans, half of eggs, and half of Mexican blend cheese. Repeat with remaining chips, steak, beans, eggs, and cheese.', 'Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly, about 2 minutes. Top with tomatoes, avocado, and pickled jalapeÃ±os. Drizzle evenly with chimichurri, and serve with sour cream.']

ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup packed', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, melted'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon, divided'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons pure', 'Name': 'maple syrup, plus more for serving'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1 (16-', 'Unit': 'oz.) day-old', 'Name': 'brioche loaf, cut into 1-inch cubes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'granulated sugar'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.
