directions: ['Add stock, rice, salt, and ginger to a large saucepan, and bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally, making sure rice does not stick to the bottom. Reduce the heat to low; simmer for 1 hour.']

title: Chili Garlic (Homemade) Paneer Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Refrigerate Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Marinate Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Other Time Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '6 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 portions'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'quarts', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}]
directions: ['Heat milk in a large pot on between medium and medium-high heat to 195 degrees F to 205 degrees F (90 to 9 degrees C) until milk is almost simmering. Reduce heat to low, and stir in yogurt and 3 tablespoons lemon juice. Stir for about 30 seconds, and if milk isn’t separating into curds and whey, stir in another 1 to 2 tablespoons lemon juice.', 'Once curds form, turn off heat, and pour in cold water to stop the cooking process and cool mixture. Pour curds into a cheesecloth or a cotton towel lined colander and drain out whey. Whey can be reserved for other uses.', 'Let curds sit and drain for 5 to 10 minutes, before gathering up the cloth, and squeezing out excess liquid. Be careful to not burn yourself, as the liquid may still be very hot. Press curds between layers of cloth into a disc of about 2 inches high, being careful not to leave excess cloth bunched up on top, or underneath the cheese. Place something flat over the cheese, and place a heavy pan on top to weigh down. Leave paneer under the weight until very firm to the touch, 30 to 90 minutes. Wrap and refrigerate until well chilled before using.', 'For the chili garlic marinade combine garlic, Scriracha, yogurt. lemon juice, garam masala, and kosher salt in a bowl; mix until well combined.', 'Cut paneer into squares or rectangles about 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick, and add to the marinade, tossing well to coat thoroughly on both sides. Wrap and marinate paneer for at least 4 hours.', 'Combine yogurt, cilantro, jalapeno, lime juice, and salt for the yogurt dipping sauce in a blender; blend until smooth.', 'Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium-high heat and pan-fry paneer until well browned, about 2 minutes per side. Serve immediately with dipping sauce.']

title: Chicken Makhani (Indian Butter Chicken) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'peanut oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallot, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'white onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ginger garlic paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'garam masala, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'tomato puree'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'half-and-half'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-size pieces'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}]
directions: ['Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Sauté shallot and onion until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.', 'Stir in butter, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, 1 teaspoon garam masala, chili powder, cumin, and bay leaf. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Add tomato sauce, and cook for 2 minutes, continuing to frequently stir.', 'Stir in half-and-half and yogurt. Reduce heat to low, and simmer for 10 minutes, frequently stirring. Season with salt and pepper. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a large heavy skillet over medium heat. Cook chicken until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.', 'Reduce heat, and season with remaining 1 teaspoon garam masala and cayenne. Stir in a few spoonfuls of sauce, and simmer until liquid has reduced, and chicken is no longer pink. Add cooked chicken into sauce and stir together.', 'Dissolve cornstarch into water, then mix into the sauce. Cook for 5 to 10 minutes, or until thickened.', 'Serve over rice with naan.']

title: Chicken Tikka Masala Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground cumin, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt, divided, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'long skewers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'jalapeno pepper, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'Name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}]
directions: ['Combine yogurt, lemon juice, 2 teaspoons cumin, cinnamon, cayenne, black pepper, ginger, and 1 teaspoon salt in a large bowl.', 'Stir in chicken, cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Preheat a grill for high heat.', 'Lightly oil the grill grate. Thread chicken onto skewers, and discard marinade.', 'Grill until juices run clear, about 5 minutes on each side.', 'Melt butter in a large heavy skillet over medium heat. Sauté garlic and jalapeño for 1 minute. Season with remaining 2 teaspoons cumin, paprika, and remaining 1 teaspoon salt. Stir in tomato sauce and cream. Simmer on low heat until sauce thickens, about 20 minutes.', 'Add grilled chicken, and simmer for 10 minutes. Transfer to a serving platter, and garnish with fresh cilantro.', 'Serve over rice.']

title: Authentic Saag Paneer Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'bunches', 'Name': 'spinach, roughly chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fenugreek leaves, roughly chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'canola oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'paneer, cubed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin seeds'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'grated fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'tomato, diced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'garam masala'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil; add spinach and fenugreek and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes. Drain well.', 'Transfer to a food processor and blend until finely chopped, about 5 pulses.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat; add paneer cubes and fry until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes. Transfer paneer onto a plate.', 'Heat remaining 2 tablespoons canola oil in the same skillet over medium heat; add cumin seeds and fry until lightly toasted and aromatic, about 3 minutes.', 'Add onion; cook and stir until softened, 4 to 5 minutes. Add garlic and ginger and stir to coat.', 'Stir in tomato, garam masala, turmeric, and cayenne pepper; cook until tomato breaks down, stirring often, about 10 minutes.', 'Stir in pureed spinach mixture, paneer cubes, and cream; add salt to taste.', 'Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.']

title: Curry Stand Chicken Tikka Masala Sauce Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ghee (clarified butter)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, or more to taste (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'Name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar, or more to taste (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'curry powder'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Heat ghee in a large skillet over medium heat. Bring sauce back to a simmer and cook, stirring often, until sauce is thickened, 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Heat vegetable oil in a separate skillet over medium heat. title: Red Lentil Curry Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'red lentils'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water, or more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'curry paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'curry powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'minced garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.25 ounce) can', 'Name': 'tomato puree'}]

title: Tandoori Masala Spice Mix Recipe

title: Chana Masala (Savory Indian Chick Peas) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'tomato, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1 inch) piece', 'Name': 'fresh ginger, peeled and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, chopped, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green chile pepper, seeded and chopped (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh bay leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'coriander powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garam masala'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'turmeric powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'water as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'Name': 'chickpeas'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh cilantro leaves, for garnish, or more to taste'}]
directions: ['Grind onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, and chile pepper together in a food processor into a paste.', 'Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Fry bay leaves in hot oil until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Pour the paste into the skillet and cook until the oil begins to separate from the mixture and is golden brown in color, 2 to 3 minutes. Season the mixture with chili powder, coriander, gram masala, turmeric, and salt; cook and stir until very hot, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Stir enough water into the mixture to get a thick gravy; bring to a boil and stir chickpeas into the gravy. Reduce heat to medium and cook until the chickpeas are heated through, 5 to 7 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.']

title: Indian Saag Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '3 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cumin seed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green chile pepper, seeded and diced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'chopped fresh mustard greens'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'chopped fresh spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}]

Cover, reduce heat, and simmer until greens are tender, about 10 minutes; add water as needed to keep greens moist.']

title: Beef Samosas Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '18'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '18 samosas'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'frozen peas, thawed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin seeds'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf, crushed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onions, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'quart', 'Name': 'oil for deep frying'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped green chile peppers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'Name': 'phyllo dough'}]
directions: ['Bring a medium saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil. Stir in potatoes and peas; cook until potatoes are tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, mash together, and set aside.', 'Meanwhile, heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add cumin seeds and bay leaf; stir until fragrant and seeds are browned. Add ground beef and onions; cook until beef is browned and crumbly and onions are soft, about 5 to 7 minutes.', 'Stir in garlic and ginger. Season with salt, cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, cinnamon, cardamom, and black pepper. Stir in the mashed potato mixture. Remove from heat and chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour, or until cool.', 'Heat 1 quart of oil in a deep saucepan over medium heat.', 'Mix cilantro and green chile peppers into potato and beef mixture. Place approximately 1 tablespoon of the mixture onto each phyllo sheet. Fold sheets into triangles, pressing edges together with moistened fingers.', 'Lower samosas carefully into the hot oil in batches. Fry until golden brown, about 3 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Repeat with remaining samosas. Serve warm.']

title: Vegan Sweet Potato Chickpea Curry Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]

title: Chicken Biryani Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled and halved'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onions, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh mint leaves'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(2 inch) piece', 'Name': 'cinnamon stick'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken pieces cut into chunks'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet. Fry potatoes in hot oil until lightly browned, about 3 to 5 minutes. Remove to a paper towel-lined plate to drain; set aside.', 'Add remaining 2 tablespoons of oil to the skillet. Add onions, garlic, and fresh ginger; cook and stir until onion is soft and golden. Add tomatoes, salt, cumin, chili powder, pepper, and turmeric; cook, stirring constantly, for 5 minutes.', 'Stir in yogurt, mint, ground cardamom, and cinnamon stick. Cover and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are cooked to a pulp. It may be necessary to add a little hot water if mixture becomes too dry and starts to stick to the pan.', 'Add chicken and stir well to coat. Cover and cook over very low heat until chicken is tender, 35 to 45 minutes. There should only be a little very thick gravy left when chicken is finished cooking. If necessary cook uncovered for a few minutes to reduce the gravy.', 'Meanwhile, make the rice: Wash rice well and drain in a colander for at least 30 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion; cook and stir until golden. Add cardamom pods, cloves, cinnamon stick, ground ginger, and saffron; stir in rice until coated with spices.', 'Heat stock and salt in a medium pot until hot; pour over rice and stir well.', 'Add chicken mixture and potatoes; stir gently to combine. Bring to a boil.', 'Reduce heat to very low, cover with a tight-fitting lid, and steam for 20 minutes without lifting the lid or stirring.', 'Spoon biryani onto a warm serving dish.']

title: Chef John's Chicken Tikka Masala Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'garam masala'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'clarified butter (ghee), or more as needed'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Place chicken in a bowl. Drizzle vegetable oil over chicken; toss to coat.', 'Whisk together salt, garam masala, cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and cardamom in a small bowl. Sprinkle over chicken and turn to coat evenly.', 'Melt clarified butter in a large, heavy skillet over high heat. Cook chicken thighs in hot butter until browned on all sides, 5 to 10 minutes. Transfer chicken to a plate. When cool enough to handle, cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.', 'Make sauce: Place the skillet with chicken drippings over medium-high heat. Stir onion into the skillet; sauté until onion softens and turns translucent, 5 to 6 minutes. Stir in tomato paste and cook until paste caramelizes, about 5 minutes. Stir garlic and ginger into tomato-onion mixture; cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.', 'Pour crushed tomatoes into the skillet. Bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom of the skillet with a wooden spoon. Pour in coconut milk and chicken broth; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook, stirring occasionally, until flavors blend and sauce is slightly reduced, about 15 minutes.', 'Stir chicken and any accumulated juices into sauce. Add cilantro and red pepper flakes; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until chicken is cooked through and tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Season with salt and black pepper.']

title: Easy Two-Ingredient Naan Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'self-rising flour, or more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'whole-milk Greek yogurt'}]
directions: ['Mix self-rising flour and Greek yogurt together in a large bowl until combined. title: Authentic Chicken Tikka Masala Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'garam masala'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast - cut into 1-inch strips'}]

title: Punjabi Chicken in Thick Gravy Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ghee (clarified butter)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin seeds'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'tomato, coarsely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'serrano chile pepper, seeded and minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'garam masala'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken legs, skin removed'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}]
directions: ['Heat oil and ghee in a large pot over medium heat. Cook cumin seeds in hot oil-ghee mixture until seeds begin to change color.', 'Stir in onion; cook and stir until onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and ginger; continue cooking until onions are browned, about 5 minutes more.', 'Mix in water, tomato, serrano pepper, tomato paste, garam masala, turmeric, and salt; simmer for 5 minutes. Lay chicken into sauce; mix gently to coat. Cover, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until chicken is no longer pink near the bone, about 40 minutes. Garnish with cilantro to serve.']

title: Goan Pork Vindaloo Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 hrs 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'dried Kashmiri chile peppers, stemmed and seeded'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1 inch) piece', 'Name': 'cinnamon stick, broken into pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin seeds'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'whole black peppercorns'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole cloves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless pork loin roast, trimmed and cut into 1-inch cubes'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'onions, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(2 inch) piece', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'boiling water'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green chile peppers, seeded and cut into strips'}]
directions: ['Grind Kashmiri chiles, cinnamon stick, cumin seeds, peppercorns, turmeric, and cloves with a mortar and pestle or electric coffee grinder until smooth. Mix in 1 tablespoon white vinegar to create a smooth paste; season with salt.', 'Place pork in a large glass or ceramic bowl. Add spice paste and toss until pork is evenly coated. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight.', 'When ready to cook, heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add onions, garlic, and ginger; cook and stir until golden brown, about 10 minutes. Add pork and all marinade; cook, stirring frequently, until pork has firmed up, about 5 minutes. Pour in boiling water and bring to a simmer. Reduce the heat, then cover and cook until pork is tender, about 40 minutes.', 'Stir in vinegar and green chiles; continue to cook, uncovered, until green chiles have softened and vindaloo has thickened, about 30 more minutes. Season with salt as necessary before serving.']

title: Crispy Vegetable Pakoras Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]

Drain on paper towels before serving.']

title: Easy Chicken Curry Recipe

title: Air Fryer Pakoras Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped cauliflower'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chickpea flour (besan)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'diced yellow potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'curry powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'coriander'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cayenne pepper, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}]
directions: ['Mix together cauliflower, chickpea flour, potatoes, water, red onion, salt, garlic, curry powder, coriander, cayenne pepper, and cumin in a large bowl until well combined. Set batter aside to rest for 10 minutes.', 'Preheat the air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease the basket of the air fryer with cooking spray.', 'Spoon 2 tablespoons batter into the prepared basket and flatten. Repeat this as many times as the basket space allows without the pakoras touching. Mist the top of each pakora with cooking spray.', 'Cook in the preheated air fryer for 8 minutes. Flip and cook for 8 more minutes. Transfer pakoras to a paper towel-lined plate. Repeat steps 3 and 4 with remaining batter.']

title: Indian Saffron Rice Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'powdered saffron'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'boiling water, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons unsalted', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'uncooked long-grain white rice, not rinsed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}]
directions: ['Place saffron in a small bowl. Add 1/2 cup boiling water; steep.', 'Melt butter in a skillet that can be tightly covered over medium-high heat. Stir in rice and salt; cook, stirring constantly, until rice begins to absorb butter and becomes opaque, but do not let rice brown.', 'Quickly pour in remaining 1 1/2 cups boiling water and saffron water. Cover immediately, reduce heat to low, and cook until all liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. For best results, do not remove the lid while the rice is cooking.']

title: Mild Curry Powder Recipe

title: Chicken Vindaloo Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cloves'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'grated fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(14.5 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes, drained'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'wine vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Toast turmeric, cardamom, cinnamon, coriander, cloves, cumin, paprika, and cayenne pepper in a Dutch oven or large pot over medium-low heat until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir spices constantly as they toast to ensure they do not burn.', 'Stir in onion, olive oil, garlic, and ginger. Increase heat to medium; cook and stir until onion is softened, about 5 minutes.', 'Stir in tomato paste until no lumps of paste remain. Add chicken, potatoes, tomatoes, broth, wine vinegar, and bay leaf; bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender and chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes.', 'Uncover and continue cooking until sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes more. Season with salt, black pepper, and additional cayenne pepper.']

title: Chef John's Roman-Style Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Refrigerate Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried rosemary'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'capers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'anchovy filet'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'crushed tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chicken bouillon paste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'orange bell peppers, seeded and cut into 3/8-inch strips'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'prosciutto, cut into strips'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chopped Italian parsley (optional)'}]
directions: ['Use a sharp knife to make 2 cuts through the skin in the center of the thigh, down to the bone, about one inch apart from each other. Once cut, transfer thighs into a mixing bowl.', 'Drizzle with 2 teaspoons olive oil, and season with salt, black pepper, cayenne, and dried herbs. Use tongs to toss until very thoroughly coated. Wrap and refrigerate chicken for at least 2 hours, or up to 12 hours.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).', 'Heat remaining olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet on medium-high heat. Add chicken, skin side down, and cook until a deep golden brown crust has formed, 5 to 6 minutes. Turn chicken over and cook for 3 minutes more. Turn off heat, remove chicken to a plate, and set aside.', 'Turn heat back on to medium, and add onions. Cook, stirring, for a few minutes or until the onions just begin to soften. Make a space in the center of the pan, and add garlic, capers, and anchovy. Cook for about 1 minute, while stirring and smashing with the edge of a wooden spoon or spatula.', 'Pour in wine, and raise the heat to high. Cook, stirring occasionally, for a few minutes until the wine reduces by about half. Add the tomato and water and stir to combine. Return mixture to a boil, and cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid reduces slightly, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Add sliced peppers, and mix in evenly. Scatter about 3/4 of prosciutto slices evenly over the top. Place chicken thighs back on top, spaced evenly, skin side up. Place remaining prosciutto slices between chicken pieces.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is cooked through and the top is nicely browned, 40 to 45 minutes.', 'Top with parsley and serve immediately on olive oil mashed potatoes, rice, or pasta.']

title: One Pot Tuscan Shrimp and Orzo Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallots'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'orzo pasta'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Cantanzaro herbs'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '3 1/2', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'plain Greek yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sundried tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh basil, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Melt butter in a Dutch oven over medium heat. Add shallots, and cook until translucent, 3 to 5 minutes. Add garlic, and stir until fragrant, about 45 seconds.', 'Add in orzo; cook and stir until orzo is lightly toasted, about 1 minute. Stir in tomato paste and Cantanzaro herbs; season with salt and pepper.', 'Pour in 3 cups vegetable broth and whipping cream. Stir remaining 1 cup broth into Greek yogurt; pour into the Dutch oven. Stir in sundried tomatoes.', 'Cook orzo, uncovered, stirring constantly, over medium heat until orzo is just tender with a bite, 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Stir shrimp and fresh spinach into cooked orzo, and cook until shrimp is pink and opaque and spinach is wilted, about 4 minutes. Taste; season with salt and pepper.', 'Remove from heat; serve immediately with fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Italian Wedding Pasta Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried farfalle pasta'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'celery'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(32 ounce) carton', 'Name': 'reduced-sodium chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped kale or baby spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(26-ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen Italian meatballs, thawed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh oregano, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko breadcrumbs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly coat a 3-quart rectangular baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.', 'Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Continue to cook and stir until mixture is slightly thickened, 1 minute more.', 'Stir in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese.', 'Add kale; cook and stir until kale is wilted, 1 minute.', 'Add cooked pasta, meatballs, 2 tablespoons oregano, pepper, and salt to the pot; stir to combine. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish.', 'To make the topping: Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter in a bowl. Add panko and stir to combine. Stir in remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese. Sprinkle topping over the casserole.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden and heated through, about 20 minutes.', 'Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. Top with remaining 1 tablespoon oregano and the parsley.']

title: Italian Ricotta Cookie Bars Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '16 cookie bars'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter,'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'extra large eggs'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'whole milk ricotta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Line a 9x9-inch square pan with enough parchment paper to have overhang on all sides, and lightly grease the parchment.', 'For cookie bars, beat butter, white sugar, brown sugar, salt, and nutmeg together in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, 2 to 3 minutes. Add in eggs and beat for 1 more minute. Add in ricotta, lemon zest, lemon juice, and vanilla and mix until thoroughly incorporated. Add in flour and baking soda and mix until just combined. Transfer batter into the prepared pan and spread into an even layer.', 'Bake until golden and the center of the bars feel just set when lightly touched, about 30 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool completely.', 'For icing, mix together powdered sugar, melted butter, lemon juice, vanilla, pinch of salt and 3 teaspoons of milk until smooth. If glaze is too thick, add another teaspoon of milk until it is a pourable consistency. Pour glaze over bars and spread into an even layer. Sprinkle nonpareils over icing before it sets. Allow glaze to set before cutting into 16 bars. Bars can be placed in the refrigerator to speed up setting. Keep bars stored in the refrigerator, but bring to room temperature to serve.']

title: Roman-Style Pizza Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Refrigerate Time:', 'Value': '2 days'}, {'Label': 'Rest Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 days 3 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'bread flour (500 grams)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'rounded teaspoon', 'Name': 'dry yeast (3.5 grams)'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water (400 ml)'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sea salt or kosher salt ('}]
directions: ['For dough, mix together flour, yeast, and water with a wooden spoon until almost all flour has disappeared and a rough dough is formed.', 'Add salt and olive oil and continue mixing with a spoon for about 3 minutes until a smooth, very soft and sticky dough forms. Clean off spoon and scrape down bowl. Cover and let rest 15 minutes.', 'Perform first set of rotating folds: leaving dough in the bowl, with a damp hand, reach under and grab the dough at the edge of the bowl, pull it and stretch it over the top. Rotate the bowl a few inches and repeat about 10 or 12 times, then gather the dough into a ball as best you can, turning the smoothest side up. Cover the bowl, and let dough rest for 15 minutes. Repeat this stretch, fold, and rest process 2 more times.', 'Transfer dough into an oiled container with a lid, rub dough with a few drops of olive oil and cover. Refrigerate for 24 hours or until doubled in size.', 'Transfer dough to the counter. With damp hands press and stretch dough into a square about 15 inches wide. Fold in half, and then in half again to create a rectangle. Fold rectangle into thirds, and turn over so the seam side is down.', 'Shape back into a neat ball with damp hand. Transfer dough into an oiled container, rub with a few drops of olive oil, and cover. Refrigerate for an additional 24 hours or until doubled in size.', 'Remove dough from the refrigerator and let stand on the counter for 1 hour to come to room temperature.', 'Meanwhile, prepare toppings: Cook and stir sausage in a skillet over medium heat until browned and crumbly, breaking up any clumps with a spatula, about 10 minutes. Remove from the pan; set aside to cool. Add red peppers and onions to the same skillet, and cook and stir just until they begin to soften, 3 to 5 minutes; remove and set aside.', 'Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (250 degrees C). Oil a sheet pan generously with olive oil. A sheet of parchment paper can be placed on the pan to prevent sticking.', 'Transfer dough to the prepared sheet pan. Use oiled fingers to press dough into a rectangle that almost covers the pan. If dough is too elastic to stay in place, let it rest for a minute, and then continue stretching and pressing into place.', 'Drizzle a teaspoon of olive oil over dough and brush to coat evenly.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 15 minutes. Remove pizza crust to a cooling rack to cool to room temperature, about 15 minutes. Remove parchment from pan if used, then return crust to the pan.', 'Spread crust with sauce, scatter over sausage and vegetables, sprinkle with mozzarella and Monterey Jack cheese, and finish with a dusting of Parmesan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are well browned, about 15 minutes. Remove to a cooling rack; let cool for 10 to 15 minutes, then cut and serve.']

title: Italian Penicillin Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6 (serving size: about 1 1/2 cup)'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'lower-sodium chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sweet onion'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'carrots (about 2)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'celery ribs'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'garlic cloves'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'thyme sprigs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese rind'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'uncooked pastina pasta'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded rotisserie chicken'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'flat-leaf parsley leaves'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Bring broth, onion, carrots, celery, garlic, and salt to a boil in a large saucepan or small Dutch oven over high; reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until vegetables are softened, about 10 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer vegetables and 1 cup of broth to a blender.', 'Secure lid on blender, and remove center piece to allow steam to escape. Place a clean towel over opening. Process until smooth, about 30 seconds. Stir blended carrot mixture back into soup.', 'Add thyme sprigs, bay leaves, and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese rind. Bring to a boil over medium-high. Add pasta, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender, 18 to 20 minutes, adding shredded chicken in the last 3 minutes of cooking.', 'Remove from heat. Remove and discard thyme sprigs, bay leaves, and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese rind.', 'Serve immediately, and garnish with parsley and grated Parmigiano-Reggiano.']

title: Cod Piccata Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '3'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'cod filets,'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'flour,'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'lemon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'shallot'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'capers'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'low-sodium chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'parsley, plus a few sprigs for garnish (optional)'}]
directions: ['Pat cod filets dry with paper towels and lightly season both sides with salt and pepper. Use a scant teaspoon of flour to very lightly dust one side of cod filets. See note.', 'Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium high heat. When butter stops bubbling, add cod filets, floured side down. Cook undisturbed, until a light brown color develops, about 3 minutes. Keeping the floured side up, carefully remove filets from skillet and keep warm.', 'Cook lemon slices in the same skillet for 2 to 3 minutes, turning to cook evenly, and add shallots and capers. Cook about 1 minute more.', 'Stir in white wine; cook about 1 minute, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet. Stir in chicken broth and chopped parsley, and squeeze juice of reserved lemon half into the skillet; cook about 4 minutes.', 'Gently return filets to the skillet, floured side up. Cook in the sauce until an instant read thermometer inserted in the center reads 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Remove to a serving plate, floured side up, and keep warm.', 'Remove about 1/4 cup of liquid from skillet; allow to cool slightly.', 'Add remaining 2 tablespoons butter to skillet and stir until melted.', 'Whisk cooled liquid and remaining flour together to make a smooth slurry. Stir slurry briskly into the skillet, and\xa0 cook until sauce is thickened and bubbly. Pour sauce over cod filets, and garnish with parsley sprigs.']

title: Unstuffed Shells Pasta Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'medium pasta shells'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground sirloin'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'talian seasoning, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon freshly ground', 'Name': 'freshly ground'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'minced garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(24 ounce) j', 'Name': 'marinara sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'whole-milk ricotta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'low-moisture part-skim mozzarella cheese'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add shells and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 9 minutes. Drain well and set pasta aside.', 'Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees F). Lightly grease a 13- x 9-inch oven-safe baking dish with cooking spray; set aside.', 'Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high. Add ground sirloin, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until beef is lightly browned but not fully cooked through, about 5 minutes. Add onion and 1 tablespoon garlic; cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is softened, about 5 minutes.', 'Reduce heat to medium; stir in marinara sauce, and cook, stirring occasionally, just until beginning to simmer, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'While beef mixture cooks, stir together ricotta, cream cheese, Parmesan cheese, basil, egg, remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a large mixing bowl until evenly combined. Gently fold in cooked pasta until evenly coated.', 'Transfer 1/2 of the beef mixture (about 2 cups) into the prepared baking dish, spreading into an even layer. Top evenly with pasta mixture.', 'Spread remaining beef mixture over pasta layer, and sprinkle evenly with mozzarella cheese.', 'Cover baking dish loosely with aluminum foil. Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling around the edges and cheese is just beginning to melt, about 25 minutes. Uncover and continue to bake until cheese is fully melted and pasta is heated through, about 10 minutes more.', 'Remove from oven and serve, garnished with basil.']

title: Double Chocolate Biscotti with Cherries
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Bake Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '24'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '24 biscotti'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'granulated sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'salted butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'large eggs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1 3/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsweetened cocoa powder'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dark chocolate'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'candied cherries'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a high-rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper .', 'Combine softened butter and sugar in a large bowl and beat with an electric hand mixer until creamy. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until well combined.', 'Add all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, and baking powder; mix until combined. Stir in the chocolate chunks and candied cherries by hand (dough will be thick).', 'Split dough in half and shape into rectangular logs, about 8x2x1 inch in size. Place on the prepared baking sheet.', 'In a small bowl, whisk together egg and water and brush the tops of the logs with the egg wash.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.', 'Remove from the oven and cool for 30 minutes.', 'Slice logs into 1 inch slices diagonally with a serrated knife. Arrange slices on the baking sheet on their sides.', 'Bake for 10 minutes at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C), turn, and bake for an additional 10 minutes.', 'Cool completely and store biscotti in an airtight container.']

title: Date and Dried Cherry Mostarda Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'medjool dates'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'tart cherries, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'shallot'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white balsamic vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'orange zest'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'orange juice'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crystallized ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'mustard powder'}]
directions: ['Combine dates, cherries, shallot, wine, vinegar, orange zest, orange juice, sugar, crystallized ginger, salt, cinnamon, and crushed red pepper in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, until liquid is absorbed and fruit is softened, about 10 minutes.', 'Stir in butter, mustard, and mustard powder. Simmer, uncovered, until mixture is thickened and jam-like, 2 to 3 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.']

title: Pappardelle with Jammy Onion Ragu Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '7', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'yellow onions'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'low-sodium chicken broth or vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh thyme, plus more for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cloves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried pappardelle'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shaved Parmesan cheese, for serving'}]
directions: ['Melt 5 tablespoons butter in a very large, deep, heavy-bottomed skillet or an 8-quart Dutch oven over medium heat. Add onions and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Toss to coat in butter. Cook, covered, stirring occasionally, until onions are tender, about 15 minutes. Increase heat to high. Cook, stirring constantly, until onions start to brown, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Reduce heat to medium and add garlic; cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add tomato paste. Cook, stirring constantly, until mixture begins to darken, 1 to 2 minutes.\xa0Add wine to skillet, then use a wooden spoon or spatula to scrape up any browned bits from bottom of pot. Simmer for 2 minutes.', 'Add broth, bay leaves, thyme, crushed red pepper, and cloves. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low; simmer, stirring occasionally, until liquid is reduced and onions are jammy, with just a bit of liquid at the edges of skillet, about 25 minutes.', 'While sauce simmers, cook pasta according to package directions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking water. Remove sauce from heat.', 'Remove\xa0 and discard bay leaves. Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, vinegar, black pepper, and remaining 2 tabelspoons butter and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Stir cooked pasta into warm sauce, adding reserved pasta cooking water a little at a time until sauce is desired thickness. Serve with Parmesan cheese and garnish with thyme.']

title: One Pot Chicken Pomodoro Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'boneless chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic granules'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Heat a deep cast iron skillet over medium heat.', 'Season chicken breasts with salt, garlic, and Italian seasoning.', 'Pour 2 teaspoons oil into the skillet. Once hot, add chicken. Cook until golden, turning once, about 4 minutes per side. Move chicken to one side of the skillet.', 'Pour remaining oil into the skillet. Add minced shallot; cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Add the garlic, stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.', 'Add the crushed tomatoes, salt, sugar, red pepper flakes, and basil. Pour in chicken broth and wine. Stir to combine.', 'Add pasta to the skillet. Nestle chicken pieces on top of pasta. Reduce heat to medium-low. Cover, and cook until pasta is tender with a bite, about 8 minutes. Taste and adjust seasoning; serve immediately.']

title: Tuscan Chicken Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'boneless chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'talian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'onion powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(4 ounce) can', 'Name': 'sliced mushrooms, drained, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sun-dried tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Spray an 8x8-inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.', 'Season both sides of chicken with Italian seasoning, paprika, onion powder, pepper flakes, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Place in the prepared pan. Place spinach over chicken, mushrooms over spinach, and sun-dried tomatoes over mushrooms. Top with mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.', 'For sauce, beat cream, Parmesan cheese, garlic, cream cheese, chicken bouillon, chicken broth, and oil together in a bowl until just combined. Season with salt and pepper. Pour mixture over chicken.', 'Bake casserole in the preheated oven until bubbly, chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear, 20 to 25 minutes.\xa0 An instant-read thermometer inserted in the center of chicken should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).']

title: Lemon Garlic Butter Chicken Spiedini Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine, such as Pinot Grigio'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper flakes'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'oregano'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless boneless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Italian breadcrumbs'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'skewers'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Whisk together olive oil, wine, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, lemon zest, 1/2 of the garlic, crushed red pepper, oregano, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper in a bowl. Add chicken and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes to 1 hour.', 'Stir together remaining salt and pepper with bread crumbs, panko, Parmesan cheese, and garlic powder in a shallow dish. Remove chicken from marinade and toss to coat in breadcrumb mixture, pressing to adhere as necessary. Thread chicken onto skewers and coat with olive oil cooking spray.', 'Preheat an air fryer to 390 degrees F (198 degrees C).\xa0 Air fry until chicken is no longer pink at the center and juices run clear, and is until lightly golden brown and crisp, about 12 minutes. An instant read thermometer, inserted near the center, should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).', 'Meanwhile, melt butter with remaining garlic in a microwave-safe dish on High in the microwave, about 10 seconds.\xa0 Stir in remaining lemon juice and parsley. Drizzle butter mixture over chicken just before serving.']

title: Italian Steak Pizzaiola Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ribeye steaks'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon freshly ground black', 'Name': 'freshly ground black'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'extra virgin olive oil, divied'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white or red wine'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'roma tomatoes, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'oregano'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'olives'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped parsley'}]
directions: ['Season steaks with 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.\xa0 Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large deep skillet over high heat. Add steaks to skillet and cook, undisturbed, until browned about 2 minutes.\xa0 Flip and cook 1 more minute. Remove steaks from skillet and set aside.', 'Add remaining oil to skillet and turn heat to medium.\xa0 Add onions, remaining salt and pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally until softened.\xa0 Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.\xa0Add wine and scrape bottom of skillet to loosen any browned bits.\xa0Add tomatoes\xa0 and oregano and bring mixture to a simmer.\xa0 Simmer until tomatoes soften, about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Use a potato masher or the back of a spoon to crush the tomatoes.\xa0 Add in tomato paste and olives and stir to combine.\xa0 Simmer for 2 minutes.', 'Return steaks and any juices accumulated to the skillet and cover the steaks in the tomato mixture.\xa0 Cook until the steak is heated through, 2 to 3 minutes.\xa0 Remove from heat and add parsley. Serve with crusty bread or over pasta or rice.']

title: Chicken Pastina Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'prepared chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'star-shaped pastina, or acini di pepe'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely grated Parmigiano Reggiano cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'extra-virgin olive oil, for drizzling'}]
directions: ['Bring broth to a simmer over medium-high heat. Taste; season with salt if needed.', 'Reduce heat to medium, and stir in pastina. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 30 seconds less than the package directions, 5 to 8 minutes.', 'Turn off heat, and stir in black pepper, butter, and some of the grated cheese. Stir constantly until butter disappears.', 'Ladle pastina into hot bowls. Top with more freshly ground black pepper and remaining Parmigiano Reggiano; drizzle with olive oil and serve.']

title: Slow Cooker Tuscan Chicken Meatballs with Gnocchi Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'bread crumbs'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'finely chopped dried tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon I', 'Name': 'talian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon freshly', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground chicken'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'For meatballs, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a 15x10x1-inch baking pan with parchment paper.', 'Combine egg, bread crumbs, onion, 2 tablespoons dried tomatoes, milk, 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, garlic, 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, salt and pepper in a bowl.', 'Add chicken, mix well.\xa0Shape mixture into 20 1 1/2-inch meatballs. Place in the prepared baking pan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until set and lightly browned (they don’t have to be done at this point), about 15 minutes.', 'Add meatballs to a 3 1/2- to 4-quart slow cooker.\xa0Add broth, cream, wine, 1/3 cup dried tomatoes, and 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning. Cover and cook on Low 6 hours or on High 3 hours.', 'If using Low, turn to High. Add gnocchi. Cover and cook 20 minutes.', 'Stir in spinach and Parmesan cheese.', 'Serve hot and enjoy!']

title: Short Ribs Pizzaiola Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(28 ounce) can', 'Name': 'plum tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'beef short ribs'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red chili flakes'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken or beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'red bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'basil leaves'}]
directions: ['Transfer San Marzano tomatoes into a mixing bowl, and use your hand to crush into a fine purée. Set aside until needed.', 'Season short ribs with salt on all sides.', 'Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven over high heat, and brown short ribs very well on all sides, about 8 minutes. Turn off heat, remove short ribs to a plate, and set aside.', 'Add mushrooms, along with a pinch of salt, and turn heat to medium-high. Use tongs to turn each mushroom onto a flat side down, and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes.', 'Add onion and cook, stirring, until they begin to turn translucent, 3 to 5 minutes. Add oregano, black pepper, and chili flakes, and cook, stirring, for about 1 minute. Add garlic; cook for 1 minute more.', 'Pour in white wine, and stir to deglaze the bottom of the pot. Add tomatoes and broth. Turn heat up to high and bring to simmer. Stir in the diced bell pepper, and transfer short ribs back in.', 'Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer gently until meat is very tender when pierced with a fork, 3 to 4 hours. About 2 hours into the cooking time, turn short ribs over.', 'When short ribs are tender, remove to a plate; set aside. Turn heat up to medium-high, and boil\xa0 sauce for about 10 minutes, or until it reduces to your desired thickness. While reducing, excess fact can be skimmed off the top. Taste; season with salt and pepper if needed.', 'Transfer short ribs back into sauce. reduce heat to low, and simmer, basting occasionally with sauce, until heated through, about 10 minutes. Serve with fresh basil.']

title: Baked Rigatoni Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 (9x13-inch) casserole'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'mild Italian sausage links, casings removed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(28 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'Italian-style crushed tomatoes, undrained'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped fresh oregano'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) packages', 'Name': 'rigatoni pasta'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'mozzarella cheese, shredded'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'freshly shredded Parmesan cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'aluminum foil'}]
directions: ['Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft, 3 to 4 minutes. Add sausage; stir to break up lumps and cook until lightly browned and crumbly, 6 to 8 minutes. Drain and discard grease.', 'Add undrained tomatoes, water, basil, oregano, and parsley to the pan; bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce heat to low and cook, partially covered, for 25 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 12 minutes. Drain, rinse under cool water, and drain again. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Uncover the sauce and increase heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens, 6 to 8 minutes. Remove from heat and add 2/3 of the sauce to pasta; toss to combine. Stir in mozzarella cheese and 1 cup Parmesan cheese. Transfer to a 9x13-inch baking dish, pour remaining sauce over top, and cover with aluminum foil..', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. Uncover, sprinkle with remaining Parmesan, and bake until lightly browned, about 10 minutes longer.']

title: Pork Scallopini Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '4 (4-ounce) boneless lean', 'Name': 'pork loin chops (about 1/2-inch thick)'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/2 cup cold', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, cut into pieces, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shallot'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'garlic clove, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1 small', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon, thinly sliced and seeded'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'capers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'parsley'}]
