Add jalapeno, onion, and garlic and cook, stirring often, until vegetables are softened, about 3 minutes. Add in pepperoni, tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, and water and stir until well combined. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce heat and cook, uncovered, stirring occasionally while pasta is prepared.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).', 'Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook lasagna noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain.', 'Coat a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray. Spread a thin layer of sauce over the bottom of the prepared dish. Top with a layer of lasagna noodles, 1/2 of ricotta, and 1/3 of mozzarella cheese. Sprinkle with 1/3 of grated Parmesan cheese and 1/3 of sauce mixture. Repeat that layer once more. Top with remaining sauce, mozzarella cheese, and Parmesan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until browned around the edges and bubbly, about 40 minutes.']

title: 6-Ingredient Ravioli Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'mild Italian sausage'}, {'Quantity': '25', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'cheese ravioli'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'spinach leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(24-ounce) jar', 'Name': 'vodka sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(6-ounce) jar', 'Name': 'basil pesto'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Crumble sausage into a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until browned, about 3 minutes. Drain.', 'Meanwhile, bring water to a boil in a large saucepan. Boil ravioli for 2 minutes; drain.', 'Spread drained sausage in the bottom of a 3-quart casserole dish. Top with ravioli.', 'Layer spinach over ravioli. Pour vodka sauce evenly over spinach. Spoon pesto evenly over the top. Top with shredded mozzarella cheese.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and ravioli is heated through, about 35 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.']

title: Slow Cooker Honey Mustard Pulled Pork Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '12 sliders'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'granulated garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'onion powder'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'dry mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(3 1/2 pound)', 'Name': 'pork shoulder'}, {'Quantity': '2/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mustard'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'apple cider vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'slider buns, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pickled red onions,'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Stir together salt, granulated garlic, onion powder, dry mustard, and black pepper in a small bowl. Rub spice mixture evenly over pork.', 'Place pork in an 8-quart slow cooker. Stir honey, Dijon mustard, whole grain mustard, Worcestershire, and apple cider vinegar in a bowl. Pour 1 cup Dijon mixture over pork; cover and refrigerate remaining 1/2 cup. Cover the slow cooker, and cook until fork tender, flipping pork halfway through cooking, 5 to 6 hours on High or 8 to 10 hours on Low.', 'Transfer pork to a cutting board, reserve 1/4 cup cooking liquid in the slow cooker; discard remaining cooking liquid. Whisk reserved Dijon mixture into reserved cooking liquid. Shred pork with 2 forks and stir into sauce.', 'Serve on slider buns with pickled red onion.']

title: Famous Mexican Hotdogs Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'bacon grease'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'beef hotdogs'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'white onions,'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Roma tomatoes,'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'jalapenos, halved'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter,'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'hotdog buns'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded cheese, or as needed'}]
directions: ['Using a knife, make a 1/8-inch slice lengthwise down each hotdog; set aside.', 'Heat bacon grease in a 12-inch cast iron skillet over medium-high heat. Add hot dogs, onion, tomatoes, jalapeno, garlic, and red pepper flakes to the skillet and cook until the vegetables have softened and everything is well browned, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Meanwhile, heat a second skillet over medium heat. Spread a thin layer of butter on the outside of each hotdog bun, and cook, turning occasionally, until lightly toasted on all sides.', 'Divide hot dogs and vegetables evenly among toasted buns and top with cheese. Allow cheese to melt and serve immediately.']

title: Picadillo Cornbread Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'green pepper'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(10.5 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes and chilies, such as RO*TEL'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'oregano'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'olives'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'raisins, chopped (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8.5 ounce) package', 'Name': 'corn muffin mix, such as Jiffy'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'jalapenos'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'tomatoes,'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and spray a 9x13-inch casserole dish with avocado cooking spray.', 'In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions and green peppers and cook, stirring, until softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds.', 'Add ground beef to the skillet and cook, until no longer pink, breaking up large pieces. Stir and cook until brown, about 5 minutes. Drain excess fat, and reduce the heat to medium-low.', 'Stir in tomatoes and green chilies with juice, tomato paste, diced potatoes, cumin, Mexican oregano, chili powder, and salt and pepper to taste. Simmer until fragrant and saucy, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in olives and raisins. Pour into prepared casserole dish.', 'Combine Cheddar and Monterey Jack cheeses; sprinkle half of cheese mixture on top of picadillo mixture. Reserve remaining cheese for later use.', 'In a large mixing bowl, stir together the corn muffin mix, chili powder, egg, milk, and sour cream. When well blended, stir in chopped jalapeños. Spread cornbread mixture in an even layer over casserole.', 'Bake in the center of the preheated oven until cornbread is browned and firm to the touch, 35 to 40 minutes. A toothpick inserted into the center of cornbread should come out clean.', 'Remove from the oven and cool on a wire rack for about 15 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top of the warm casserole.', 'Garnish with any combination of chopped tomatoes, fresh cilantro, avocado slices, and chopped green onions, and serve warm.']

title: Nicole's Cajun Chicken and Sausage Jambalaya Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'canola oil'}, {'Quantity': '1¼', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'andouille smoked sausage, sliced into ½-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 1½-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground pork'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'yellow or white onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'celery, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green bell pepper, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'jalapeño, seeded and finely diced'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '2 teaspoons', 'Name': 'Cajun seasoning, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'thyme sprigs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaves'}, {'Quantity': '6 to 7', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken stock as needed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'long grain rice, rinsed and drained'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'green onions, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'hot sauce, for serving (optional)'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons bacon grease in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add\xa0sausage and sauté until browned on both sides, about 3 minutes. Remove from the pot with a slotted spoon and set aside. Reserve drippings in the pot.', 'Add chicken to the pot and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook, undisturbed, until chicken easily releases from the bottom and begins to brown, about 2 minutes. Push chicken to one side of the pot and add pork. Cook, crumbling with a spoon, until browned, about 3 minutes. Stir chicken and pork together and remove from the pan with a slotted spoon, and add to the reserved sausage.', 'Add onion, bell peppers, celery, and jalapeño to the pan and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly to lift off any flavorful bits from the bottom. Reduce heat to medium and cook, stirring often, until well browned and very tender, about 25 minutes.', 'Add garlic to the mixture and continue cooking for 2 minutes. Stir in Cajun seasoning, thyme, and bay leaves.', 'Pour in 1 cup stock to deglaze the pan, making sure to scrape up any bits from the bottom of the pan. Stir in remaining 5 cups stock and bring to a boil. Add browned sausage, chicken and pork back into the pan; stir in rice and bring to a boil again. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and most of the liquid has been absorbed, about 25 minutes. Add up to 1 cup additional stock if necessary if liquid is absorbed before rice is tender.', 'Remove from heat; let stand 5 minutes before fluffing lightly with a fork. Serve sprinkled with green onions and hot sauce, if desired.']

title: One Pot Mediterranean Shrimp and Vegetables Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '5'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt-free Greek seasoning,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green bell pepper,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'long grain rice'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh tomato'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken or shrimp broth or stock'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'parsley'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'marinated artichoke hearts'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}]
directions: ['Cut lemon in half; cut one half into thin slices and set aside. Zest and juice the remaining lemon half into a 1-gallon resealable plastic bag. Add 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 clove minced garlic, 1/2 teaspoon Greek seasoning, and salt to the bag and seal. Move ingredients around in the bag, gently pressing, to mix.', 'Add shrimp to the bag, reseal, and gently move shrimp inside the bag to coat with marinade. Try to get as much air as possible out of the bag, reseal, and place on a plate. Move shrimp into a single layer inside the bag, and refrigerate shrimp in the marinade. Turn occasionally.', 'In a Dutch oven, heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat.', 'When oil shimmers, add onions, bell peppers, and rice. Cook, stirring, 3 to 5 minutes, or until the onion begins to turn clear and the rice begins to toast. Add remaining 2 cloves garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook, stirring, until garlic is fragrant, about 30 seconds.', 'Add diced tomatoes and their juices; pour in chicken broth and wine. Stir in parsley, red pepper flakes, and remaining 1 teaspoon Greek seasoning, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to low and cook until rice is tender with a bite, 15 to 20 minutes. Season to taste with salt.', 'Increase heat to medium; stir in shrimp and marinade. Bring to a boil; stir in spinach and artichoke hearts. Cook covered, stirring occasionally, until shrimp is pink and opaque and rice is tender, 5 to 8 minutes.', 'Sprinkle with Parmesan, garnish with parsley sprigs, and serve with lemon slices.']

title: Sheet Pan Hawaiian Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '3'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ketchup'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a large sheet pan with foil.', 'For sauce, whisk pineapple juice, brown sugar, soy sauce, ketchup, ginger, garlic, and cornstarch together in a bowl.', 'Arrange chicken, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion, broccoli, and pineapple on the prepared sheet pan. Season with salt and pepper. Pour half of sauce over chicken and vegetables; set aside remaining sauce.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until vegetables are tender and chicken is no longer pink at the center, about 25 minutes. An instant read thermometer inserted near the center should reach 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).', 'Meanwhile, microwave remaining sauce on High until slightly thickened, about 30 seconds. Cut chicken into pieces, drizzle sauce over chicken and vegetables, and toss to coat.']

title: One Pan Balsamic Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'herbs'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic granules'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'onion powder'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pint', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes, halved'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'fresh mozzarella, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'orzo'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'basil leaves, very thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'balsamic glaze, or as needed'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).', 'Slice chicken breasts in half horizontally to create 4 thin chicken breasts. Stir Cantazaro herbs, garlic granules, onion powder, salt, and black pepper together in a small bowl; season chicken on all sides with mixture.', 'Pour olive oil into a deep cast iron skillet or other ovenproof skillet and place over medium-high heat until oil is hot. Add chicken and sear until golden, 3 to 4 minutes per side. Turn off heat; remove chicken to a plate.', 'Pour orzo into the skillet; add chicken broth and balsamic vinegar. Add chicken back to the skillet along with any accumulated juices. Scatter cherry tomatoes around, and top chicken with slices of fresh mozzarella.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until an instant read thermometer, inserted near the center of chicken, reads 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 20 minutes. If needed, turn on the oven’s broiler and broil until cheese is golden, about 2 minutes.', 'Sprinkle with basil and drizzle with balsamic glaze to taste.']

title: Slow Cooker Ground Beef Stroganoff Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '5'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion,'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'sliced mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '10.5-ounce) can', 'Name': 'beef consomme'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'plain Greek yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'whipped cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '3 3/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'egg noodles'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'beef broth'}]
directions: ['Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove ground beef to slow cooker.', 'Add butter to the skillet, and cook and stir onions and mushrooms until onions are softened, about 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Add onion mixture to slow cooker; stir to combine.', 'Pour consommé into slow cooker. Stir in tomato paste, Greek yogurt, whipped cream cheese, Worcestershire sauce, and soy sauce. Cover and cook on High for 4 hours.', 'Stir dry egg noodles into slow cooker. Cover and cook until noodles are softened, about 30 minutes. If stroganoff seems too dry, stir in beef broth, 1 tablespoon at a time, as needed to thin sauce.']

title: Mediterranean Crispy Rice Chicken Bowl Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless skinless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oi'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'seasoning,'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet or line with parchment.', 'Combine chicken, 1 tablespoon oil, 1 teaspoon Greek seasoning, paprika, garlic, and salt in a bowl. Stir until well coated; set aside.', 'For dressing, whisk olive oil, red wine vinegar, pepper brine, honey, Dijon mustard, salt, and black pepper together in a small bowl until well combined; set aside.', 'Combine cooked rice and soy sauce with remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil and 1 teaspoon Greek seasoning in a bowl. Spread rice onto the prepared baking sheet.', 'Bake rice in the preheated oven until rice is crispy and lightly browned, about 40 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, heat a small amount of oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook, undisturbed, until chicken is browned on one side and releases easily from pan, 3 to 4 minutes. Continue to cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink at the center and browned on all sides, about 4 minutes more. Add water to the skillet and continue to stir until bottom of skillet is deglazed. Remove from heat.', 'To serve, divide chicken, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, banana peppers, parsley, and olives among 4 bowls. Top evenly with crispy rice and feta cheese and drizzle with dressing.']

title: Italian Wedding Pasta Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried farfalle pasta'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'celery'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(32 ounce) carton', 'Name': 'reduced-sodium chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped kale or baby spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(26-ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen Italian meatballs, thawed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh oregano, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko breadcrumbs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly coat a 3-quart rectangular baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.', 'Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add pasta and cook until almost tender, about 10 minutes; drain and transfer to a bowl.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons butter and olive oil in the same pot over medium heat. Add onion, celery, and carrots. Cook, covered, until carrots are nearly tender, stirring occasionally, about 7 minutes.', 'Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute.', 'Sprinkle flour over the vegetable mixture; cook and stir for 1 minute.', 'While stirring, slowly pour in broth. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly. Continue to cook and stir until mixture is slightly thickened, 1 minute more.', 'Stir in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese.', 'Add kale; cook and stir until kale is wilted, 1 minute.', 'Add cooked pasta, meatballs, 2 tablespoons oregano, pepper, and salt to the pot; stir to combine. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish.', 'To make the topping: Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter in a bowl. Add panko and stir to combine. Stir in remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese. Sprinkle topping over the casserole.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden and heated through, about 20 minutes.', 'Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. Top with remaining 1 tablespoon oregano and the parsley.']

title: Spicy Potsticker Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shiitake mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'green onions'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken or vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Sriracha hot sauce'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'bok choy'}, {'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': 'frozen', 'Name': 'potstickers'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'miso paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chili crisp'}]
directions: ['Heat vegetable oil in a soup pot over high heat. Add mushrooms, and cook, stirring occasionally, until they start to brown, about 4 minutes.', 'Stir in ginger, garlic, and white parts of sliced green onions, and cook just until fragrant, about 1 minute.', 'Pour in broth and bring to a simmer. Stir in soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and Sriracha.', 'Add bok choy, green parts of sliced green onion, and frozen potstickers, and cook, stirring occasionally,\xa0 until dumplings are heated through, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Just before potstickers are hot, mix miso paste with about 1/2 cup of hot broth, and stir into the soup. Turn off the heat, and stir in chili crisp. Taste for seasoning, and serve immediately.']

title: Smashed Chicken Parmesan Texas Toast Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground chicken'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'package', 'Name': 'frozen garlic flavored Texas toast'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'marinara sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}]
directions: ['Combine ground chicken, salt, pepper, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and grated Parmesan in a bowl. Spread mixture in a thin layer over one side of each toast, being sure to reach the edges of the bread.', 'Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 teaspoons oil and place half of the toasts, chicken side down, in the hot skillet, lightly pressing down on each one with a spatula.', 'Cook, undisturbed, until golden brown and cooked through, about 4 minutes. Flip, turn heat to low, and top each toast with 1 tablespoon marinara sauce and 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese. Cover the skillet and turn off the heat, and let stand until the cheese is completely melted, about 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining toasts.']

title: Copycat Chili Crisp Shrimp Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'shrimp,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'quart', 'Name': 'canola oil, for frying'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'self rising flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sparkling water, chilled'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chili crisp'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'reduced-sodium soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper, chopped into 3/4-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion, chopped into 3/4-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cooked rice'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with paper towels.', 'Heat canola oil in a large saucepan\xa0 to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Blot dry shrimp with additional paper towels.', 'Whisk together\xa0 self-rising flour, potato starch, salt, and cayenne pepper in a small bowl. Add sparkling water; whisk until flour disappears and the mixture resembles crepe batter.', "Coat 6 shrimp at a time in batter. Fry shrimp in the hot oil, making sure they don't stick together, until golden brown and crisp, about 3 minutes. Drain on prepared baking sheet and keep warm in the oven while frying remaining batches.", 'Whisk together chili crisp, soy sauce, water, and honey in a small bowl.', 'Heat vegetable oil a large skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add pepper and onion to skillet and cook until translucent and slightly browned, 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Add cooked shrimp and chili oil mixture. Toss until well coated. If desired, serve with hot cooked rice.']

title: Loaded Cheeseburger Waffle Fry Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bacon (1/2 package)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(20-ounce) bag', 'Name': 'frozen waffle fries'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ketchup, plus more for serving'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'yellow mustard'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'mayonnaise,'}]
directions: ['Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels. Once cool enough to handle, roughly chop.', 'Meanwhile, preheat an air fryer oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Air fry the waffle fries until golden and crispy, shaking halfway through, for 8 to 10 minutes or bake as directed on the package. Be sure to flip the half way through baking.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions and cook until softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add ground beef and season with salt and pepper. Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, breaking up any clumps as it cooks, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and discard grease. Stir in ketchup, mustard, and mayonnaise to completely coat the beef mixture. Simmer for 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees C (190 degrees C).', 'Spread cooked beef mixture evenly into a 9x13-inch baking dish. Sprinkle Cheddar cheese on top and arrange crispy waffle fries in an even layer over the cheese. Sprinkle mozzarella over waffle fries, followed by chopped bacon.', 'Bake casserole in the preheated oven just until cheese is melted and casserole is heated through, about 5 minutes.', 'Top with chopped pickles and diced tomatoes, and additional ketchup and mustard for an extra special cheeseburger flavor. Serve immediately while the waffle fries are still crispy!']

title: Broccoli and Cheese Rice Casserole With Garlic Pretzel Topping Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'uncooked white rice'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'broccoli florets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '10.5-ounce can', 'Name': 'condensed cream of mushroom soup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}]
directions: ['Bring water and rice to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes. Set aside.', 'Meanwhile, place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add broccoli, cover, and steam until slightly tender, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees F) and grease a 9 x 13 baking dish.', 'Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add diced onion and cook until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another 30 seconds.', 'Stir in cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, and milk. Mix until smooth.', 'Add 2 cups of shredded Cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, and paprika. Stir in the cheese until it’s melted and the mixture is mostly smooth.', 'In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, steamed broccoli, and cheese mixture. Stir until well combined.', 'Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish and spread evenly.', 'Mix crushed garlic Parmesan pretzels, melted butter, and grated Parmesan cheese in a bowl until combined. Sprinkle topping evenly over the casserole.', 'Bake uncovered for 25 minutes until pretzel topping is golden brown. Add remaining cup of cheese and bake until cheese is melted, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Allow casserole to cool for a few minutes before serving.']

title: Apple Cider Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'boneless chicken breasts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'cayenne'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sage leaves (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'shallot or onion'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'apple cider'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'apple cider vinegar'}]
directions: ['Season chicken on both sides with salt, black pepper, and cayenne and set aside.', 'Melt 3 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium heat; add sage leaves and fry until crisp, 1 to 2 minutes. Remove and reserve.', 'Add chicken breasts to the same skillet, and cook until just cooked through, about 4 minutes per side. Remove to a plate and cover loosely with foil.', 'Add shallots to the skillet; sauté for 1 minute. Pour in cider and vinegar, and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Cook until reduced by half, which will only take a few minutes. Reduce heat to low and place chicken back in, along with any accumulated juices from the plate. Cook for a few minutes, turning occasionally, and basting with the hot sauce until the chicken is hot. An instant read thermometer inserted into the center should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Remove to a serving plate.', 'Add remaining 1 tablespoon butter to the pan, and turn off the heat. Swirl pan until butter emulsifies into the sauce. Taste for seasoning and serve on chicken, garnished with fried sage.']

title: Oven BBQ Beef Brisket Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'beef brisket'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'BBQ sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (160 degrees).', 'Sprinkle both sides of brisket with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Place in a Dutch oven or large roasting pan with a cover.', 'Cook in the preheated oven, covered, but without any water for 3 hours.', 'Remove brisket from pan and slice. Return slices to pan. Mix BBQ sauce with water; pour over sliced brisket. Cover the pan and cook for 1 more hour.']

title: Halibut en Papillote Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rest Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, at room temperature'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Meyer lemon, very'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fingerling potatoes,'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'asparagus spears'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'roasted bell peppers'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(6 ounce)', 'Name': 'halibut filets'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Tear off 2 pieces of parchment paper, at least 18 inches long.', 'Mash garlic and butter together in a small bowl with the back of a spoon.', 'Place 4 lemon slices on each piece of parchment. Layer with thinly sliced potato and 4 asparagus spears. Scatter bell pepper over, and top with 1 tablespoon butter.', 'Place 1 halibut filet onto each stack of vegetables, and add 1 tablespoon butter. Layer on remaining lemon slices. Season with salt and pepper.', 'To close packets, bring opposite sides of parchment together directly above fish. Roll down together tightly until parchment touches packet contents. Crimp the parchment. Now roll and crimp the other 2 sides of parchment to create a sealed packet; tuck ends underneath. Place packets on a baking tray.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about\xa0 25 minutes. Remove from the oven; let packets rest for 2 to 3 minutes before opening carefully.']

title: One Pan Dumpling Dinner
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'minced fresh garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ginger'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'toasted sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'red curry paste'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'full-fat coconut milk or cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'bok choy'}, {'Quantity': '20', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'pork and vegetable dumplings'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'green onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'toasted sesame seeds'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chili crunch oil ('}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Stir together garlic, ginger, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, curry paste, coconut milk, and water in a casserole dish until well combined. Add bok choy and toss lightly. Top with dumplings and cover casserole with foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until dumplings are heated through at the center, about 25 minutes.', 'Divide dumplings and bok choy among serving plates and top with sauce from the pan. Top evenly with cilantro, green onions, sesame seeds, and drizzle with chili crunch oil.']

title: Apple Cider Pork Tenderloin With Sweet Potatoes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'granulated garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound)', 'Name': 'pork tenderloin'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Fuji apples'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'white-fleshed sweet potato'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter,'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) and line a sheet pan with parchment.\xa0Combine garlic, salt, pepper, thyme and smoked paprika in a small bowl.', 'Pat tenderloin dry with paper towels. Coat all sides with half of seasoning mixture, using fingertips to rub into the meat. Let seasoned tenderloin stand at room temperature while other ingredients are being prepped.', 'Combine apples, red onion, and sweet potato in a bowl. Sprinkle with remaining seasoning mixture and stir to combine. Melt 2 tablespoons butter, pour over seasoned mixture, and stir to coat. Spread in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.', 'Roast in the center of the preheated oven, uncovered, for about 10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, melt remaining butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When butter stops sizzling, add tenderloin to the skillet and brown on all sides, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Nestle tenderloin into the middle of the sheet pan with apple mixture.', 'Return pan to the oven and roast while glaze is prepared, 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for glaze, to the same skillet add apple cider, red wine vinegar, and Dijon mustard. Increase heat to medium-high and bring to a full rolling boil. Allow liquid to reduce to about 1 cup, and spoon generously over tenderloin and apple mixture.', 'Continue roasting until the internal temperature of the thickest part of pork reaches 140 degrees F (60 degrees C), 5 to 10 minutes more.', 'Remove from the oven and tent with foil. Allow to rest about 5 minutes. Residual cooking should bring pork up to 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), when tested with an instant read thermometer.', 'To serve, slice pork into 1/2-inch slices, garnish with fresh thyme, and serve with roasted vegetables and apples.']

title: Greek Smashed Pita Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'ground sirloin'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pepper'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'pitas'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups shredded', 'Name': 'Romaine lettuce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped parsley'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'dill'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'pepperoncini pepper slices'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'feta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'tzatziki sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Roma tomato, thinly sliced'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Combine meat with garlic, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper and mix until well incorporated.', 'Divide mixture evenly into 4 portions. Press each portion onto the top of 1 pita; press and spread meat almost to the edges.', 'Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat until hot. Place pita meat side down in skillet. Press pita down with the back of a spatula so that meat stays thin while it cooks. Cook, undisturbed, until browned and meat easily releases from the pan, about 3 minutes. Flip and cook 1 more minute. Repeat with remaining pitas.', 'Toss lettuce, parsley, dill, pepperoncini, red onion, feta, lemon juice, and tzatziki together in a bowl until well combined.', 'Divide salad mixture among pitas and top evenly with tomato slices. Fold in half and serve immediately.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Loaded Tater Tot Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'thick-cut bacon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cups milk'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'sharp Cheddar cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(32-ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen bite-sized potato nuggets (Tater Tots®'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'green onions'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (230 degrees C). Grease a 2-quart square baking dish.', 'Cook bacon in a large skillet until crisp, about 8 minutes. Drain on paper towels. When cool enough to handle, crumble bacon. Drain all but 2 tablespoons bacon drippings from the skillet.', 'Add onion to the skillet. Cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes.', 'Add flour and cayenne pepper to skillet; cook and stir 1 minute.', 'Add 2 cups milk to the skillet. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly, about 3 minutes.', 'Gradually add 1 cup cheese to skillet, stirring until melted. Stir in half of green onions.', 'Place 1/2 cup sour cream in a small bowl. Gradually whisk in about 1/2 cup of hot sauce mixture. Return mixture to the skillet. Return to a simmer.', 'Add half of tots to the prepared baking dish. Top with half of sauce and half of bacon.\xa0Top with remaining tots, remaining sauce, remaining bacon, and remaining cheese.', 'Bake until bubbly and cheese on top is lightly browned, 35 minutes.', 'For dill cream, whisk together 1/4 cup sour cream, 1 tablespoon milk, and dill.', 'Drizzle over the casserole and top with remaining green onions.']

title: Ground Beef and Rice Skillet Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white rice'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'lower-sodium beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(4 ounce can)', 'Name': 'green chiles'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'green onion or cilantro'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Cook ground beef, onion, red bell pepper, and garlic in an extra-large tall-sided skillet over medium heat until beef is no longer pink and vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally to break up large chunks of ground beef, about 8 minutes; drain fat.', 'Stir in rice, salt, and cumin. Cook and stir for 1 minute.', 'Stir in tomato paste. Cook and stir for 1 minute.', 'Mix in undrained diced tomatoes, broth, diced chiles, and Worcestershire sauce. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until liquid is reduced and rice is tender, about 20 minutes.', 'Remove skillet from heat. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand until cheese melts, about 5 minutes.', 'Garnish with green onion.']

title: Mediterranean Salmon Baked in Parchment Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(6 to 8-ounce)', 'Name': 'salmon fillets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'squares', 'Name': 'parchment paper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'panko breadcrumbs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'pecans'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Greek seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'grapeseed oil'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'portobello mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'artichoke hearts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'inot Grigio or other dry white wine'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'roasted bell pepper'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Place each salmon fillet on a sheet of parchment.', 'Melt 2 tablespoons butter and brush over salmon. Combine panko, pecans, garlic salt, and 1/2 teaspoon Greek seasoning in a small bowl and stir together. Evenly sprinkle over salmon fillets.', 'Crimp and fold parchment around fillets to form a packet. Place packets on a rimmed baking tray.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until salmon flakes easily with a fork, about 25 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for sauce, heat grapeseed oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms and cook, stirring, for about 3 minutes. Stir in artichoke hearts, remaining 1/2 teaspoon Greek seasoning and pepper, and continue to cook and stir for about 6 minutes. Pour in white wine. Biring to a simmer and cook until liquid is reduced by half, about 10 minutes.', 'Add roasted bell pepper, and cook, stirring, until peppers are warmed through, about 1 minute. Stir in remaining butter to melt, about 1 minute more.', 'Carefully peel back parchment from salmon and ladle sauce over the salmon.']

title: Chicken Tots Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1 pound) bag', 'Name': 'tater tots'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'jalapeno pepper'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic.'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'green onions'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon, zested'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded Monterey Jack cheese'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a sheet pan with foil, and spray with cooking spray.', 'Place tater tots on the prepared sheet pan, and spray tots lightly with vegetable oil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until nicely browned on the bottoms and edges, about 30 minutes. Keep warm in the oven until needed.', 'Meanwhile, for chicken, season chicken thighs on both sides with salt, black pepper, and cayenne. Melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat, and cook chicken just until no longer pink at the center, 3 to 4 minutes per side. Remove to a plate to cool slightly. When cool enough to handle, cut chicken into 1/2-inch pieces.', 'Add onion, bell pepper, and jalapeno peppers to the skillet, and sauté over medium-high heat\xa0until edges start to brown and onions turn translucent, 3 to 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds. Add sliced green onions and lemon zest, and toss to combine.', 'Add lemon juice, chicken broth, and any accumulated juices from the plate, and cook, stirring, until liquids reduce by about half, about 5 minutes.', 'Add cream, and bring back to a simmer. Stir in chicken, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until chicken is heated through and cream sauce thickens to desired texture, about 5 minutes more.', 'Turn off heat and stir in cheese. Serve over hot tots.']

title: Skillet Garlic Knot Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4 (serving size: 1 cutlet, 2 Tbsp. sauce)'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken breast cutlets'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'garlic cloves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'roughly chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley,'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon wedges'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Pat chicken dry with paper towels and season chicken all over with 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper; set aside.', 'Heat oil and 2 tablespoons of the butter in a large skillet over medium-high. Add chicken in an even layer, in batches if necessary; cook, turning once halfway through, until browned and a thermometer inserted into thickest portion of chicken registers 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), 3 to 4 minutes per side. Remove chicken from skillet, using tongs, and set on plate; set aside. Do not wipe skillet clean.', 'With skillet off the heat, add remaining 4 tablespoons butter and stir until melted, about 1 minute. Add garlic and stir until fragrant, about 30 seconds.', 'Return skillet to medium, and add chicken in an even layer with any accumulated juices. Add parsley and remaining 1/4 teaspoon each salt and pepper; cook, turning chicken occasionally, until chicken is heated through, about 1 minute.', 'Remove from heat. Sprinkle evenly with Parmesan cheese and garnish with additional parsley. Serve immediately with lemon wedges.']

title: Sheet Pan Chicken Alfredo Lasagna Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'lasagna noodles'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'fresh spinach, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '22', 'Unit': 'ounces A', 'Name': 'lfredo sauce (such as Prego Homestyle Alfredo)'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cooked, shredded chicken'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'torn fresh basil leaves (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ricotta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.\xa0Break lasagna noodles into 4 to 5 pieces and drop into the boiling water.\xa0Cook for 8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until just al dente.\xa0Drain and set aside.', 'Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat.\xa0Add onion and cook until soft, stirring constantly, about 3 minutes.\xa0Add spinach and cook, stirring constantly until wilted and liquid has evaporated.\xa0Stir in alfredo sauce and cook for 1 minute.\xa0Stir in chicken, 2/3 cup mozzarella and basil, if using.\xa0Remove from heat and stir in cooked pasta.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees C (190 degrees C).', 'Drizzle remaining olive oil evenly over a 18 x 13-inch rimmed baking sheet (half sheet pan).\xa0Pour lasagna mixture into the pan and spread it evenly to the edges.\xa0Dollop ricotta randomly over the pasta and sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned and bubbly, about 25 minutes.\xa0Sprinkle with parsley and serve.']

title: Satay Sauce Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 1/2 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10 ounce) can', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'crunchy peanut butter'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'onion, grated'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'dark soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes'}]
directions: ['Combine coconut milk, peanut butter, onion, soy sauce, brown sugar, and pepper flakes in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, stirring frequently. Remove from heat, and keep warm.']

title: Malaysian Nasi Lemak Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'long grain rice, rinsed and drained'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1/2 inch) piece', 'Name': 'fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole bay leaf'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Make the rice: Stir coconut milk, water, rice, fresh ginger, ground ginger, bay leaf, and salt together in a medium saucepan.', 'Cover and bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce the heat and simmer until tender, 20 to 30 minutes. Discard bay leaf and keep rice warm until garnish and sauce are ready.', 'While the rice is cooking, make the garnish: Heat 1 cup vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in peanuts and cook briefly, until lightly browned. Remove peanuts with a slotted spoon and place onto paper towels to soak up excess grease.', 'Return the skillet to the stove. Stir in anchovies and cook, turning occasionally, until crisp, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and place on paper towels. Discard oil and wipe out the skillet.', 'Make the sauce: Heat oil in the clean skillet. Stir in onion, shallots, and garlic; cook until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Mix in chile paste and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally; if mixture is too dry, add water as needed.', 'Stir in anchovies and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in tamarind juice, sugar, and salt; simmer until sauce is thick, about 5 minutes.', 'Ladle warm rice into bowls. Top with warm sauce, then top with peanuts, fried anchovies, hard-boiled eggs, and cucumber.']

title: Malaysian Barbecue Chicken Wings Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken wings'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'dark soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'oyster sauce'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'onion powder'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'dried basil'}]
directions: ['In a shallow glass bowl combine the soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sesame oil, oyster sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, ground black pepper and dried basil. Mix together. Add chicken wings, cover and refrigerate overnight. Stir together again the next day.', 'Lightly oil grill and preheat to high heat.', 'Remove wings from marinade and discard remaining marinade. Grill chicken wings over preheated grill for 8 to 12 minutes each side, or until cooked through and juices run clear.']

title: Malaysian Beef Rendang Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '⅜', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'shallots'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '15', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'dried red chile peppers'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon grass, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'coriander seeds'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fennel seeds'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cumin seeds'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'grated nutmeg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'beef stew meat, cut into 1 inch cubes'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded coconut'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole cloves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cinnamon stick'}, {'Quantity': '1 ⅔', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '⅞', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}]
directions: ['Heat the coconut in a dry wok, stirring continuously until golden brown. Set aside to cool.', 'Using a blender or a food processor, blend the shallots, garlic, chilies, ginger, and lemon grass to a thick paste.', 'Grind the coriander, fennel, cumin and nutmeg.', 'Using the wok, fry the shallot paste in a little oil for a few minutes. Add the ground coriander, fennel, cumin and nutmeg; cook for 3 to 4 minutes, stirring continuously. Add beef; cook over a medium heat for a further 3 to 4 minutes, or until meat is browned.', 'Stir in sugar, coconut, cloves, cinnamon stick, coconut milk , and water. Bring to a boil, lower heat, and simmer until most of the liquid has gone and the meat is tender (about 1 hour). Season with salt to taste.']

title: Spicy Tomato Chicken (Ayam Masak Merah) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(3 pound)', 'Name': 'whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dried red chile peppers'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh red chile pepper, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(3/4 inch thick) slice', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sunflower seed oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cinnamon stick'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole star anise pods'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole cloves'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cardamom seeds'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'tomatoes, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ketchup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}]
directions: ['Rub the chicken with turmeric powder and salt. Set aside. Soak the dried red chile peppers in hot water until softened. Blend the softened dried chile, fresh red chile pepper, garlic, onion, and ginger in a blender to a paste.', 'Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Brown the chicken in the hot oil until golden on all sides. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. Remove excess oil from the skillet, leaving about 1 tablespoon. Cook and stir the chile paste with the cinnamon, star anise, cloves and cardamom seeds until fragrant. Return the chicken to the skillet. Stir in the water, adding more if needed. Toss in the tomatoes and stir in the ketchup and sugar. Bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until no the chicken longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 15 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Sambal Sauce Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'tomato, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bulb', 'Name': 'garlic, peeled and crushed'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped serrano chiles, with seeds'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'belacan shrimp paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemongrass, bruised'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh curry leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1/2 inch) piece', 'Name': 'galangal, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tamarind juice'}]
directions: ['Place tomato, garlic, onion, chiles, sugar, salt, lime juice, and shrimp paste into a blender; process until smooth.', 'Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Pour chile purée into hot oil. Stir in lemongrass, curry leaves, and galangal. Cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture changes color and becomes very fragrant, about 15 minutes.', 'Stir in tamarind juice; cook for 1 minute. Strain sauce before serving.']

title: Mutton Varuval (Malaysian Indian-Style Goat Curry) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'goat stew meat, cut into chunks'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric, divided'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'red onions, quartered'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'coconut oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cinnamon stick, broken into pieces'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole star anise pods'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cardamom pods'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fennel seeds'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'whole cloves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'curry leaves, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ginger-garlic paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'tomato, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'coconut oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'garam masala'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'curry powder'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground paprika'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}]
directions: ['Season goat meat with 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, and black pepper.', 'Place red onions in a blender; grind into a smooth paste.', 'Heat 1 1/2 tablespoons coconut oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat. Add cinnamon stick, star anise, and cardamom pods; cook until aromatic, about 30 seconds. Add fennel and cloves; cook and stir for 30 seconds. Add remaining 1 teaspoon salt and 1 tablespoon curry leaves; stir in the onion paste. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook and stir curry mixture for 5 minutes; add ginger-garlic paste and continue cooking until flavors meld, about 10 minutes.', 'Stir diced tomato into the curry mixture. Cook and stir until mushy, about 4 minutes. Add the seasoned goat meat; cook until browned, 6 to 10 minutes. Transfer goat curry to a slow cooker; cook on High until meat is tender, 2 to 3 hours.', 'Heat 1 teaspoon coconut oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir the remaining 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, garam masala, curry powder, and paprika until aromatic, about 1 minute. Add a few cups of the curry from the slow cooker; heat until oil rises to the top. Add remaining 1 tablespoon curry leaves and cilantro; cook until gravy thickens, 3 to 5 minutes. Pour back into the slow cooker and blend well.']

title: Penang Pork Satay
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 1/2 pounds pork satay'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'inch piece', 'Name': 'turmeric root, peeled and sliced thinly across the grain'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(2 inch) piece', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'shallot, roughly chopped'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, peeled, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ancho chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chipotle chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'tamarind paste'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'lightly packed cilantro leaves and stems'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(2 1/2 pound)', 'Name': 'pork shoulder roast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': '5 large metal skewers'}]
directions: ['Place fresh turmeric in a food processor along with powdered turmeric. Add ginger, shallot, garlic, brown sugar, ancho chili powder, coriander, chipotle, cayenne, rice vinegar, soy sauce, fish sauce, tamarind paste, and cilantro. Blend into a fine paste.', 'Cut pork into 1 1/2-inch cubes, trimming off fat as needed. Place pork in a bowl; season with salt. Pour in the marinade. Mix and massage pork with your hands until completely coated. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 4 to 18 hours.', 'Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate. Thread pork through skewers so the pieces are touching but not squished together. Reserve leftover marinade.', 'Grill skewers, brushing on reserved marinade, until pork just starts to firm up but is still slightly pink in the center, about 10 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Serve immediately.']

title: Chicken Curry Puffs Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '9'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '9 curry puffs'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'curry powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'coconut milk, or more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red onions, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'stalk', 'Name': 'lemon grass, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red chile pepper, roughly chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'russet potato, diced'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut in bite-sized pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(17.25 ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen puff pastry, thawed'}]
directions: ['Heat vegetable oil in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Stir in coriander, turmeric, cumin, and curry powder. Cook a few seconds until fragrant. Pour in coconut milk, onions, lemon grass, and red pepper; cook until vegetables are tender, about 7 minutes. Stir in potato and continue cooking for 12 minutes, adding more coconut milk if the mixture becomes too dry. Stir in chicken, then season with salt. Cook and stir until chicken and potato have absorbed most of the liquid, then spread the mixture onto a plate to cool.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.', 'Unfold puff pastry and cut each sheet into 9 squares. Place heaping spoonfuls of the filling in the center of each square. Gather all 4 corners of the pastry and pinch together at the top, forming a small pouch. Place each pastry on the baking sheet, about 1 inch apart.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 22 to 27 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 10 minutes before removing to cool on a wire rack. Serve warm or at room temperature.']

title: Malaysian Lady Fingers (Okra) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'uncooked shrimp - peeled, deveined, and cut in half'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh okra pods, sliced diagonally'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh red chile peppers, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'belacan (Malaysian chile-shrimp paste)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'light soy sauce'}]
directions: ['Heat oil in a wok or skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir garlic in hot oil until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in shrimp, okra, red chile peppers, and belacan.
