directions: ['Stuff each date with 1 whole toasted almond and arrange on a serving platter. Spoon a little bit of creme fraiche over each date and sprinkle with chopped almonds.']

title: Chorba Hamra bel Frik (Algerian Lamb, Tomato, and Freekeh Soup) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'freekeh'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '12 ounces', 'Name': 'lamb meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, grated'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh mint, finely chopped, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'stalk', 'Name': 'celery'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'Name': 'chickpeas, drained'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'zucchini, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrot, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'ripe tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'potato, diced'}]
directions: ['Place freekeh in a small bowl and cover with cold water. Set aside.', 'Combine lamb, onion, black pepper, paprika, cinnamon, and salt in a pot. Stir in oil, 1/2 the cilantro, 1/2 the mint, and celery stalk until combined. Simmer over low heat for 15 minutes. Stir in chickpeas; pour in just enough water to cover, and return to a simmer. Stir in zucchini, carrot, and tomato paste.', 'Set a steamer over the pot; add tomatoes. Cover and steam tomatoes until soft, about 5 minutes. Crush tomatoes using a wooden spoon, so pulp drips into soup. Remove the steamer and discard leftover tomato peels.', 'Add potato to soup and just enough water to cover. Simmer until potato is soft, about 10 minutes.', 'Drain freekeh and add to soup. Simmer until soft, about 15 minutes. Remove celery stalk and discard. Sprinkle soup with remaining 1/2 cilantro and remaining 1/2 mint before serving.']

title: Kanafa Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 9x13-inch pan'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) box', 'Name': 'shredded phyllo dough (kataifi)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(15 ounce) container', 'Name': 'ricotta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Prepare kanafa: Finely chop frozen, shredded phyllo dough using a food processor until the strands are about the size of a grain of rice. Pour into a large mixing bowl.', 'Mix together ricotta, mozzarella, and sugar in a separate bowl.', 'Place butter in a large, microwave-safe liquid measuring cup or bowl with a spout. Heat in a microwave until completely melted, and let it sit for several minutes until a thick white foam has formed on top. Clarify butter by using a spoon to skim off the foam.', 'Carefully pour butter into the bowl of phyllo dough. Avoid pouring in the white milk solids at the bottom of the clarified butter. Use your hands to mix butter and dough together. Make sure butter is absorbed by taking handfuls of the dough and rubbing it between your palms.', 'Evenly spread buttered phyllo dough into a 9x13-inch pan and firmly press it into the bottom and edges. Spread cheese mixture onto the dough, avoiding the edges of the pan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is slightly golden and the edges of dough are brown and bubbly, 30 to 35 minutes.', 'While the kanafa is baking, prepare the syrup: Combine 1 cup sugar and water in a small saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and stir in lemon juice. Simmer, stirring constantly, until the sugar is dissolved and the mixture is thickened, 5 to 7 minutes. Be careful not to let the mixture turn golden and caramelize. Remove from heat and add rose water; set aside.', 'Remove kanafa from the oven. Place a large platter or baking sheet over the baking dish. Using oven mitts, carefully invert the baking dish onto the platter so phyllo is on top. Pour syrup over kanafa. Cut into pieces and serve while hot.']

title: Chtitha Batata (Algerian Potato Stew) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, peeled and halved'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'fresh red chile pepper, seeded and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}]
directions: ['Combine garlic, chile pepper, cumin, paprika, black pepper, cayenne, and salt in a mortar; grind with a pestle until it forms a paste. Add olive oil and mix dersa well.', 'Heat a large saucepan over medium heat and stir-fry dersa until fragrant, 2 to 4 minutes. Add potato halves and stir to combine with the dersa. Stir in tomato paste. Pour in enough water to just cover the potatoes and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 40 minutes.', 'Ladle potatoes into a serving bowl. Spoon any remaining sauce over the potatoes.']

title: Cheese Borek Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '48 stuffed triangles'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg, lightly beaten'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh parsley, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'smoked Gouda cheese, shredded'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Emmentaler cheese, finely shredded'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'sheets', 'Name': 'phyllo dough'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, melted'}]
directions: ['In a medium bowl, whisk together egg, parsley, garlic and crushed red pepper. Mix in Gouda and Emmentaler.', 'One sheet at a time, place phyllo dough on a flat surface and brush with about 1 tablespoon butter. Cut lengthwise into 4 strips. Place a rounded teaspoon of the egg mixture at one end of each strip. Fold corner of strip over the filling, forming a triangular fold. Continue folding the length of the strip in triangular folds to form a small stuffed triangle. Repeat with remaining phyllo dough.', 'Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly butter a large baking sheet.', 'Arrange stuffed phyllo triangles in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until lightly browned. Serve warm.']

title: Tajine de Poulet aux Carottes et Patates Douces (Chicken and Sweet Potato Tagine) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onions, sliced, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'celery, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh parsley, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground ginger'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'drizzle', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'raisins'}, {'Quantity': '⅔', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken stock'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'sweet potato, peeled and cubed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pitted prunes'}]
directions: ['Combine onions, celery, cilantro, and parsley in a large pot. Stir in turmeric, cumin, paprika, ginger, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Place chicken thighs on top. Drizzle olive oil over chicken. Cover and simmer over low heat until chicken is tender, about 40 minutes.', 'Place raisins in a small bowl and cover with hot water; let soak for 10 minutes. Drain.', 'Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Transfer chicken mixture into an oven-safe tagine or casserole dish. Add sweet potato and carrots. Cover with lid or aluminum foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until sweet potato is soft, about 40 minutes. Add drained raisins and prunes. Continue baking, covered, until raisins and prunes are heated through, about 10 minutes.']

title: Poulet Roti a l'Algerienne (Algerian Roast Chicken) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(2 pound)', 'Name': 'whole chicken'}]
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Mix water, onion, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, garlic, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and salt together in a roasting dish. Add chicken; turn until well coated with mixture.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone, reads 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 1 hour 30 minutes.']

title: Koshary Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'Name': 'chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red wine vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'Name': 'ditalini pasta'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'short-grain rice, rinsed'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cold water, to cover'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'dark brown lentils'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'water to cover'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion, minced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'Name': 'crushed tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken stock'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(3 ounce) can', 'Name': 'French-fried onions'}]
directions: ['Combine chickpeas, vinegar, coriander, cayenne pepper, and cumin in a resealable bag or container with a tight-fitting lid. Store in refrigerator while prepping remainder of dish, shaking occasionally.', 'Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil. Cook pasta in the boiling water until cooked through yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes; drain and set aside.', 'Combine rice with enough cold water to cover; allow to soak for 20 minutes. Drain.', 'Meanwhile, combine lentils with enough water to cover in a pot; season with salt and pepper. Bring the lentils to a boil and simmer until tender, about 30 minutes. Drain.', 'Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat; cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until translucent, 5 to 7 minutes. Add crushed tomatoes; season with salt and pepper, reduce heat to medium-low, and maintain at a simmer while preparing remainder of dish.', 'Melt butter in a pot over medium-high heat; add rice, increase heat to high, and fry for 4 to 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Pour in chicken stock and bring to a boil. Season with salt and pepper; reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until rice is tender, and the liquid has been absorbed, about 20 minutes.', 'Mix rice and lentils together on a large serving platter. Spread cooked pasta over the rice and lentil mixture. Serve with marinated chickpeas, tomato sauce, and French-fried onions.']

title: Turkish Eggs (Cilbir) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Turkish or Greek yogurt, at room temperature'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, or to taste (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'finely chopped fresh dill, or to taste'}]
directions: ['To make yogurt spread: Place yogurt in a medium bowl and grate in garlic; mix to combine. Season with pepper, salt, and cayenne. Add dill and mix thoroughly. Set aside at room temperature.', 'To make Aleppo butter: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; heat until bubbles begin to burst. Add chile flakes, paprika, and cumin. Stir until color is uniform. Turn off heat and let spices infuse.', 'To make parsley and jalapeño oil: Grind parsley and jalapeño together in a mortar. Drizzle in olive oil and season with salt; stir to combine.', 'To make poached eggs: Fill a large saucepan with 2 to 3 inches of water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low, add vinegar, and keep water at a gentle simmer. Crack an egg into a small bowl, then gently slip egg into water, holding the bowl just above surface of water. Repeat with remaining eggs. Cook until whites are firm and yolks have thickened but are not hard, 2 1/2 to 3 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon, pat dry on a kitchen towel, and place onto a warm plate.', 'Dollop yogurt mixture onto serving plates. Use the back of a spoon to spread yogurt, carving ridges into the top to catch oil. Drizzle some jalapeño oil. Top with eggs and 1 to 2 spoonfuls of Aleppo butter. Sprinkle sea salt on top.']

title: Homemade Pita Bread Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 pita breads'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(.25 ounce) package', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'warm water (100 degrees F / 38 degrees C)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¾', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¾', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'olive oil, divided'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place yeast in the bowl of a stand mixer and add 1 cup warm water and 1 cup flour. Whisk together, then let sit until mixture bubbles and foams, about 15 minutes.', 'Add 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil and salt into the yeast mixture, followed by 1 1/2 cups flour. Mix at low speed, using a dough hook attachment, until dough is soft, supple, and slightly sticky. Knead dough with machine on low speed until slightly springy and still soft, 5 to 6 minutes. If dough sticks to the sides of the bowl, add up to 1/4 cup more flour, a little at a time.', 'Turn dough out onto a floured work surface and form into a ball.', 'Wipe inside of bowl with 1/4 teaspoon olive oil. Turn dough around in bowl to lightly cover with oil; cover bowl with foil and let rise until dough has doubled in size, about 2 hours.', 'Once dough has doubled, remove from bowl and place onto a lightly floured work surface. Lightly pat into a flat shape about 1-inch thick. Use a knife to cut dough into 8 equal pieces.', 'Form each piece into a small round ball with a smooth top, pulling dough from the sides and tucking the ends underneath the bottom.', 'Cover dough balls with lightly oiled plastic wrap and let rest for 30 minutes.', 'Transfer the dough balls to a lightly floured work surface and sprinkle the tops with flour. One at a time, gently pat the dough with your fingers, forming a flat, round disc about 1/4-inch thick. Let the shaped dough rest for 5 minutes.', 'Brush a cast iron skillet with remaining 3/4 teaspoon olive oil and place over medium-high heat. Lay one round of dough into the hot skillet; cook for 30 seconds, then flip and cook for 1 to 2 minutes. Flip again and cook the first side for 1 to 2 minutes more, until both sides are golden brown.', 'Stack cooked breads on a plate; when cool enough to handle, slice breads in half and open the pocket inside for stuffing.']

title: Shakshuka Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 ⅓', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'thinly sliced bell peppers'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'hot chile pepper, seeded and finely chopped, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in onion, bell pepper, and garlic; cook and stir until vegetables have softened and onion has turned translucent, about 5 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, mix together tomatoes, chile pepper, cumin, paprika, and salt in a bowl.', 'Stir tomato mixture into onion mixture. Simmer, uncovered, until tomato juices have cooked off, about 10 minutes.', 'Make 4 indentations in tomato mixture; crack eggs into indentations. Cover the skillet and cook until eggs are firm but not dry, about 5 minutes.', 'Serve and enjoy!']

title: Persian Rice Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'quarts', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'basmati rice, rinsed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'russet potato, cut into ¼-inch slices'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, cut into thin slices, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'saffron threads'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'hot water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped parsley, or to taste'}]
directions: ['Place water and kosher salt in a pot; bring to a boil. Add rice; cook and stir for exactly 7 minutes. Drain.', 'Heat olive oil in a pot over medium-high heat. Cover bottom of the pot with 1 layer of potato slices. Sprinkle cumin and salt over potatoes. Cook until potatoes are sizzling, 2 to 3 minutes; top potatoes with rice to form an even layer. Reduce heat to low and place butter slices over rice.', 'Top the pot with a layer of clean paper towels, then place the lid over the towels. Steam until rice is fluffy, about 45 minutes.', 'Grind saffron threads with a mortar and pestle. Mix crushed saffron with 1 ½ tablespoons hot water in a large bowl. Add a couple of spoonfuls of rice to saffron mixture and stir until rice is yellow.', 'Spoon remaining rice into a serving bowl. Top with saffron rice and line the edges of the bowl with potatoes. Garnish with parsley.']

title: Chicken Biryani Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled and halved'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onions, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh mint leaves'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(2 inch) piece', 'Name': 'cinnamon stick'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken pieces cut into chunks'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet. Fry potatoes in hot oil until lightly browned, about 3 to 5 minutes. Remove to a paper towel-lined plate to drain; set aside.', 'Add remaining 2 tablespoons of oil to the skillet. Add onions, garlic, and fresh ginger; cook and stir until onion is soft and golden. Add tomatoes, salt, cumin, chili powder, pepper, and turmeric; cook, stirring constantly, for 5 minutes.', 'Stir in yogurt, mint, ground cardamom, and cinnamon stick. Cover and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are cooked to a pulp. It may be necessary to add a little hot water if mixture becomes too dry and starts to stick to the pan.', 'Add chicken and stir well to coat. Cover and cook over very low heat until chicken is tender, 35 to 45 minutes. There should only be a little very thick gravy left when chicken is finished cooking. If necessary cook uncovered for a few minutes to reduce the gravy.', 'Meanwhile, make the rice: Wash rice well and drain in a colander for at least 30 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion; cook and stir until golden. Add cardamom pods, cloves, cinnamon stick, ground ginger, and saffron; stir in rice until coated with spices.', 'Heat stock and salt in a medium pot until hot; pour over rice and stir well.', 'Add chicken mixture and potatoes; stir gently to combine. Bring to a boil.', 'Reduce heat to very low, cover with a tight-fitting lid, and steam for 20 minutes without lifting the lid or stirring.', 'Spoon biryani onto a warm serving dish.']

title: Beef Samosas Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '18'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '18 samosas'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'frozen peas, thawed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cumin seeds'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf, crushed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onions, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'quart', 'Name': 'oil for deep frying'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped green chile peppers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'Name': 'phyllo dough'}]
directions: ['Bring a medium saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil. Stir in potatoes and peas; cook until potatoes are tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, mash together, and set aside.', 'Meanwhile, heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add cumin seeds and bay leaf; stir until fragrant and seeds are browned. Add ground beef and onions; cook until beef is browned and crumbly and onions are soft, about 5 to 7 minutes.', 'Stir in garlic and ginger. Season with salt, cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, cinnamon, cardamom, and black pepper. Stir in the mashed potato mixture. Remove from heat and chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour, or until cool.', 'Heat 1 quart of oil in a deep saucepan over medium heat.', 'Mix cilantro and green chile peppers into potato and beef mixture. Place approximately 1 tablespoon of the mixture onto each phyllo sheet. Fold sheets into triangles, pressing edges together with moistened fingers.', 'Lower samosas carefully into the hot oil in batches. Fry until golden brown, about 3 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Repeat with remaining samosas. Serve warm.']

title: No-Fail Bean Pie Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 9-inch pies'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.1 ounce) package', 'Name': 'double-crust pie pastry, thawed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(15.5 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'navy beans, rinsed and drained'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'Name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, melted'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg yolks'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'grated nutmeg'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Place each pie pastry into a 9-inch pie pan.', 'Place navy beans and evaporated milk into a food processor. Add sugar, melted butter, eggs, egg yolks, flour, vanilla, cinnamon, and nutmeg; pulse a few times, then process until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour mixture into the prepared pie crusts.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, then reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake until filling is set and crust is golden brown, about 35 more minutes.', 'Remove from the oven and let cool for 1 hour before slicing.']

title: Homemade Manti (Traditional Turkish Dumplings) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour, plus more for dusting'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'water, or as needed'}]
directions: ['Make dough: Combine flour and salt in a large bowl. Add eggs and water, mixing well with your hands. Add more water, if needed, to form a soft dough. Cover and set aside for at least 30 minutes.', 'Make filling: Shred onions and place them in a colander or sieve set over a bowl; drain and discard juice. Combine drained onion, ground beef, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl; mix well with a spoon until mashed. Set filling aside.', 'Lightly flour a work surface and a large plate.', 'Divide dough in half. Working with one piece at a time, roll dough on the floured surface into a rectangle as thin as possible. Cut into 2-inch squares using a knife or pastry wheel.', 'Place about 2 teaspoons filling in the center of each square. Gather the edges of dough and pinch them together at the top to form a bundle. Transfer manti to the prepared plate; sprinkle more flour on top to prevent sticking.', 'Make oil: Heat oil and red pepper flakes in a small skillet over low heat just until pepper flakes begin to color oil. Remove from heat and keep warm.', 'Make sauce: Stir together yogurt and garlic in a small bowl; set aside.', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook manti in boiling water until filling is no longer pink and dough is tender, 20 to 25 minutes. Drain well.', 'Divide manti onto 4 plates. Spoon yogurt sauce over manti and drizzle with pepper oil.']

title: Al Kabsa (Traditional Saudi Rice and Chicken) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'saffron'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground allspice'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried whole lime powder'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground white pepper'}]
directions: ['Make spice mix: Stir together saffron, cinnamon, allspice, lime powder, cardamom, and white pepper in a small bowl; set aside.', 'Make dish: Melt butter in a large stockpot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in butter until onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes. Add chicken and cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Mix in tomato purée.', 'Stir in canned tomatoes with juice, carrots, cloves, nutmeg, cumin, coriander, salt, black pepper, and reserved spice mix. Cook for about 3 minutes; pour in water and add chicken bouillon cube.', 'Bring sauce to a boil, then reduce heat, and cover the pot. Simmer until chicken is no longer pink and the juices run clear, about 30 minutes.', 'Gently stir in rice. Cover the pot and simmer until rice is tender and almost dry, about 25 minutes; add raisins and a little more hot water, if necessary. Cover and cook until rice grains separate, 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Transfer rice to a large serving platter and arrange chicken on top. Sprinkle with toasted slivered almonds.']

title: Indian Fish Curry Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'canola oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'white fish fillets'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'onion, coarsely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, roughly chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1 inch) piece', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root, peeled and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cashew halves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped tomato'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}]
directions: ['Gather the ingredients.', 'Mix 2 tablespoons oil, mustard, black pepper, and 1/2 teaspoon salt together in a shallow glass bowl.', 'Add fish and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.', 'While the fish is marinating, combine onion, garlic, ginger, and cashews in a blender or food processor; pulse until mixture forms a paste.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium-low heat. Add cashew paste; cook and stir until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Add cayenne pepper, remaining 1 teaspoon salt, cumin, coriander, sugar, and turmeric to the cashew paste in the skillet; cook and stir for 5 minutes. Stir in tomato and broth.', 'Remove fish from marinade and shake off excess; discard remaining marinade. Arrange fish in a baking dish and pour sauce over top.', 'Bake, covered, in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 30 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.']

title: Shish Tawook Grilled Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground allspice'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 2 inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onions, cut into large chunks'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'green bell pepper, cut into large chunks'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley'}]
directions: ['Mix yogurt, lemon juice, oil, garlic, tomato paste, salt, oregano, pepper, allspice, cinnamon, and cardamom in a large bowl. Add chicken and toss to coat; transfer into a resealable plastic bag, squeeze out excess air, and seal the bag. Marinate in the refrigerator for 4 hours.', 'Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.', 'Thread chicken, onions, and bell pepper onto metal skewers.', 'Cook on preheated grill until chicken is golden and no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes on each side. Sprinkle parsley over the skewers.']

title: Slow Cooker Oats Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '6 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '6 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'steel-cut oats'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'peeled and chopped apple'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'raisins'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}]
directions: ['Combine water, steel-cut oats, apple, raisins, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla in a slow cooker; stir until well combined and sugar is dissolved. Cover and cook on Low until oats are tender and creamy, 6 to 7 hours. For a softer texture, cook for 8 hours. If your slow cooker runs hot, cook on the Warm setting instead of Low.']

title: Turkish Red Lentil Soup with Mint Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes, drained'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken stock'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red lentils'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fine bulgur wheat'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'rice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'dried mint'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'paprika'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Gather the ingredients.', 'Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion and sauté until beginning to soften, about 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Add diced tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Stir in chicken stock, lentils, bulgur, rice, tomato paste, mint, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until lentils and rice are tender, about 30 minutes.', 'Puree soup with an immersion blender until smooth.']

title: Sambusa Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '24'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 dozen sambusas'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'leek, washed and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'water, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) package', 'Name': 'spring roll wrappers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'quart', 'Name': 'oil for frying, or as needed'}]
directions: ['Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add onion, leek, and garlic; cook and stir until onion is transparent. Add ground beef; cook and stir until still slightly pink and about halfway done. Season with cumin, cardamom, salt, and pepper; mix well. Continue cooking until beef is browned and crumbly. Remove the skillet from heat.', 'Mix flour and water together in a small bowl to make a thin paste. Using one wrapper at a time, fold into the shape of a cone. Fill cone with beef mixture, close the top, and seal with paste. Repeat until wrappers or filling are used up.', 'Heat oil in a deep fryer or large saucepan to 365 degrees F (170 degrees C). There should be enough oil to submerge sambusas. Fry sambusas, a few at a time, in hot oil until golden brown. Remove to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.']

title: Kheer (Rice Pudding) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'basmati rice'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'raisins'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'rose water (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced almonds, toasted'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped pistachio nuts'}]
directions: ['Bring coconut milk, milk, and sugar to a boil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice, reduce the heat to low, and simmer until mixture thickens and rice is tender, about 20 minutes.', 'Stir in raisins, cardamom, and rose water; cook for a few more minutes. Ladle into serving bowls and garnish with almonds and pistachios.']

title: Sean's Falafel and Cucumber Sauce Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(6 ounce) container', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cucumber - peeled, seeded, and finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'mayonnaise (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried dill weed'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Make sauce: Combine yogurt, cucumber, mayonnaise, dill, salt, and pepper in a small bowl; mix well. Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.', 'Make falafel: Mash chickpeas in a large bowl until thick and pasty; do not use a blender as the consistency will be too thin.', 'Place onion, parsley, and garlic in a blender; blend until smooth. Stir into mashed chickpeas until well combined.', 'Combine egg, cumin, coriander, salt, lemon juice, baking powder, black pepper, and cayenne in a small bowl. Stir into chickpea mixture along with olive oil. Mix in bread crumbs, a little at a time, until mixture holds together but is not sticky. Form mixture into 8 balls, then flatten into falafel patties.', 'Heat 1 inch oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry falafels in hot oil until brown on both sides. Serve 2 falafels in each pita half, topped with chopped tomatoes and sauce.']

title: Bazlama - Turkish Flat Bread Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 flatbreads'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(.25 ounce) package', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Greek-style yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}]
directions: ['Dissolve the yeast, sugar, and salt in the warm water. Add the water and yogurt to the flour and mix well. The dough will be soft but not sticky. Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and shape it into a ball. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and allow it to rise at room temperature for 3 hours.', "Cut the dough into four portions. Shape the dough into rounds and flatten each round as though you're making pizza dough. Cover the rounds with a damp cloth and let the dough rest for 15 minutes.", 'Heat a cast iron skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Place one dough round in the skillet and bake until brown spots appear on the bottom, about 1 minute. Flip the bread and bake for an additional minute. Remove the bread and wrap it in a clean kitchen towel to keep warm.', 'Repeat with the remaining dough rounds. Store any leftover flatbreads in an airtight container.']

title: Fereni Starch Pudding Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '⅔', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk, divided'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'ground almonds'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole cardamom seeds'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'rosewater, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'blanched slivered almonds'}]
directions: ['Dissolve cornstarch in 1 cup milk in a small bowl; set aside.', 'Combine remaining 1 cup milk, ground almonds, and cardamom in a medium pot; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and whisk in cornstarch mixture. Mix in sugar and rosewater. Allow pudding to boil, stirring constantly, for about 3 minutes.', 'Remove cardamom seeds and pour pudding into serving dishes. Garnish with slivered almonds and serve warm or cold.']

title: Vermicelli Pudding Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'quart', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cardamom seeds, or to taste (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'vermicelli pasta, broken into 4-inch lengths'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'raisins, or more to taste (Optional)'}]
directions: ['Bring milk, sugar, and cardamom seeds to a boil in a saucepan; reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir broken vermicelli pasta and raisins into milk mixture and simmer until pasta is tender and the cream sauce has thickened, about 5 more minutes. Remove from heat and let stand until warm, about 15 minutes. If pudding is too thick, stir in a little milk.']

title: Ayam Penyet Pedas (Indonesian Spicy Penyet Chicken) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, peeled, divided'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallots, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'inch piece', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root, peeled and chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'inch piece', 'Name': 'galangal, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salam leaves (substitute with curry leaves)'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'oil, divided, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'tomato'}, {'Quantity': '11', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh red chile pepper, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'key lime juice, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'shrimp paste'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'lemon basil (kemangi)'}]
directions: ['Combine garlic, 1 shallot, ginger, galangal, coriander, and 1 1/2 teaspoon salt in a mortar and pestle; pound into a paste.', 'Combine chicken with the garlic paste, water, and salam leaves in a pot. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until chicken is cooked through, about 20 minutes.', "Meanwhile, heat 2 teaspoons oil in a skillet. Once the chicken is fully boiled, fry the chicken in the skillet until it's golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes.", 'For the sambal (chili sauce) heat 1 teaspoon oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook remaining 2 shallots, tomato, and red chiles for 2 minutes. Move to a mortar and pestle and add lime juice, shrimp paste, 1/2 teaspoon salt, sugar, and lemon basil. Pound everything into a paste.', 'Place the sambal (chile sauce) at the bottom of a serving plate and place the chicken on top of the dish.']

title: Authentic Bangladeshi Beef Curry Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green chile peppers, finely sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ginger paste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole cardamom seeds'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole cloves'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': '(2 inch)', 'Name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless beef chuck, cut into 1-1/2-inch pieces'}]
directions: ['Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low and continue cooking and stirring until the onion is very tender and dark brown, 15 to 20 minutes more.', 'Stir in the garlic, green chiles, ginger paste, cardamom seeds, cloves, and cinnamon sticks. Cook and stir until the garlic begins to brown, 3 to 5 more minutes.', 'Mix cumin, coriander, turmeric, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, and water into the onion mixture. Simmer until most of the water has evaporated and the mixture has thickened.', 'Stir in beef chuck pieces until coated with spice mixture; simmer over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until the beef is cooked through and tender, about 1 to 1 1/2 hours.']

title: Chef John's Falafel Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '12 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '12 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry garbanzo beans'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'minced garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour, or more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}, {'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'oil for frying'}]
directions: ['Place dried chickpeas into a large container and cover with several inches of cool water; let stand 12 to 24 hours. Drain.', 'Blend chickpeas, onion, parsley, garlic, flour, lemon juice, salt, cumin, coriander, baking soda, and cayenne pepper together in a food processor, scraping down the sides of the bowl as necessary, until mixture is finely ground and holds together when pressed. Transfer falafel mixture to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until flavors blend, 1 to 2 hours.', 'Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Divide falafel mixture into 12 portions and roll each with moistened hands to form a ball.', 'Working in batches, cook falafel balls in hot oil until browned and crispy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to drain.']

title: Middle Eastern Tomato Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'seeded, finely diced cucumber'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely diced tomato'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely diced sweet onion (such as Vidalia)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely chopped fresh parsley'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely chopped mint, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Place diced cucumber into a colander and sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt; allow to drain for about 15 minutes.', 'Toss drained cucumber with tomato, sweet onion, parsley, and mint. Drizzle salad with olive oil and fresh lemon juice; season with salt and black pepper. Serve immediately.']

title: Pasta with Yogurt Sauce Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '7'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 to 8 - servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'Name': 'pasta'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'plain yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'pine nuts (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter (Optional)'}]
directions: ['Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.', 'Using a mortar and pestle, mash the salt and garlic cloves together into a paste. Warm the yogurt slightly in a sauce pan. Remove a small amount of warmed yogurt from the pan, and stir together with the garlic paste. Stir this mixture into the remaining yogurt', 'Drain the pasta, and rinse in cold water. Place in a casserole or deep serving dish, toss with 1 tablespoon butter or margarine. Toss with half of the garlic-yogurt sauce. Spread the remaining sauce over the pasta. Garnish with the parsley.', 'For a very special dish, brown the pine nuts in 2 tablespoons butter or margarine. Pour over the parsley. Serve immediately.']

title: Om Ali Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(17.5 ounce) package', 'Name': 'frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped pecans'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped hazelnuts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'raisins'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'flaked coconut'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'white sugar, divided'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}]
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Butter a 9x13-inch baking dish.', 'Place the pastry sheets in the baking dish and place the dish in the oven. Watch it closely. When the top layer turns crunchy and golden, remove it from the oven. Continue until all the sheets are cooked.', "Preheat the oven's broiler.", 'In a bowl, combine walnuts, pecans, hazelnuts, raisins, coconut and 1/4 cup sugar. Break cooked pastry into pieces and stir into nut mixture. Spread mixture evenly in 9x13-inch dish.', 'Bring milk and 1/2 cup sugar to a boil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Pour over nut mixture.', 'Beat the heavy cream with the remaining 1/2 cup sugar until stiff peaks form. Spread evenly over nut mixture in dish.', 'Place dessert under oven broiler until top is golden brown, about 10 minutes. Serve hot.']

title: Baba Ghanoush Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 1/2 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggplant'}, {'Quantity': '2 to 4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'tahini or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sesame seeds'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet.', 'Place eggplant on the prepared baking sheet, and pierce holes in the skin with a fork. Roast in the preheated oven, turning occasionally, until very soft and tender, 30 to 40 minutes. Set eggplant aside until cool enough to handle; slice in half and scoop flesh into a colander or fine mesh sieve over a bowl; drain for 5 minutes.', 'Place eggplant, lemon juice, tahini, sesame seeds, and garlic in blender, and puree. Season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Transfer eggplant mixture to a medium size mixing bowl, and slowly mix in olive oil. Refrigerate the baba ghanoush for 3 hours before serving.']

title: Syrian Bread Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 rounds'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '11⁄16', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}]
directions: ['Place ingredients in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer. title: Butter Lamb Gravy Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless lamb shoulder, cut into 1 inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garam masala'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'minced ginger'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'minced garlic'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}]
directions: ['Season the lamb with garam masala and salt. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Fry the lamb cubes until browned, stirring constantly. Remove from the skillet and set aside.', 'Melt the remaining butter in the same skillet over medium heat. Add the onion; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.', 'Stir in the turmeric, ginger, and garlic. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Stir in the cayenne and tomato paste until well blended, then stir in the water. Bring to a simmer and return lamb to the skillet. Simmer over low heat for about 20 minutes, or until lamb is tender.', 'Stir in the cream and honey. Transfer to a serving dish and garnish with cilantro.']

title: Balela Salad Recipe

title: Ash-e-jow (Iranian/Persian Barley Soup) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'quarts', 'Name': 'chicken stock'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'uncooked pearl barley'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'diced carrots'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime wedges'}]
directions: ['Heat chicken stock in a large saucepan to a gentle simmer.', 'Heat vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion; sauté until translucent. Add barley; stir 1 minute. Stir in hot stock, tomato paste, lime juice, turmeric, salt, and pepper; bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, and simmer 1 hour.', 'Stir in carrots; continue simmering until soup thickened and carrots and barley tender, about 30 minutes. If soup is too thick, add hot water, 1 tablespoon at a time.', 'Slowly pour 1/2 cup hot soup into sour cream in a bowl, whisking constantly; gradually add to soup, whisking constantly. Stir in parsley. Serve with fresh lime wedges.']

title: Lentils and Rice with Fried Onions (Mujadarrah) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]

Top with yogurt or sour cream and remaining onions to serve.']

title: Eggless Date Cake Recipe
