Cook until heated through; season with salt and pepper.', 'Enjoy served over hot cooked noodles.']

title: Russian Honey Cake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '9 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 (9-inch) cake'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'wildflower honey'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cold water'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with a silicone baking mat. Place a mixing bowl and whisk in the refrigerator.', 'Pour 3/4 cup wildflower honey into a deep saucepan over medium heat. Boil until a shade darker and caramel-like in aroma, about 10 minutes. Turn off heat and whisk in cold water.', 'Place a large metal bowl over the lowest heat setting on the stovetop. Add sugar, butter, 3/4 cup wildflower honey, and 1/4 cup burnt honey. Let sit until butter melts, 5 to 7 minutes. Reserve remaining burnt honey for the frosting.', 'Meanwhile, combine baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a small bowl.', 'Whisk butter mixture and let sit until very warm to the touch. Whisk in eggs. Keep mixture over low heat until it warms up again, then whisk in baking soda mixture. Remove from heat.', 'Sift in flour in 2 or 3 additions, stirring well after each, until batter is easily spreadable.', 'Transfer about 1/2 cup batter onto the prepared baking sheet. Spread into an 8- or 9-inch circle using an offset spatula. Shake and tap the pan to knock out any air bubbles.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 6 to 7 minutes. Remove liner from the pan and let cake layer continue cooling until firm enough to remove, 6 to 7 minutes. Invert cake onto a round of parchment paper.', 'Repeat Steps 6 and 7 until you have 8 cake layers, letting each cool on an individual parchment round.', 'Trim edges using a pizza wheel to ensure they are the same size; save scraps for crumb mixture. Spread any remaining batter onto the lined baking sheet. Bake in the preheated oven until edges are dry, about 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and cut into small pieces; toss with reserved cake scraps.', 'Return scraps to the oven and bake until browned, 7 to 10 minutes more. Let cool completely, 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Transfer to a resealable bag and beat into fairly fine crumbs using a rolling pin. Set aside.', 'Remove the bowl and whisk from the refrigerator. Pour in heavy cream and whisk until soft peaks form. Add sour cream and remaining burnt honey; continue whisking until stiff peaks form.', 'Place a cake layer on a parchment paper round on a pizza pan or serving plate. Spread a cup of frosting evenly on top, almost to the edge. Repeat with cake layers and frosting, pressing layers in smooth-side down. Place the last cake layer smooth-side up.', 'Frost top and sides of cake. Cover with crumbs; clean any excess crumbs around base.', 'Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 8 hours to overnight. Transfer to a cake stand using 2 spatulas. Cut and serve.']

title: Easy Blini (Russian Pancake) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '5'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '20 blini'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'melted unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Combine flour, salt, and baking powder in a bowl.', 'Whisk 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons milk, egg, and 1 tablespoon melted butter together in a separate bowl. Mix into the flour mixture until the batter is fully combined.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Cooking several blini at a time, drop batter, one tablespoon at a time, onto the heated skillet.', 'Cook until bubbles form, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Flip and continue cooking until brown, about 1 minute more. Move to a paper towel-lined plate to help soak up excess butter.', 'Repeat with the remaining batter.']

title: Authentic Russian Salad 'Olivye' Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrot, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole eggs'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'pickles, cut into cubes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'Name': 'peas, drained'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cubed fully cooked ham, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped fresh dill, or to taste (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise, or to taste'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Bring a large pot of water to a boil.', 'Add potatoes, bring to a boil, and cook for 5 to 10 minutes. Add carrots and whole eggs and continue boiling until potatoes are tender, 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Drain and slightly cool mixture.', 'Chop potatoes and carrot. Peel and chop eggs.', 'Mix potatoes, carrot, eggs, pickles, peas, ham, and dill together in a large bowl.', 'Stir in mayonnaise until salad is evenly coated.']

title: Halupki (Stuffed Cabbage) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'head', 'Name': 'cabbage, cored'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'water to cover'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'lean ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'ground pork'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cooked white rice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs, slightly beaten'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(28 ounce) can', 'Name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2 ⅔', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}]
directions: ['Place cabbage in a stockpot; pour over enough water to cover. Add 1/4 teaspoon salt; bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Turn cabbage every 2 to 3 minutes; transfer any leaves that separate from cabbage into a strainer to drain and cool. Continue to boil until all the leaves have cooked, about 15 minutes. Reserve 1 1/2 cups of cabbage cooking water. Cut out the tough, thick center ribs of any large cabbage leaves with a sharp knife.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Mix ground beef, ground pork, cooked rice, eggs, onion, fresh parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a large bowl until combined. Lay 1 cabbage leaf on a flat surface; place 1 heaping tablespoon of filling at the base of a cabbage leaf. Overlap with the bottom of the leaf; fold in side edges and roll up.', 'Repeat with remaining large cabbage leaves and filling.', 'Cut any leftover cabbage leaves into pieces and place in the bottom of a roasting pan. Layer stuffed cabbage rolls on top.', 'Combine tomato sauce, reserved cabbage water, white vinegar, and white sugar in a bowl; pour mixture over cabbage rolls. Cover roasting pan with aluminum foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until filling is cooked through and sauce has thickened, about 2 1/2 hours. Baste stuffed cabbage rolls every hour.']

title: Russian Pelmeni Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '100 pelmeni'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'warm water, or more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour for dusting'}]
directions: ['Make dough: Combine egg, oil, and salt in a liquid measuring cup; add enough warm water to fill to 1 cup. Pour into a large bowl and knead in 3 cups flour until smooth and elastic. Cover with a dish towel and let dough rest for 30 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, make filling: Combine ground beef, onion, water, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl; mix thoroughly by hand or using a fork. Set aside.', 'Dust a baking sheet lightly with 1 tablespoon flour; set aside.', 'Roll out a portion of dough very thinly on a lightly floured surface; keep remaining dough covered with a dish towel to avoid drying out. Cut out 2 1/2-inch rounds with a cookie cutter. Place about 1 teaspoon filling on one side of each dough circle. Fold dough over and seal the edges using your fingers, forming a crescent. Join the ends and pinch them together. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining dough and filling. Freeze pelmeni for 30 minutes to prevent them from sticking together.', 'Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a simmer. Working in batches, cook frozen pelmeni in simmering water until meat is cooked through and pelmeni float to the top, about 5 minutes. Continue cooking for 5 more minutes. Transfer to serving plates using a slotted spoon.']

title: Beef and Beet Borscht Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '4 hrs 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 hrs 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1 inch thick) slice', 'Name': 'bone-in beef shank'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'quarts', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped carrots'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped celery'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'diced peeled beets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped cabbage'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white vinegar, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream, for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh dill, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Cook beef shank in a large soup pot over high heat until browned, about 3 minutes per side. Add water, onion, carrots, celery, and bay leaf; bring to a simmer and cook until meat is tender and falling off the bone, about 4 hours. Strain broth and discard solids.', 'Combine beef broth, beets, and cabbage in the same pot; cook, stirring occasionally, until beets are tender, about 30 minutes. Reduce heat to low; add vinegar, salt, and black pepper.', 'Serve soup in bowls garnished with sour cream and dill.']

title: Blini (Russian Pancakes) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '20 blinis'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}, {'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'citric acid powder'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'boiling water'}, {'Quantity': '⅔', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}]
directions: ['Beat together milk and eggs in a large bowl until combined. Beat in sugar and salt. Mix in baking soda and citric acid until incorporated. Blend in flour, a little at a time, until combined. Beat in oil. Pour in boiling water, stirring constantly, until batter is thin and watery. Let rest for about 20 minutes.', 'Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small frying pan over medium-high heat. Pick the pan up off the heat. Pour in a ladleful of batter while you rotate your wrist, tilting the pan, so batter forms a circle and coats the bottom. The blini should be very thin.', "Return the pan to the heat. Cook blini for 90 seconds. Carefully lift up edge of blini to see if it's fully cooked: edges will be golden and bottom surface should have brown spots. Flip blini over and cook for 1 minute more.", 'Transfer blini to a plate lined with a clean kitchen towel. Continue cooking remaining batter, adding 1 tablespoon butter to the pan for every 4 blinis. Stack blinis and cover with another kitchen towel to keep warm.', 'Spread desired filling in the center of each blini. Fold 3 times to make a triangle shape or fold up all 4 sides, like a small burrito.']

title: Taylor's Piroshki Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '35 to 40 piroshki'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'dried dill weed to taste'}]
directions: ['To make the filling: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain. Stir in onion; cook and stir until onion has softened. Season with salt, pepper, and dill weed to taste. Allow to cool before using.', 'Meanwhile, to make the dough: Dissolve yeast in warm water and place in a warm location until frothy, about 10 to 15 minutes. Warm milk in a medium saucepan over low heat; gently whisk in eggs, oil, sugar, and salt. Remove from heat.', 'Place 1/2 of the flour in a large mixing bowl and gradually stir in the milk mixture. Add yeast solution alternately with remaining flour, stirring after each addition; mix well. Knead until the dough forms a ball and does not stick to the bowl. (Note: Start with the 4 cups of flour. You may need to add more, a little at a time, as you knead the dough). Cover the bowl with a clean cloth. Set in a warm location and allow to rise until doubled in volume, about 30 to 60 minutes.', 'Remove dough from bowl and place on a lightly floured surface. Pinch off pieces approximately the size of golf balls. Roll the pieces into disks about 3 1/2 to 4 inches in diameter.', 'Fill the center of each disk with a heaping tablespoon of cooled beef mixture. Fold disks over the mixture and firmly pinch the edges to seal. Arrange on a flat surface and allow to sit for approximately 10 minutes.', 'Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lower piroshki carefully into the hot oil in batches. Fry until golden brown on one side, about 3 to 4 minutes; gently turn and fry the other side. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain. Repeat with remaining piroshki.']

title: Russian Mushroom and Potato Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '12 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'leeks, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'carrots, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'dried dill weed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled and diced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'fresh mushrooms, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'half-and-half'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'sprig', 'Name': 'fresh dill weed, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Melt 3 tablespoons butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Mix in leeks and carrots, and cook 5 minutes. Pour in broth. Season with dill, salt, pepper, and bay leaf. Mix in potatoes, cover, and cook 20 minutes, or until potatoes are tender but firm. Remove and discard the bay leaf.', 'Melt the remaining butter in a skillet over medium heat, and saute the mushrooms 5 minutes, until lightly browned. Stir into the soup.', 'In a small bowl, mix the half-and-half and flour until smooth. Stir into the soup to thicken. Garnish each bowl of soup with fresh dill to serve.']

title: Chicken Kiev Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '12 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 2 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried dill weed'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry bread crumbs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'vegetable oil for frying'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Combine 1/3 cup butter, 1/2 teaspoon pepper and 1 teaspoon garlic powder. On a 6x6 inch piece of aluminum foil, spread mixture to about 2x3 inches. Place this mixture in the coldest section of your freezer and freeze until firm. This can be done ahead of time.', 'Remove all fat from the chicken breast. If using whole chicken breasts, cut them in half. Place each chicken breast half between 2 pieces of waxed paper and using a mallet, pound carefully to about 1/4 inch thickness or less.', 'When butter mixture is firm, remove from freezer and cut into 6 equal pieces. Place one piece of butter on each chicken breast. Fold in edges of chicken and then roll to encase the butter completely. Secure the chicken roll with small skewers or toothpicks.', 'In a mixing bowl, beat eggs with water until fluffy. In a separate bowl, mix together 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, dill weed and flour. Coat the chicken well with the seasoned flour. Dip the floured chicken in the egg mixture and then roll in the bread crumbs. Place coated chicken on a shallow tray and chill in refrigerator for 30 minutes.', "In a medium size deep frying pan, heat vegetable oil to medium-high. Fry chicken for about 5 minutes then turn over and fry for 5 minutes longer or until the chicken is golden brown. To test for doneness, cut into one of the rolled chicken breasts to make sure it doesn't have a pink interior. Serve immediately, garnished with a sliced lemon twist and a sprinkling or parsley."]

title: Russian Black Bread
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 1 1/2 pound loaf'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cider vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'bread flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'rye flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'margarine'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'dark corn syrup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsweetened cocoa powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'instant coffee granules'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'caraway seed'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fennel seed (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}]
directions: ['Place ingredients into the bread machine in order suggested by the manufacturer.', 'Use the whole wheat, regular crust setting.', 'After the baking cycle ends, remove bread from pan, place on a cake rack, and allow to cool for 1 hour before slicing.']

title: Traditional Russian Pirozhki Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '30'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '60 pirozhki'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'milk, warmed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, melted'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'medium head', 'Name': 'cabbage, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'hard-cooked eggs, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Place 1/2 cup milk in a cup or small bowl. Stir in sugar and sprinkle yeast over the top. Set aside until foamy, about 10 minutes. Pour the remaining milk into a large bowl.', "Add the melted butter, egg, salt and 1 cup of flour to the large bowl with the milk. Stir in the yeast mixture. Mix in flour 1 cup at a time until dough pulls away from the sides of the bowl and doesn't stick to your hands. Cover the bowl loosely and set in a warm place to rise for about 1 hour. Dough should almost triple in size.", 'While you wait for the dough to rise, melt the remaining butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add cabbage and cook, stirring frequently, until cabbage has wilted. Mix in the eggs and season with salt and pepper. Continue to cook, stirring occasionally until cabbage is tender. Set this aside for the filling.', 'Place the risen dough onto a floured surface and gently form into a long snake about 2 inches wide. Cut into 1 inch pieces and roll each piece into a ball. Flatten the balls by hand until they are 4 to 5 inches across. Place a spoonful of the cabbage filling in the center and fold in half to enclose. Pinch the edges together to seal in the filling.', 'Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line one or two baking sheets with aluminum foil. Place the pirozhki onto the baking sheet, leaving room between them for them to grow.', 'Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.']

title: Nana's Beef Stroganoff Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'beef sirloin, cut into 1/4-inch wide strips'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons unsalted', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons unsalted', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chilled beef stock'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry white wine'}]
directions: ['Add 1 tablespoon flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt to a large, resealable plastic bag; shake to combine. Add beef; shake to coat.', 'Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef; brown, about 3 minutes per side. Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic; cook and stir until garlic fragrant, 3 to 4 minutes. Transfer beef mixture to a bowl; leave drippings in skillet.', 'Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter in skillet over medium heat. Add 3 tablespoons flour; cook and stir until smooth. Stir in tomato paste, then whisk in beef stock. Cook and stir, constantly, until thickened and bubbling, about 5 minutes.', 'Return beef mixture to skillet; stir to coat with sauce. Reduce heat to very low; simmer until beef tender, 2 to 3 hours. The longer beef cooks, the more tender it will be. Stir sour cream and white wine into beef mixture just before serving; heat through. Do not boil.']

title: Russian Cabbage Borscht Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'thinly sliced potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'thinly sliced beets'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'vegetable stock or water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped onions'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'caraway seed (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'celery stalk, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'carrot, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'coarsely chopped red cabbage'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh dill weed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'cider vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'tomato puree'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sour cream, for topping'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chopped tomatoes, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Place potatoes and beets in a medium saucepan over high heat; cover with stock and boil until vegetables are tender. Remove potatoes and beets with a slotted spoon; reserve stock.', 'Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in onions, caraway seeds, and salt; cook until onions become soft and translucent. Stir in celery, carrot, and cabbage. Mix in reserved stock; cook, covered, until all vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.', 'Add potatoes and beets to the skillet. Season with black pepper and dill weed. Stir in cider vinegar, honey, and tomato puree. Cover, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for at least 30 minutes.', 'Portion borscht into bowls. Top with sour cream, extra dill weed, and chopped tomatoes to serve.']

title: Yabluchnyk (Ukrainian Apple Cake) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 8-inch square cake'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, cut into pieces'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'apples - peeled, cored, and thinly sliced'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly butter an 8-inch square baking dish.', 'Make the cake: Sift flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt into a mixing bowl. Cut in butter with 2 knives or a pastry blender until mixture is crumbly.', 'Whisk cream and egg together in a small bowl; add to flour mixture and gently mix until a soft dough forms. Press into the prepared baking dish. Layer apples over top in neat rows, overlapping slightly.', 'Make the streusel topping: Whisk brown sugar, flour, and cinnamon together in a small bowl. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Sprinkle topping over apples.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until apples have softened and topping is golden brown, about 25 minutes.']

title: Russian Cheese Pancakes (Syrniki) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '5'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '5 syrniki'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'quark, well drained'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour, plus extra for dusting'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'vanilla sugar (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'oil for frying'}]
directions: ['Beat egg and white sugar together in a bowl until smooth. Whisk in quark cheese, flour, vanilla sugar, and salt. Mix well until dough is thick and sticky.', 'Divide dough into 5 to 6 portions. Form into balls and coat with some flour. Flatten slightly to form into discs (syrniki).', 'Heat oil in skillet over medium-low heat. Add the syrniki; fry until browned, 5 minutes per side.']

title: Best Ever Russian Beef Stroganoff Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'beef sirloin, cut into 1/4-inch wide strips'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'thinly sliced mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, minced, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cold beef stock'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cooking sherry'}]
directions: ['Combine 1 1/2 tablespoons flour with salt and pepper in a bowl. Dredge beef strips in the mixture.', 'Melt 3 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add the dredged beef strips; cook and stir until browned, about 5 minutes. Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic; cook until onion is barely tender, 3 to 4 minutes. Transfer the beef and mushroom mixture to a plate.', 'Melt remaining butter in the same skillet; reduce heat to low. Stir in 3 tablespoons flour and tomato paste; cook until slightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium. Add beef stock slowly, stirring constantly, until gravy is thickened and no lumps remain, 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Return the beef and mushroom mixture to the skillet with the gravy. Stir in sour cream and sherry; heat until bubbling, about 5 minutes.']

title: Sweet Russian Cabbage Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'lean ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'Name': 'diced tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'Name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'carrots, shredded'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cubes', 'Name': 'beef bouillon'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'quarts', 'Name': 'water, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'head', 'Name': 'cabbage, cored and cut into wedges'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, finely chopped'}]
directions: ['Crumble ground beef into a large pot. Add diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, carrots, onion, sugar, vinegar, bouillon cubes, salt, and pepper. Pour in 1 quart of water and bring to a boil. Add cabbage and garlic. Simmer until cabbage is tender, about 25 minutes. Ladle into soup bowls to serve.']

title: Russian Cabbage Pie Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small head', 'Name': 'cabbage, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'hard-boiled eggs, peeled and chopped, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'sprigs', 'Name': 'fresh dill, finely chopped, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'sheets', 'Name': 'yeasted puff pastry'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg, beaten'}]
directions: ['Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add cabbage and cook until softened but not browned, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool, 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Mix cooled cabbage with hard-boiled eggs and dill. Season with salt.', 'Line a pie plate with 1 sheet of puff pastry. Add cabbage filling, leaving some space around the edge. Cover with the second sheet of puff pastry and pinch edges together. Glaze the top with beaten egg.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 40 to 45 minutes.']

title: Orange Drop Cookies II Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '18'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '3 dozen'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '⅔', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shortening'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'orange juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'orange zest'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': "confectioners' sugar"}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'orange juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'orange zest'}]
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets.', 'Mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Stir 1/2 cup orange juice and 1 teaspoon rind into the flour mixture.', 'Cream shortening and white sugar together. Mix egg into the sugar mixture thoroughly. Slowly blend flour mixture into the egg and sugar mixture. Drop by teaspoonful onto greased cookie sheet.', 'Bake for 8 to 10 minutes.', "Make the icing: Mix confectioner's sugar and 2 tablespoons butter together until smooth. Pour 2 tablespoons orange juice and 1 teaspoon orange rind into the sugar and butter mixture, mix well. When the cookies have cooled spread the icing generously over the tops of the cookies."]

title: Borscht I Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely chopped carrots'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped green bell pepper, divided'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'stalk', 'Name': 'celery, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'beet'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'canned peeled and diced tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'potatoes, quartered'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'canned tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'finely shredded cabbage, divided'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'diced potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'dried dill weed'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Place water, salt, carrots, 1/2 of the bell pepper, celery, beet, tomatoes, and quartered potatoes in a large stock pot over high heat. Bring to a boil.', 'Melt 1/3 cup butter in a separate skillet over medium heat. Saute onions in butter until tender, approximately 5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, reduce heat to medium low, and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove 1/2 cup of sauce from skillet, and set aside. Stir half of the cabbage into the skillet with remaining sauce, and continue simmering 5 minutes more, or until tender.', 'Remove beet from boiling liquid and discard. Remove potatoes with a slotted spoon or tongs, and place in a bowl with remaining 1 tablespoon of butter and the cream. Mash together until smooth.', 'Return the 1/2 cup of reserved onion-tomato sauce to the stock pot. Stir in diced potatoes, and simmer until just tender but still firm, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to a low boil, and stir in remaining cabbage, tomato sauce, and mashed potatoes. Reduce heat and simmer a few minutes more. Stir in remaining bell pepper, season with black pepper, and serve.']

title: Cheater Pierogi
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '50 pierogi'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'bacon, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'bacon drippings'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and halved'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'large egg'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'farmer’s cheese, or any cheese blend'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'large egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '50', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'wonton wrappers, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh chives'}]
directions: ['Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chopped bacon and onions; cook and stir until the bacon is crisp and the onions are browned, 6 to 8 minutes. Remove bacon and onions to a small dish, reserving about 2 tablespoons of the bacon fat for frying the pierogi.', "Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain and mash until smooth. Allow to cool for 10 minutes. Season with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Stir in 1 egg and farmer's cheese. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes.", 'Beat 1 egg with 1 tablespoon water in a bowl for the egg wash.', 'Place 2 to 3 wonton wrappers at a time on a lightly floured work surface. Brush the edges lightly with the egg wash. Place about 2 tablespoons of filling in the center of each wrapper. Fold each pierogi in half and lightly press the edges together to seal.', 'Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and cook pierogi in the boiling water until they float, 2 to 3 minutes. Drain.', 'Transfer pierogi to the skillet with reserved bacon drippings in batches and cook over medium heat until lightly browned, about 2 minutes per side. Transfer to a bowl, toss with the bacon and onions, and serve garnished with sour cream and chives.']

title: Ground Beef Stroganoff Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'extra-lean (94%) ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'sliced fresh mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry white wine'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10.75 ounce) can', 'Name': "fat-free condensed cream of mushroom soup (such as Campbell's®)"}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fat-free sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cooked egg noodles'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.', 'Spray a large nonstick skillet with cooking spray and set over medium-high heat. Add cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, and mustard.', 'Put cooked noodles in a large bowl and pour beef mixture over; toss to coat. title: Russian Potato Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '10 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'Name': 'turkey hot dogs'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'dill pickles, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'Name': 'baby peas, drained'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}]

title: Vegetarian Borscht Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'beets, peeled and coarsely grated'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, coarsely grated'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry yellow lentils'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'medium head', 'Name': 'cabbage, shredded'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled and diced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sour cream, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh dill'}]

title: Beef Stroganoff with Ground Beef Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced fresh mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'lean ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'seasoning salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground paprika'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10.75 ounce) can', 'Name': 'condensed cream of mushroom soup'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'liquid smoke, or to taste (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}]

title: Classic Beef Stroganoff in a Slow Cooker Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs 25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'beef top round steak, cut into 1/4-inch strips'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'sliced fresh mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried dill'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour (spooned and leveled)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fat-free reduced-sodium beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'Name': 'reduced-fat sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'hot cooked egg noodles'}]

title: Vareniki (Pierogi) with Potatoes and Mushrooms Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '45'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '45 vareniki'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '18', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onions, finely diced'}, {'Quantity': '3 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'finely chopped button mushrooms'}]
directions: ['Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 25 minutes. Cook for 2 to 3 minutes more. Remove with a slotted spoon and place in a colander to drain.']

title: Cold Russian Borscht Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'beets'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'red wine vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cucumber - peeled, seeded, and diced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}]
directions: ['Remove stems and leaves from beets, but leave on skins. Cover beets with cold water and bring to a boil in a deep pot. Boil until fork tender, about 40 minutes.', 'Drain beets, but reserve two cups of the liquid. Strain the liquid and add to a large saucepan. Remove skin from beets. Grate beets through the most coarse blade of a grater. Add to beet liquid. Add beef broth, onion, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil, and then cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes, then remove from the heat.', 'Chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour, or until cold, before serving. Ladle into bowls and top each serving with cucumber and a big spoonful of sour cream.']

title: Russian Cheese Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded mozzarella cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}]
directions: ['Stir mozzarella cheese, mayonnaise, and garlic together in a bowl. Chill in the refrigerator until serving.']

title: Russian Beet and Potato Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'beets'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'carrots'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'dill pickles, diced'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'champagne vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, chopped'}]
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a boil; add beets and cook until tender, about 30 minutes. Drain beets; cool and remove skins. Dice and place in a large bowl.', 'Meanwhile, bring a separate pot of water to a boil; add potatoes and carrots and cook until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain potatoes and carrots; cool and remove skins. Dice and place vegetables in the same large bowl.', 'Add diced pickles to the bowl with vegetables. Drizzle in oil and vinegar; toss to coat. Season with salt; sprinkle with green onions. Chill completely before serving.']

title: Russian Cabbage Rolls with Gravy Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 cabbage rolls'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium head', 'Name': 'cabbage'}, {'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water, divided'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'uncooked white rice'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onions, chopped, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground beef'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'ground pork'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, grated'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried mixed herbs, or as needed (Optional)'}]
directions: ['Make slits in cabbage base or cut out entire core. Fill a large saucepan 1/3 full of water; bring to a boil. Cook whole cabbage in boiling water, turning occasionally, until softened, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain and cool. Cut cabbage leaves off cabbage one by one, trying to keep them intact. Cut out any tough, thick center ribs of the large leaves with a sharp knife.', 'Bring 1 1/2 cups water and rice to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a skillet. Cook 1/2 of the onions in hot oil until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl. Add cooked rice, ground beef, ground pork, salt, and pepper to onions in the bowl; mix with your hands until filling is well combined.', 'Lay 1 cabbage leaf on a flat surface. Place 1 tablespoon filling at the base of a cabbage leaf. Overlap with the bottom of the leaf; fold in side edges and roll up. Repeat with remaining cabbage and filling.', 'Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat and fry cabbage rolls in hot oil until browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Transfer to a large pot and sprinkle with remaining onion and grated carrots.', 'Stir together tomato paste and sour cream in a medium bowl until well combined. Whisk in 1 cup water; season with salt and herbs. Pour over cabbage rolls.', 'Cover the pot and cook over medium-low heat until cabbage rolls are cooked through and sauce has thickened, about 45 minutes.']

title: Kulich (Russian Easter Cake) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '12 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '13 hrs 45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 kulich'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'golden raisins'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vodka'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'saffron threads'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'lukewarm water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(.25 ounce) package', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'lemon'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, melted'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'orange blossom honey'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced almonds'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter, softened'}]
directions: ['Make the kulich: Place raisins into a bowl, drizzle with vodka, and let soften, 8 hours to overnight.', 'Heat milk in a saucepan over medium-low heat until very warm but not simmering. Stir in cardamom and saffron threads. Remove from the heat and let stand until lukewarm.', 'Meanwhile, mix 1 teaspoon sugar into lukewarm water in a bowl until sugar dissolves. Stir in yeast and let stand until frothy, about 10 minutes.', 'Transfer yeast mixture to a large mixing bowl. Add milk mixture, 1 cup flour, and 1/2 cup sugar; beat until smooth. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let dough rise in a warm place for 1 hour.', 'Zest lemon onto waxed paper. Juice lemon into another small bowl and reserve for the frosting. Separate egg whites and yolks, reserving 1 egg white for the frosting.', 'Mix remaining 1/2 cup sugar, melted butter, honey, vanilla, lemon zest, and salt together in a bowl. Pour into the risen dough and beat until combined. Beat in 3 egg yolks and 2 egg whites.', 'Mix in 2 1/2 cups flour. Sprinkle remaining 1/2 cup flour onto a work surface and knead dough until it holds together, about 5 minutes. Knead soaked raisins and sliced almonds into dough until well distributed.', 'Form dough into a ball and place into an oiled bowl; turn in the bowl several times until coated with oil. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 1/2 hours.', 'Coat the insides of four clean 14-ounce cans with remaining 1 tablespoon butter. Line cans with parchment paper.', 'Punch down dough, knead a few times, then divide into four equal pieces. Roll each piece of dough into a ball, place into a can, and press dough lightly against the inside bottom of the can. Cover the cans with a cloth and let dough rise to the top of the cans, about 45 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Place a baking sheet into the preheated oven. Place the cans of dough upright onto the baking sheet and bake until kulich are risen and lightly browned, 45 to 50 minutes.', 'Remove from the oven and let cool in the cans for about 15 minutes, then gently remove from the cans and finish cooling on a wire rack, 25 to 40 minutes.', "Make the frosting: Beat reserved egg white in a bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until frothy. Beat in confectioners' sugar until stiff peaks form. Beat in 1 teaspoon reserved lemon juice; save remaining lemon juice for another use.", 'Frost tops of the cooled kulich and sprinkle with toasted almonds.']

title: Pashka Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '8 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '10'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) packages', 'Name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'Name': 'cottage cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, melted'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'finely chopped blanched almonds'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'currants'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon extract'}]
directions: ['Blend cream cheese, cottage cheese, sour cream, and butter together in a medium bowl until thoroughy combined.', 'Gradually fold in sugar, almonds, currants, vanilla, and lemon extract. Transfer to a shallow medium dish. Cover with a cloth and chill in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight.']

title: Solianka (Russian Beef Soup) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, divided'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onions, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cooked diced veal'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'diced ham'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'quarts', 'Name': 'beef stock'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaves'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'black peppercorns'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'marinated mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'dill pickles, diced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'capers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(28 ounce) can', 'Name': 'Italian-style whole peeled tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'kalamata olives'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh dill weed'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dill pickle juice'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Hungarian sweet paprika'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried marjoram'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Soak mushrooms in water in a small bowl until tender, 20 to 30 minutes. Drain mushrooms, reserving soaking water.', 'Melt 1/4 cup butter in a large pot over medium-high heat. Sauté onions, veal, ham, sausage, and rehydrated mushrooms in melted butter. Add stock and mushroom water; bring to a boil.', 'Make a bouquet garni by tying bay leaves and peppercorns tightly in cheesecloth. Add bouquet garni, marinated mushrooms, pickles, and capers to soup. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Melt remaining 1/4 cup butter in a skillet. Add tomatoes and tomato paste and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, then add flour and cook for 2 to 3 more minutes. Stir 1 cup soup into the skillet, then pour mixture back into the soup pot.', 'Add olives, dill, pickle juice, garlic, paprika, and marjoram. Season with salt and black pepper; simmer for 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Remove the pot from heat and discard bouquet garni. Adjust seasonings and garnish servings with dollops of sour cream and lemon slices.']

title: Russian Green Bean and Potato Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'onion, halved and thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red potatoes, cubed'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'green beans, cut into 1 inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'vegetable, chicken, or beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'whole wheat flour'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sauerkraut with juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped fresh dill'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Salt and pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Heat vegetable oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in the onion, and gently cook until softened and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the potatoes and green beans; cook until the green beans have slightly softened, about 5 more minutes.', 'Pour in the vegetable stock. Bring to a boil over high heat, then lower heat to medium-low, cover, and cook until the potatoes have softened, about 15 minutes. Stir the flour into the sour cream, and add it a spoonful at a time to the simmering soup. Stir in the sauerkraut and dill, season to taste with salt and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes more before serving.']

title: Russian Beet Salad with Herring Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '20'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '10 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'unpeeled beets, tops and bottoms removed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'carrots, peeled'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole unpeeled russet potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(12 ounce) jar', 'Name': 'herring fillets, packed in oil'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper, to taste'}]
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add beets, carrots, and potatoes, cooking until crisp-tender, following these approximate doneness times: 40 minutes for beets, 25 to 30 minutes for carrots, 15 to 20 minutes for potatoes, removing from water as they become done.', 'Cool slightly. Remove and discard skins from beets and potatoes. Grate beets, carrots, and potatoes, keeping them separate.', 'Arrange 1/2 of the onions and 1/2 of the herring in a layer in a large bowl. Arrange 1/2 of the potatoes, 1/2 of the carrots, and 1/2 of the beets on top of onions and herring. Spread 3 tablespoons of mayonnaise over salad. Season with salt and pepper. Repeat layers to finish building salad.', 'Cover with plastic wrap and chill in the refrigerator at least 1 hour. Serve cold.']

title: Oladi (Russian Kefir Pancakes) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'plain kefir'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}]
directions: ['Whisk 1 cup plus 3 tablespoons flour, kefir, egg, sugar, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl to make a batter.', 'Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Heat oil in the skillet. Pour 1 to 2 tablespoons of batter into the skillet for each pancake. Cook until bubbles form on surface, 2 to 3 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on the other side, 2 to 3 minutes more. Repeat with remaining batter.']

title: The Best Classic Beef Stroganoff Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'beef tenderloin'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'clove', 'Name': 'garlic, cut in half'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10.5 ounce) can', 'Name': 'condensed cream of chicken soup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}]
directions: ['Mix flour, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Pound mixture into the beef. Cut beef into 1/2-inch strips.', 'Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add beef; cook until browned, about 10 minutes. Remove meat with a slotted spoon, transfer to a covered container, and refrigerate while you make the gravy; do not wash the pan.', 'Stir water, onion, and garlic into the pan. Cook and stir over medium heat until all of the brown bits have been scraped from the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes. Add mushrooms and stir in condensed soup. Cook until mushrooms are tender, about 20 minutes.', 'Mix beef and gravy in a pot over medium heat until hot but not boiling, about 5 minutes. Add sour cream and serve.']

title: Beef Stroganoff with Noodles Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'beef stew meat, cut into 1/2-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'bacon, cut into 1/4-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'strips', 'Name': 'celery, diced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'seasoning salt'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'beef broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'dry egg noodles'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(4 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'sliced mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cold water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) container', 'Name': 'sour cream'}]
directions: ['In a large Dutch oven heat oil over high heat and brown cubed stew meat. Remove from pan. In the same pan, sauté bacon, onion, and celery until onions are translucent and bacon is fully cooked. Return browned stew meat to the pan.', 'Stir in seasoning salt, Worcestershire sauce, and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then cover and reduce the heat to medium. Simmer for 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until meat is fork tender.', 'Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add egg noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.', 'In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat and sauté mushrooms for 3 to 4 minutes. Add mushrooms to meat mixture.', 'Bring meat mixture to a boil. Mix together cornstarch and water, and stir into meat mixture; stirring constantly. Stir in sour cream until creamy serve over egg noodles.']

title: Vatrushka Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '3 hrs 55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '12 vatrushka'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': '(.25 ounce) packages', 'Name': 'active dry yeast'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'lukewarm milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, melted'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}]
directions: ['Dissolve yeast and 1 pinch sugar in warm milk in a bowl. Let stand until yeast softens and begins to form a creamy foam, 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Sift flour into a large bowl; make a well in the centre. Add yeast mixture, butter, salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, egg, and 2 tablespoons sugar. Mix gently until a dough forms.', 'Transfer to a floured surface and knead until dough becomes pliable and is no longer sticky, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a greased bowl. Cover bowl with a damp kitchen towel and leave in a warm place until doubled, 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Punch down dough, cover, and leave until doubled again, about 1 hour.', 'Grease a baking sheet with oil.', 'Divide dough into 4 equal parts. Cut each part into 3 equal pieces. Roll each piece of dough into a ball and arrange on the prepared baking sheet. Flatten each piece lightly and let rise for 20 minutes.', "Combine farmer's cheese, egg, 2 tablespoons sugar, sour cream, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract in a bowl for the filling.", 'Use a water glass to press an indention for the filling in the center of each dough piece. Spoon filling into the indention and brush with egg yolk. Repeat with remaining dough pieces and filling. Cover and let rise for 20 to 25 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Bake in the preheated oven until golden, 15 to 20 minutes.']

title: Ukha (Russian Fish Soup) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'potatoes, cubed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh parsley, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'cod fillets, cubed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Put water in a large saucepan and bring to a boil over high heat. Add the potatoes, onion and parsley. Heat for 10 to 15 minutes and add the fish. Heat for 10 more minutes, then squeeze in lemon juice and season with salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Easy Russian Mushroom Bake Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '7', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'quartered button mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'shredded Gouda cheese'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a skillet over medium heat. Increase heat to high and add mushrooms. Cook and stir until golden brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Do not cook so long so that they begin to release a lot of liquid. Add sour cream, mix well, and transfer mixture to a casserole dish.', 'Heat remaining 2 tablespoons oil in a second skillet over medium heat and cook onion until soft and translucent, 4 to 6 minutes. Distribute onions over mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with Gouda cheese.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese has melted and is golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes.']

title: Russian Chicken Stew with Potatoes and Vegetables Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '26 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '46 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast, cubed'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'potatoes, peeled and cubed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrot, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'water to cover'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh parsley, chopped'}]
directions: ['Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add chicken and brown on all sides, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, carrot, and onion; cook and stir until vegetables begin to soften, 6 to 8 minutes.', 'Stir tomato paste into the saucepan and season with salt and pepper. Pour enough water to cover and continue to simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center and vegetables are tender, about 15 minutes. Garnish with fresh parsley.']

title: Sauerkraut Russian-Style Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '5 days'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '5 days 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '16'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '1 gallon'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'shredded cabbage'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, grated'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(1 liter) bottle', 'Name': 'spring water'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}]
directions: ['Combine cabbage and carrots in a large (at least 1 gallon) ceramic or glass jar.', 'Stir salt into spring water in a large bowl or measuring cup until dissolved. Add to cabbage mixture to cover (cabbage mixture should be completely submerged); place a small inverted saucer on top to keep it submerged.', 'Cover jar with a clean kitchen towel. Leave on counter at room temperature for 3 days; poke holes through cabbage mixture to bottom of jar with the handle of a wooden spoon to help gas escape, once a day, for 3 days.', 'Add a small amount of liquid from jar to a small bowl; stir in sugar until dissolved. Return liquid to jar.', 'Cover jar, making sure cabbage mixture submerged. Leave on counter for 2 more days; poke holes into mixture to help trapped gasses escape, once a day, for 2 days.', 'Transfer sauerkraut and liquid to smaller jars, seal, and refrigerate between uses.']

title: Russian Carrot Salad (Korean-Style) Recipe
