title: Best Smoked Salmon Dip
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '32'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'smoked salmon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8-ounce)', 'Name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onion, finely chopped, plus more for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'capers, drained'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fresh dill, plus more for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt-free Creole seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'crackers and crostini, for serving'}]
directions: ['Flake smoked salmon with a fork.', 'Beat together cream cheese and mayonnaise in a large bowl with an electric mixer at medium speed until smooth. Add red onion, green onion, capers, lemon juice, dill, and Creole seasoning; mix well. Gently fold in smoked salmon.', 'Chill in an airtight container at least 2 hours (and up to 3 days). Garnish with additional dill and green onions. Serve with crackers and crostini.']

title: Lobster-Vanilla Bean Bisque Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'sprigs', 'Name': 'fresh tarragon,'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'sprigs', 'Name': 'thym,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'bay leaf'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '(4 to 6-ounce)', 'Name': 'lobster tails'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'celery, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cloves garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'flour'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': ''}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'half-and-half'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vanilla bean paste'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}]
directions: ['Fill a large bowl with ice water. Bring 6 cups water, tarragon, thyme, bay leaf, and salt to a boil in a 6- to 8-quart pot over medium-high heat. Add lobster tails. Return to a boil; reduce heat to medium. Simmer until shells turn bright red and meat is tender, 6 to 10 minutes. Remove tails and immediately plunge into the ice water.', 'When cool enough to handle, remove meat from shells (see “Lobster Prep,” below). Return shells to pot. Simmer, covered, over medium heat to develop flavor, about 30 minutes. Stock may turn a green color from the herbs.', 'Meanwhile, coarsely chop lobster meat. Chill, covered, until ready to use (up to 3 days).', 'Strain 4 cups of the stock through a fine-mesh sieve into a large glass measuring cup; discard solids.', 'Melt butter in the same pot over medium heat. Cook onion, carrots, and celery, stirring frequently, until tender, about 10 minutes. Stir in garlic; cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.', 'Stir in flour to coat vegetables. Add wine and tomato paste. Cook, stirring frequently, until mixture is combined. Stir in stock; cook over medium-high heat until mixture is bubbly. Cook mixture, stirring frequently, 2 minutes more.', 'Stir in lobster meat, half-and-half, vanilla bean paste, and cayenne. Cook until heated through, about 2 minutes. Garnish servings with fresh tarragon and thyme.']

title: Spring Roll Bowl Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'vermicelli noodles'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'large shrimp -'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'head', 'Name': 'butterhead lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, peeled and julienned'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'nglish cucumber, julienned'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'avocado, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, sliced on a bias'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'mint leaves (or torn large leaves)'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'salted peanuts'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Cook vermicelli noodles according to package directions. Run under cold water to cool. Divide noodles among four bowls.', 'Add one fourth\xa0of the cooked shrimp to each bowl. On the side of the noodles arrange 1 cup of lettuce, 1/4\xa0 cup carrots, 1/4\xa0 cup cucumber, and 1/4\xa0 an avocado to each bowl.', 'Meanwhile for Nam Chom combine rice vinegar, fish sauce, lime juice, ginger, and birds eye chile (optional) in a small bowl.', 'For the peanut sauce combine peanut butter, coconut milk, hoisin sauce, lime juice, peanuts and sambal oelec in a small bowl; whisk until smooth.', 'Top bowls with green onions, mint leaves and peanuts. Serve with peanut sauce and/or Nam Choc.']

title: Copycat Red Lobster Shrimp Scampi Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'jumbo shrimp (12 to 16 per pound), peeled and deveined'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'pinot grigio'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'melted butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'pinch of salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper flakes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'shredded Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chopped parsley, for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon wedges, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven’s broiler to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).', 'Place shrimp in a pinwheel fashion in an oven-safe dish, such as a glass pie plate.', 'Stir pinot grigio, melted butter, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and crushed red pepper flakes together in a cup.', 'Poor mixture over shrimp. Sprinkle Parmesan over shrimp.', 'Broil until shrimp is pink and tails curl inward, about 7 minutes.', 'Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve with lemon wedges.']

title: Tuna Melt Nachos Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(5.5 ounce) jar', 'Name': 'tuna packed in olive oil,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'rib celery'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}]
directions: ['Break up tuna in a bowl with a fork into small flakes. Add celery, black pepper, cayenne, and mayonnaise. Mix well, cover, and refrigerate until needed.', 'Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). Line a sheet pan with foil, and space chips out evenly on the pan. Top each chip with a generous rounded teaspoon tuna salad.', 'Place a jalapeno ring on top of tuna, followed by a slice of tomato, pressing down lightly as you do. Top with cheese, piling it as high as possible in the middle of each nacho. Use any extra cheese to cover exposed areas of chips.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and the edges of chips are turning golden brown, 5 to 8 minutes. Alternately, preheat the oven’s broiler and broil nachos for just a few minutes until cheese melts and chip edges are golden.', 'Scatter green onions over the top, and serve immediately.']

title: Shrimp Ramen Stir Fry Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '1'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'oyster sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili crisp,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'grapeseed oil'}]
directions: ['For sauce, add soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, chili crisp, and garlic to a small bowl. Heat grapeseed oil in a small saucepan. Carefully pour heated oil into the bowl; set sauce aside.', 'Heat remaining 1 teaspoon sesame oil in a wok or heavy skillet. Add broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, and onion. Sauté until vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Add garlic and stir until fragrant, about 35 seconds. Pour in sauce, and add shrimp. Cook for approximately 2 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, open ramen package; discard seasoning packet. Bring 2½ cups water to a boil in a small saucepan. Add noodles and cook for 2 minutes. Drain; stir noodles into the wok; toss to coat. Garnish with black and white sesame seeds, and chopped green onion.']

title: Mediterranean Baked Fish Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'onion'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes,'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'dried Italian herb seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper flakes'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'olives'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'fish fillets'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooked rice or pasta (optional)'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh parsley for garnish (optional)'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in an oven-safe nonstick skillet over medium heat. When oil shimmers, add onions and cook, stirring frequently, until onions are translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Stir in garlic, and cook, stirring, about 30 seconds.', 'Add cherry tomatoes and wine, and season with salt and pepper. Add 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning and red pepper flakes. Toss to combine, and cook about 1 minute. Remove from heat and stir in sliced olives, chopped spinach, and cream.', 'Nestle fillets into vegetable mixture, sprinkle each fillet with salt and pepper, and drizzle remaining olive oil over the entire dish. Brush the olive oil to cover the surface of each fillet. Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).', 'Serve with hot, cooked pasta or rice, and garnish with fresh parsley.']

title: Seafood Paella Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow onion, diced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell peppers, diced'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chorizo'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'dried red chili pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'tomato paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'garlic cloves,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'saffron'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'rice (short grain or paella rice)'}, {'Quantity': '3 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken stock'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'jumbo shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'mussels'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'clams'}]
directions: ['Place a medium-sized paella pan over medium-high heat, and add oil, onion, bell pepper, chorizo, and dried chili and cook until vegetables soften, about 3 minutes.', 'Using a box grater, grate tomatoes straight into the pan. Stir and cook until liquid has reduced by half.', 'Reduce heat to low, and add tomato paste, white wine, garlic, saffron, and paprika. Cook paste mixture down, stirring, until fully incorporated.', 'Add rice and chicken stock and stir until everything is all mixed in. Simmer over low heat, without stirring, for 15 minutes. Every now and then, peek with a spoon to make sure nothing is sticking or burning while simmering.', 'After 15 minutes add shrimp, mussels, and clams. Cover with a lid or foil and cook on low for another 5 minutes. Turn off heat and let the pan sit for 5 minutes.', 'Remove the lid. The rice should be fluffy with a slightly toasted bottom, mussels and clams should be open all of the way, and your shrimp should be pink. Fluff paella with a fork before serving.']

title: Smoked Mackerel, Beets, Apples, and Bread Crisps Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'pumpernickel bread, torn into bite- sized pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper, plus more for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'yogurt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'cider vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(4.2-ounce)', 'Name': 'oil-packed smoked mackerel,'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8-ounce)', 'Name': "beets (such as Melissa's), drained and chopped"}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'apple, cored and diced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh dill, for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon zest and lemon wedges,'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).', 'Toss bread with oil and 1/4 teaspoon pepper on a 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet. Spread into an even layer. Bake, stirring halfway through, until crisp, about 12 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for sauce, whisk together yogurt, lemon juice, vinegar, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a small bowl. Serve bread, smoked mackerel, beets, and apple with sauce. Garnish with dill and additional black pepper. Serve with lemon zest and wedges.']

title: Mango Shrimp Ceviche Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cucumber'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pint', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'jalapeno pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh mango'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, juiced,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Tajin®)'}]
directions: ['Combine shrimp, cucumber, tomatoes, jalapeno, mango, lime juice, cilantro, and Tajin seasoning in a large bowl. Taste; add more Tajin if needed.', 'For more flavor, cover and refrigerate for 1 hour (optional).']

title: Harvest Salmon Bowls Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '(6 ounce)', 'Name': 'salmon filets'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'spicy brown mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'maple syrup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'apple cider vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic,'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'head', 'Name': 'broccoli'}, {'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Brussels sprouts'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cooked quinoa'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'feta cheese, crumbled'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped pistachios'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'In a small bowl combine mustard, honey, and lemon juice; set aside.', 'Combine olive oil, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, garlic, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Add in broccoli and Brussels sprouts; toss until coated. Spread evenly onto the prepared sheet pan.', 'Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove pan from oven, toss vegetables, and spread out again. Place salmon filets onto sheet pan with vegetables, skin side down. Brush salmon with mustard mixture', 'Return to the oven; roast until fish flakes easily with a fork, 12 to 15 minutes.', 'Place 1 cup quinoa and a salmon filet in each serving bowl. Evenly divide vegetables into bowls and top with feta cheese, cranberries, and pistachios.']

title: Coconut Curry Salmon with Broccoli Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '(6 ounce)', 'Name': 'salmon filets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'curry powder,'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shallots'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes,'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Thai red curry paste, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'can', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'broccoli florets'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'green onions'}]
directions: ['Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and brush with 1 tablespoon cooking oil. Preheat the oven’s broiler.', 'Pat salmon filets dry with paper towels and place on the prepared pan, skin side down. Brush filets with remaining 1 tablespoon oil.', 'Season filets with curry powder, and season lightly with salt and pepper. Drizzle honey over the filets, and place under the broiler. Broil until just crisp on top, 3 to 5 minutes. Watch carefully; honey may burn easily. Remove from oven and keep warm.', 'For coconut curry sauce, melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add shallots and cook about 1 minute, then add garlic and ginger, and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds more,', 'Stir in red pepper flakes and Thai red curry paste and cook about 3 minutes. Stir in coconut milk, soy sauce, and fish sauce; bring to a simmer. Add broccoli florets and cook until crisp-tender, about 3 minutes.', 'Add salmon filets to the skillet and simmer until fish flakes easily with a fork, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Squeeze 1/2 lime over the skillet. Garnish with chopped chives or green onions, and serve.']

title: Low Country Shrimp and Potato Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'celery'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'yellow mustard'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pickle relish'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'seafood boil seasoning (such as Old Bay®)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'green onions,'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['For dressing, combine dd celery, green onions, garlic, mayonnaise, yellow mustard, white vinegar, pickle relish, 2 tablespoons Old Bay, smoked paprika, and onion powder in a large bowl, and whisk until smooth. Stir in sliced scallions. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to assemble salad.', 'For salad, fill a large pot with 2 quarts water, lemons, garlic cloves, and 1/2 cup Old Bay seasoning and bring to a boil on medium heat.', 'Add potatoes, and boil potatoes in broth for 10 minutes. Add eggs and shrimp. Turn off heat, cover the pot, and let sit for 10 minutes.', 'Remove shrimp, potatoes, and eggs to a baking sheet using a slotted spoon to cool. Peel eggs when cool enough to handle, and set aside until ready to use.', 'Stir potatoes into the dressing. Now break peeled eggs into the potato mixture and stir together until fully mixed. Stir in shrimp. Wrap bowl and refrigerate until ready to serve.']

title: Mussels with Chorizo Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'mussels'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallot, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'poblano pepper, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1//2', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'fresh ground chorizo'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'pepper paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'Name': 'tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'seafood stock'}]
directions: ['Soak, clean, and debeard mussels (see Note).', 'Heat oil in a Dutch oven or cast iron skillet. Add shallots, poblano peppers, and garlic. Stir until fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Add chorizo; cook and stir until browned and crumbly. 5 to 7 minutes. Stir in panca pepper paste. Add roasted tomatoes and stock. Bring to a boil.', 'Reduce heat and bring broth to a simmer. Add mussels; cover and cook until shells open, about 5 minutes.']

title: Grilled Halibut Foil Packs Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(12x18 inch) pieces', 'Name': 'heavy duty aluminum foil'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooking spray'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'zucchini'}, {'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'corn kernels'}, {'Quantity': '4 to 6', 'Unit': 'thin slices', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(7 ounce)', 'Name': 'halibut filets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Italian herb seasoning blend'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'thin s', 'Name': 'lemon'}, {'Quantity': '4 to 6', 'Unit': 'sprigs', 'Name': 'fresh thyme'}]
directions: ['Preheat an outdoor grill to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Spray each foil sheet with olive oil cooking spray. Layer 2 onion slices, 1/2 of the zucchini, 1/2 of the cherry tomatoes, and 1/2 of the corn in the center of each of the foil squares. Scatter 1/2 the garlic over each pack, and season lightly with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper.', 'Pat halibut filets dry with paper towels, and add a filet to each packet. Brush each filet with a thin layer of mayonnaise, season lightly with sea salt and pepper, and sprinkle with Italian seasoning.', 'Drizzle 1 tablespoon dry white wine over each packet. Place two slices of lemon on top of each filet, and scatter thyme sprigs over the contents of each packet.', 'Bring edges of foil together, fold edges over twice, and press tightly along the folds to seal. Leave a bit of space inside the packet, to allow for steam.', 'Place packets directly on the preheated grill grates, close the lid, and grill about 10 minutes per inch of the filet thickness. Remove packs from the grill and allow to rest about 5 minutes. An instant read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of fish should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).', 'When ready to serve, place packs on serving plates, and open carefully, because of the steam.']

title: Beetlejuice-Inspired Shrimp Cocktail Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1/2 cup plus 2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'garlic clove'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'poblano pepper, seeded'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'grapeseed or canola oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '6 to 8', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'basil leaves'}]
directions: ['Place shrimp, shells on, in a large bowl. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper and toss.', 'Heat a cast iron skillet over medium heat until hot; add 1 tablespoon olive oil to the skillet.', 'Cook shrimp in the skillet, without crowding, for 3 to 4 minutes on each side. You may have to work in batches. Remove shrimp from skillet and allow to cool.', 'Combine egg, poblano pepper, garlic clove, lime juice, and basil in a food processor and blend until smooth. With processor running, slowly add 1/2 cup grapeseed oil and process until mixture is smooth and thick.', 'Transfer mixture to a bowl and very slowly, a drop or two at a time, whisk in remaining 1/2 cup olive oil by hand. Season with salt and pepper.']

title: Spicy Salmon Roll Shaken Cucumber Salad Recipe

title: Sardine Dip Recipe

title: Grilled Salmon with Chimichurri Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Rest Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallot'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'curly parsley'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'bunch', 'Name': 'fresh cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'sprigs', 'Name': 'fresh dill'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, zested'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes'}]
directions: ['For chimichurri, add garlic and shallot to the bowl of a food processor and pulse 2 or 3 times. Add herbs, lime juice, and vinegar. Blend until finely chopped.', 'With the food processor still running, slowly drizzle in olive oil to emulsify. Add lime zest, salt, and pepper to taste and blend until smooth. Stir in red pepper flakes. Refrigerate until ready to use.', 'Prepare an outdoor grill for direct cooking over high heat, 450 to 550 degrees F (230 to 290 degrees C).', 'Generously coat the flesh side of the salmon fillets with oil and season evenly with granulated garlic, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Grill the salmon, skin side down, over direct high heat for 6 to 8 minutes.', 'Turn the salmon over, close the lid, and cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, 4 to 6 minutes longer. Transfer to a platter to rest for 1 to 2 minutes. Slide the salmon skin from the fillets and serve with chimichurri.']

title: Italian Style No Mayo Tuna Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '15-ounce)', 'Name': 'can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'tomato, seeded and diced'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'kalamata olives'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red onion'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped celery'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'capers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped parsley'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'red wine vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic powder'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried oregano'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(5-ounce) cans', 'Name': 'yellowfin tuna'}]
directions: ['Combine cannellini beans, tomato, olives, red onion, celery, olive oil, capers, parsley, red wine vinegar, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and oregano in a large bowl; stir until mixed together.\xa0Crumble tuna into bowl and toss to combine.']

title: Smoked Salmon Breakfast Casserole Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '12'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'rye bagels'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'Swiss or provolone cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'smoked salmon'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole milk'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sour cream'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fresh dill'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'capers and lemon wedges, for serving'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Coat a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.', 'Spread half of the toasted bagel pieces in prepared dish. Top with 1 1/2 cups Swiss cheese, the cream cheese, and smoked salmon. Top with remaining bagel pieces.', 'Whisk together eggs, milk, sour cream, and dill in a bowl. Pour over mixture in baking dish. Press bagel pieces with the back of a spoon to coat in egg mixture.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup cheese. Bake 5 to 10 minutes more, until set and an instant-read thermometer inserted into center of casserole registers 160 degrees F (71 degrees C). Let stand about 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with additional dill and serve with capers, lemon wedges, and/or additional sour cream.']

title: Oysters Casino Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '24 oysters'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'thick-cut bacon, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'shallot', 'Name': 'shallot'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'green bell pepper,'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'seeded and finely chopped red Fresno chile'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'unsalted butter, softened'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'grated lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'dozen', 'Name': 'oysters on the half shell'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon wedges for serving'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C), and line 2 rimmed baking sheets with aluminum foil. Crumble another layer of foil on each baking sheet, forming a total of 24 small cups to place the oysters on to prevent them from tipping over.', 'Place bacon in a large nonstick skillet, and cook over medium, stirring occasionally, until bacon is starting to brown but not quite crisp, about 5 minutes. Transfer bacon to a paper towel-lined plate, reserving 1 tablespoon drippings in skillet.', 'Heat drippings in skillet over medium. Add shallot, bell pepper, and chile; cook, stirring often, until slightly softened, about 1 minute. Transfer to a small bowl, and refrigerate, uncovered, until slightly cooled, about 5 minutes.', 'Stir together butter, cooled shallot mixture, parsley, lemon zest, and salt in a medium bowl until blended; set aside.', 'Arrange oysters, cupped sides down, in a single layer in the prepared foil cups. Spoon about 1 teaspoon of the butter mixture on top of each oyster, and top evenly with bacon pieces.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is crisp and butter is bubbling, about 10 minutes.', 'Using tongs, carefully transfer oysters to an oyster serving platter or onto a serving platter covered with rock salt to prevent oysters from tipping over. Squeeze lemon wedges over oysters. Serve immediately.']

title: Shrimp and Bacon Pasta Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'pasta'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'bacon'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'cooked shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'yellow bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cucumber'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh peach'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Cajun seasoning'}]
directions: ['Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Stir in pasta and return to a boil. Cook, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 minutes, or according to package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water, and let cool to room temperature, about 20 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels. Crumble when cool enough to handle.', 'Combine pasta, shrimp, bacon, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, cucumber, green onions, mayonnaise, olive oil, cherry tomatoes, and peach in a large bowl and mix well. Taste and season with Cajun seasoning.', 'Refrigerate until ready to serve.']

title: Sheet Pan Halibut with Orange and Fennel Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'fennel,'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'garlic'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'talian seasoning, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper, divided'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '4 ounce', 'Name': 'halibut filets'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'orange, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh parsley, for garnish'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a 10x15-inch baking pan with foil.', 'Spread fennel in an even layer on the prepared pan. Drizzle with 2 teaspoons oil. Sprinkle with garlic, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, and 1/8 teaspoon each salt and pepper.', 'Roast fennel until starting to soften, about 10 minutes.', 'Add halibut to pan and drizzle with remaining 1 teaspoon oil. Season with remaining 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning and 1/8 teaspoon each salt and pepper. Top with orange slices.', 'Roast until fennel is tender and fish flakes easily with a fork, 8 to 12 minutes. Garnish with parsley.']

title: Tuscan Salmon Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '(5 ounce)', 'Name': 'salmon filets'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '2 or 3', 'Unit': 'short', 'Name': 'rosemary sprigs, plus more for garnish'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'prosciutto'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onion, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1 to 2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'garlic cloves, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon, zested'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cherry tomato halves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(10 ounce) package', 'Name': 'fresh spinach, torn'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'olive oil for drizzling, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon slices'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'pine nuts (optional)'}]
directions: ['Pat salmon filets dry with paper towels and season both sides with salt and pepper.', 'Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat; add olive oil. When butter stops sizzling, swirl the skillet to combine. Add 2 or 3 rosemary sprigs to the skillet, to flavor the oil.', 'Add salmon and cook until salmon is lightly browned and flakes when a fork is gently inserted, about 3 minutes per side. (If salmon filets are thinner than 1 1/2 inches, this may take less time.) An instant read thermometer, inserted near the center, should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Remove from the skillet, and keep warm.', 'To the same skillet with rosemary, add chopped prosciutto, green onion, garlic, red pepper flakes, and lemon zest, and cook for 1 minute or until fragrant.', 'Add white wine and cook until the liquid evaporates. Add tomatoes and cook, stirring, 2 to 3 minutes. Add spinach and toss in the skillet until bright green and barely wilted, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Stir in cream, and season with salt and pepper. Cook until sauce bubbles, about 2 minutes, and remove cooked rosemary sprigs.', 'Serve salmon on a bed of vegetables and sauce, and drizzle with a little olive oil. Garnish with lemon slices, fresh rosemary sprigs, and toasted pine nuts, if desired.']

title: Smoked Whole Snapper Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(1 pound)', 'Name': 'snapper'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'limes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Cajun seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cloves garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup chopped', 'Name': 'fresh parsley'}]
directions: ['Heat the smoker to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Pat fish dry; cut 3 small slits on each side of fish and stuff with lime slices. In a small bowl combine olive oil, Cajun seasoning, garlic, and parley. Coat fish with mixture.', 'Smoke fish until it flakes easily with a fork, about 25 minutes. An instant read thermometer, inserted near the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Garnish with lime wedges to serve.']

title: Salmon Caesar Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce)', 'Name': 'salmon filet'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}]
directions: ['Set a nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Heat 2 teaspoons oil until it shimmers. Add salmon, skin side down. Brush with honey; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover and cook for 4 minutes.', 'Carefully flip salmon and reduce the heat to medium. Continue cooking until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 5 minutes more. Remove salmon to a plate or container; cover and refrigerate until very cold, at least 2 hours.', 'For dressing, crack an egg into a food processor. Add lemon juice, Worcestershire, Dijon, garlic, anchovies, grated Parmesan and black pepper; pulse to combine. With food processor running, drizzle in oil until mixture emulsifies. Refrigerate dressing until needed.', 'For croutons, melt butter in a heavy skillet over medium-high heat. Add bread cubes; sprinkle with Italian seasoning and granulated garlic.', 'Toast until croutons are browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat; set aside.', 'For salad, add lettuce to a large bowl. Flake salmon with a fork into bite-sized pieces and add to the bowl. Drizzle with Caesar dressing; top with croutons and shaved Parmesan.']

title: Smoked Salmon Dip Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '20'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '2 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese,'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'smoked salmon, diced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh dill'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lemon, zested'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'capers'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'red onion'}]
directions: ['Stir cream cheese, salmon, dill, lemon zest, lemon juice, capers, and red onion together in a large bowl until well blended. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. Garnish with additional dill, if desired.']

title: Air Fryer Po' Boy Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 sandwiches'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chopped fresh tarragon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) package', 'Name': 'shredded coleslaw mix'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'buttermilk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'hot pepper sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground dried chipotle pepper'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'large shrimp - peeled, deveined, and tails removed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'whole wheat panko bread crumbs'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '(6 inch)', 'Name': 'whole-wheat hoagie rolls, split and toasted'}]
directions: ['To make the coleslaw: Whisk lemon juice, oil, garlic, tarragon, mustard, and 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt together in a bowl. Add coleslaw mix and toss to coat. Set aside.', 'Whisk buttermilk, hot sauce, cayenne, chipotle pepper, black pepper, and remaining salt together in another bowl. Add shrimp to buttermilk mixture, tossing to coat; let marinate for a few minutes.', "Meanwhile, preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions.", 'Add 2/3 cup panko to a shallow dish. Remove shrimp from buttermilk mixture, letting excess drip off. Working in 3 batches, dredge 1/3 of the shrimp in 2/3 cup panko, turning evenly to coat. Transfer to a baking sheet and repeat with remaining shrimp and panko.', 'Working in batches if necessary, arrange shrimp in a single layer in the fryer basket. Cook, turning once, until shrimp are golden brown and cooked through, about 8 minutes.', 'To serve, put coleslaw in rolls and top with shrimp.']

title: Harissa Baked Salmon
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'wild salmon fillet'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'thin slices', 'Name': 'lemon'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'thin slices', 'Name': 'sweet onion, separated into rings'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'harissa'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'orange juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white wine'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Coat the inside of a 9x12-inch baking dish with vegetable oil.', 'Place salmon fillet into the baking dish; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Arrange lemon slices and onion rings on the salmon.', 'Mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, harissa, and smoked paprika together in a bowl until well combined; spread on top of salmon, lemon, and onion slices. Drizzle orange juice and wine around salmon.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until salmon is hot and has begun to turn opaque, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove the baking dish from the oven, set a broiler rack about 5 inches from the broiler, and turn the broiler on. Broil the fish until nicely browned, about 3 minutes.']

title: Grilled Tuna Steaks with Wasabi-Blueberry Sauce Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallot, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(6 ounce) package', 'Name': 'fresh blueberries'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'wasabi paste'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'sushi-grade tuna steaks'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'furikake seasoning, or more as needed'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'cooked rice, for serving'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh cilantro, for garnish'}]
directions: ['For sauce, heat oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add shallot; cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, 3 to 5 minutes. Add blueberries, honey, soy sauce, and vinegar. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, until most of blueberries have burst, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a medium bowl. Set bowl in a larger bowl filled with ice water. Let cool completely, about 20 minutes. Stir in wasabi paste.', 'Preheat grill to medium-high heat (375 to 400 degrees F (190 to 200 degrees C)). Pat tuna steaks dry with paper towels. Season with salt and pepper. Spread furikake seasoning on a small plate. Roll edges of tuna steaks in furikake to coat.', 'Oil grill grates. Grill tuna, covered, turning halfway through, about 4 minutes. (Tuna should be pink in center.) Transfer tuna to a cutting board; tent with foil and let stand 5 minutes. Thinly slice tuna steaks and serve over rice with sauce. Garnish with cilantro.']

title: Pineapple Shrimp Stir-Fry Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'Name': 'pineapple chunks in juice'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'grated fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fish sauce (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried red pepper flakes'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'avocado oil (or other neutral oil)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'red onion, cut into 1-inch chunks'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'orange bell pepper, cut into 1-inch chunks'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch chunks'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'broccoli florets'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'large shrimp, peeled and deveined'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped cashews, or to taste (Optional)'}]
directions: ['Measure out 1/4 cup pineapple juice from the can and add to a small mixing bowl. Set pineapple chunks aside and reserve any extra juice for another use or discard.', 'Add soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, fish sauce, and pepper flakes to the pineapple juice; stir until well combined. Transfer 1/4 cup of the mixture to a small bowl and leave the rest in the mixing bowl.', 'Heat a 12-inch nonstick skillet or wok over medium heat. Add avocado oil to the hot wok and heat until it shimmers, about 30 seconds. Add red onion and bell peppers; cook and stir for 1 to 2 minutes. Add broccoli; cook and stir for 1 minute.', 'Add the sauce from the mixing bowl and bring to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink and begin to curl, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, stir cornstarch into the sauce in the small bowl, mixing until there are no lumps. Slowly add to the skillet, stirring constantly. Add reserved pineapple chunks.', 'Cook until sauce thickens, 1 to 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and sprinkle cashews over top. Serve immediately.']

title: Ultimate Lowcountry Shrimp and Grits Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6 to 8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'milk'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'butter'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'grits'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'ears', 'Name': 'white sweet corn'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'pepper'}]
directions: ['Combine water, milk, butter, and salt in a large saucepan and bring just to a boil. Whisk in grits until incorporated. Reduce heat to simmer, cover, and cook until thick, 25 to 30 minutes, stirring often. If mixture gets too thick, add a little more milk or water.', 'Cut kernels off corn cobs, and using the back of the knife, carefully scrape the cob to release the creamy corn milk. Stir corn kernels and corn milk into grits and continue cooking until grits are creamy and tender, 15 to 20 minutes longer, stirring often. Stir in pepper and adjust seasonings if necessary.', 'Meanwhile, heat a large deep skillet or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add olive oil and bacon slices in a single layer, and cook until bacon is crisp, stirring occasionally, about 7 minutes.\xa0 Remove bacon from the skillet, drain on paper towels, and set aside. Crumble bacon once cool enough to handle. Reserve drippings in the skillet and return skillet to medium-high heat.', 'Finely slice green onions and reserve green ends for garnish. Add white parts of green onion, onion, green and red bell peppers, and okra to the skillet and cook until softened and lightly browned, stirring often, about 5 minutes. Add in salt, pepper, garlic powder, and cayenne and cook for 1 minute. Add fresh tomatoes and garlic, and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add butter to mixture and allow it to melt. Sprinkle flour over skillet and cook, stirring constantly, about 1 minute. Add in tomatoes, with juices, and stock while stirring constantly until smooth. Stir in sugar, Worcestershire, and hot sauce, and return mixture to a simmer. Cook gravy for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Heat peanut oil to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat. Whisk eggs in a bowl; add shrimp and stir to coat. In a shallow dish, whisk flour, salt, paprika, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.', 'Working a few at a time, remove shrimp from egg, allowing excess to drip off, and lightly coat in flour mixture. Transfer shrimp to a wire rack set inside a rimmed baking sheet. Repeat with remaining shrimp.', 'Working in batches, add shrimp to hot oil and cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned and crisp, 1 to 2 minutes. Drain on a wire rack set over a paper towel-lined baking sheet.', 'To serve, place grits in the bottom of a shallow bowl. Top with about 1/2 cup of gravy and 6 to 8 shrimp. Top with crumbled bacon, and sprinkle with green onions and parsley if desired.']

title: Individual Salmon Wellingtons Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4 (serving size: one puff pastry wrapped salmon fillet)'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 puff pastry wrapped salmon fillet'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '6-ounce', 'Name': 'skinless salmon fillets'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Dijon mustard'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fresh oregano'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh basil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fresh dill'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'feta cheese'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'frozen', 'Name': 'frozen'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Lemon'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper; set aside.', 'Pat salmon fillets dry with paper towels. Sprinkle salt and pepper on both sides of the salmon.', 'Mix mayonnaise, mustard, oregano, basil, dill, lemon zest, and oregano in a small bowl. Set aside half the mixture for serving.', 'Spread remaining mixture on the top of salmon fillets.', 'Sprinkle feta cheese on top of the salmon. Top with spinach.', 'Cut the pastry sheet in quarters. Roll each portion on a lightly floured surface to a 7x7-inch square.', 'Place each salmon fillet, topping side down, in the center of a pastry portion.', 'Lift edges of pastry to enclose the salmon. Pinch edges to seal, and place each bundle, seam-side down, on prepared baking sheet.', 'Beat together egg and water in small bowl. Brush egg wash on tops and sides of pastry bundles. Cut several small slits in tops of each pastry bundle to allow steam to escape.', 'Bake in preheated oven until pastry is golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes. Serve with reserved herb Dijon mixture and lemon wedges.']

title: Tuscan Butter Shrimp Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'raw shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cherry tomatoes'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shallot'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'garlic cloves, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sun-dried tomatoes in oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'baby spinach'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'basil leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lemon zest'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'crushed red pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'fresh lemon juice'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Toss shrimp with salt and pepper in a large bowl until well combined. Heat a large high-sided skillet over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato oil; heat until shimmering, about 2 minutes. Add shrimp in an even layer, and cook until opaque and pink, 3 to 4 minutes, flipping shrimp halfway through cooking time. Transfer shrimp to a large plate.', 'Melt remaining 1 tablespoon butter with remaining 1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato oil in the same skillet; stir in cherry tomatoes, shallot, garlic, and sun-dried tomatoes. Cook, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are soft and shallot is translucent, about 4 minutes.', 'Stir spinach, basil, wine, lemon zest, and crushed red pepper into mixture in skillet; cook over medium, scraping up any browned bits from bottom of skillet, until wine mixture is reduced by half, about 2 minutes. Stir in heavy cream. Reduce heat to low, and add Parmesan cheese; cook, stirring constantly, until mixture is slightly thickened and simmering, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Stir in lemon juice; add cooked shrimp along with any juices from plate. Garnish with additional basil and Parmesan cheese.']

title: Grilled Shrimp Skewers with Citrus and Charred Thyme Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'olive oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'orange zest'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'orange juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lime zest'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon freshly ground', 'Name': 'black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'orange, cut into wedges'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'fresh thyme'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'butter, softened'}]
directions: ['Put shrimp in a zip-top bag set in a shallow dish. Add oil, 1/2 teaspoon orange zest, the orange juice, lime zest, lime juice, and garlic. Seal bag; turn to coat. Chill at least 30 minutes or up to 1 hour.', 'Preheat an outdoor grill to medium heat (350 degrees F to 375 degrees F/175 degrees C to 190 degrees C). Remove shrimp from marinade, discarding marinade. Thread 6 to 7 shrimp onto each of 4 skewers. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Oil grill grates. Arrange skewers; orange wedges, cut sides down; and thyme on grill. Grill thyme just until lightly charred, about 15 seconds. Cover grill. Grill skewers and orange wedges, turning halfway through, until shrimp are opaque and orange wedges are lightly charred, 6 to 8 minutes.', 'Strip thyme leaves from sprigs; coarsely chop. Stir 1 teaspoon chopped thyme and remaining 1/2 teaspoon orange zest into butter.', 'Spread citrus-thyme butter over shrimp and serve with orange wedges. Garnish with remaining thyme.']

title: Spicy Dill Pickle Tuna Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'riracha'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '12 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'hunk white Albacore tuna in water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'celery rib, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'carrot'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'whole', 'Name': 'dill pickle'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions'}]
directions: ['Whisk mayonnaise and Sriracha together in a bowl. Add tuna, celery, carrot, pickle, and green onions, and stir until evenly combined.']

title: Creamy Lemon Shrimp Pasta Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': '(16 ounce) package', 'Name': 'spaghetti'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'finely chopped shallots'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'crushed garlic'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'lemon, zested and juiced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'basil leaves, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes'}]
directions: ['Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 to 12 minutes.', 'While the pasta is cooking, heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Season shrimp with salt and pepper; add to the pan and cook 30 seconds per side. Remove to a plate.', 'Add shallots to the skillet and cook for 2 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in chicken broth, lemon zest, and 1/2 of the lemon juice; heat for 2 minutes. Reserve remaining lemon juice for another use.', 'Add cream and bring to a simmer. Return shrimp to the skillet and cook until heated through and pink, 2 to 3 minutes. Add basil.', 'Drain spaghetti, reserving 1/4 to 1/2 cup pasta water.', 'Add spaghetti to the skillet. Add pasta water as needed and pepper flakes; toss to coat. Season with pepper if desired.']

title: Lazy Hot Crab Dip
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(6 ounce) can)', 'Name': 'lump crabmeat'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'freshly-squeezed lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Old Bay®'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Tabasco®'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'shredded Monterey Jack cheese'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Drain crabmeat well and return crabmeat to the empty can.', 'Reserve 2 teaspoons onion for garnish. Stir remaining onion, lemon juice, seafood seasoning, hot sauce, Worcestershire, mayonnaise and 11/2 tablespoons Monterey Jack cheese until combined into can with crabmeat. Top with remaining Monterey Jack and Parmesan cheese. Place can on a rimmed baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and browned around the edges, about 15 minutes.\xa0Let stand 5 minutes before serving. Sprinkle with reserved green onion.']

title: Shrimp Cocktail Cream Cheese Dip Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '24'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'cream cheese, softened'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) jar', 'Name': 'cocktail sauce'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'cooked baby shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(2.25 ounce) can', 'Name': 'sliced black olives, drained'}]

title: Salmon Croquettes Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 croquettes'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless salmon fillets'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'baking mix (such as Bisquick)'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'diced onion'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'diced red bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'freshly chopped parsley'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'egg'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'seasoned salt'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay)'}, {'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'cornmeal'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}]
directions: ['Finely chop the salmon using a food processor.', 'Transfer salmon to a bowl. Add baking mix, onion, bell pepper, parsley, egg, garlic, Worcestershire, seasoned salt, and seafood seasoning; mix well until well combined.', 'Form the mixture into 8 small patties, and place onto a plate lined with waxed paper. Refrigerate the patties for 15 minutes.', 'Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. Place cornmeal into a shallow dish and dredge each patty in cornmeal, pressing lightly so that the cornmeal adheres to both sides of the patties.', 'Cook patties in the oil until golden and cooked through, working in batches, about 3 to 4 minutes per side.']

title: Trout Tacos Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '8 tacos'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '16', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'white corn tortillas'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'purple cabbage'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'coleslaw mix'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Mexican crema'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'lime zest'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime wedges as needed, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cilantro leaves'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'filets', 'Name': 'trout'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon', 'Name': 'tapioca starch'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'chipotle powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'Mexican oregano'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'prepared guacamole, or as needed'}]
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Wrap tortillas in foil.', 'Bake tortillas in the preheated oven until warm, 8 to 10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, place cabbage, white parts of green onion, coleslaw mix, 3 tablespoons Mexican crema, lime zest, juice of 2 lime wedges, and cilantro in a large bowl. Toss to coat; season with salt and pepper. Set aside..', 'Carefully remove skin from trout. Cut each trout filet into 2- to 3-inch pieces. Stir tapioca starch, cumin, chipotle powder, and Mexican oregano together in a shallow bowl.', 'Dip fish pieces into seasoning mixture to coat.', 'Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Add coated fish pieces; cook until golden brown and fish flakes easily with a fork, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Transfer to a drip tray, and season with salt.', 'Using 2 corn tortillas for each taco, divide fish, slaw, and guacamole between the tacos. Garnish each with green tops of scallions. Serve with remaining lime wedges and crema on the side. Enjoy!']

title: Shrimp and Chicken Stir-Fry Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'seafood stock or chicken stock'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Sriracha'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'granulated garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white pepper'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}]
directions: ['Stir stock, sugar, Sriracha, soy sauce, ginger, granulated garlic, white pepper, and salt together in a small bowl for the sauce. Whisk in cornstarch until no lumps remain; set aside.', 'Pat chicken strips dry with paper towels.', 'Heat oil over medium-high heat in a large skillet or wok until oil shimmers. Add chicken and cook, stirring continually, until chicken is no longer pink at the center and juices run clear, 2 to 3 minutes. Place chicken on a plate; set aside.', 'To the same pan, add onions, celery, mushrooms, bell peppers, snow peas, and broccoli florets, and cook, stirring frequently, until vegetables are barely tender, 2 to 4 minutes. Return chicken to pan.', 'Stir\xa0sauce well, and slowly pour over chicken and veggies. Add shrimp; fully submerge shrimp in liquid.', 'Bring to a boil and cook, stirring frequently, until shrimp turns pink, opaque, and curls into a “C” shape, 3 to 5 minutes. Add sesame oil to taste. Give the skillet mixture a final stir, and garnish with sliced scallions and sesame seeds.']

title: Marry Me Shrimp Pasta Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'uncooked calamarata or rigatoni\xa0pasta'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'raw shrimp'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'coarsely chopped sun-dried tomatoes in oil'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'sun-dried tomato\xa0spread'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'garlic cloves, grated'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white wine'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'heavy cream'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup\xa0freshly', 'Name': 'grated Parmesan cheese'}, {'Quantity': '1 1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'smoked paprika'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'chopped fresh basil'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients. Reduce heat to medium and continue cooking, whisking occasionally, until slightly thickened and just coats the back of a spoon, 5 to 7 minutes.', 'Reduce heat to low; add cooked pasta and shrimp to skillet. Cook, stirring often, until evenly coated and heated through, about 3 minutes.', 'Remove from heat; garnish with basil and serve immediately.']

title: Thai Peanut Butter Ramen Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '3'}]

If you prefer thinner sauce, add reserved pasta water, 1 tablespoon at a time, to thin.', 'Divide into bowls, garnish with green onions, peanuts, and lime wedges for squeezing over each serving, and serve immediately.']

title: Turkey Tom Kha Gai
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '55 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'turkey broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'lemongrass, bruised and sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(3 inch) piece', 'Name': 'fresh ginger, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro stems'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'makrut lime leaves, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'cooked turkey, cut into small cubes'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'clamshell mushrooms, separated'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'palm sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(13 ounce) can', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro leaves'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'chili oil, or more to taste'}]
directions: ['Combine turkey broth, lemongrass, ginger, cilantro stems, lime leaves, and red pepper flakes in a pot over medium-high heat. Bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until flavors blend, 20 to 30 minutes.', 'Stain broth mixture through a fine-mesh sieve, discard vegetables, and return broth to the pot.', 'Stir turkey, mushrooms, fish sauce, and palm sugar into broth; simmer until mushrooms are tender and turkey absorbs broth flavor, about 15 minutes.', 'Pour coconut milk, lime juice, green onions, and cilantro leaves into broth.
