title: Coconut Curry Salmon with Broccoli Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '(6 ounce)', 'Name': 'salmon filets'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'curry powder,'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'honey'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shallots'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced garlic'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ginger'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pinch', 'Name': 'red pepper flakes,'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'Thai red curry paste, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'can', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'broccoli florets'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'green onions'}]
directions: ['Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and brush with 1 tablespoon cooking oil. Preheat the oven’s broiler.', 'Pat salmon filets dry with paper towels and place on the prepared pan, skin side down. Brush filets with remaining 1 tablespoon oil.', 'Season filets with curry powder, and season lightly with salt and pepper. Drizzle honey over the filets, and place under the broiler. Broil until just crisp on top, 3 to 5 minutes. Watch carefully; honey may burn easily. Remove from oven and keep warm.', 'For coconut curry sauce, melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add shallots and cook about 1 minute, then add garlic and ginger, and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds more,', 'Stir in red pepper flakes and Thai red curry paste and cook about 3 minutes. Stir in coconut milk, soy sauce, and fish sauce; bring to a simmer. Add broccoli florets and cook until crisp-tender, about 3 minutes.', 'Add salmon filets to the skillet and simmer until fish flakes easily with a fork, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Squeeze 1/2 lime over the skillet. Garnish with chopped chives or green onions, and serve.']

title: Thai Spice Sweet Tea Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Chill Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Stand Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4 to 6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4 1/4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'pods', 'Name': 'cardamom'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'whole', 'Name': 'star anise'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'whole', 'Name': 'cloves'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cinnamon'}, {'Quantity': '1/2', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'tamarind paste'}, {'Quantity': '1/3', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar,'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'bags', 'Name': 'rooibos tea'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'bags', 'Name': 'black tea'}, {'Quantity': '3/4', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}]
directions: ['Add water to a saucepan, and place over medium-high heat.', 'Crush cardamom pods with mortar and pestle or flat of a knife. Add cardamom, star anise, cloves, cinnamon, and tamarind to the saucepan, and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Add tea bags; stir to combine. As soon as water returns to a simmer, turn off heat, and steep for 5 minutes.', 'Stir in sugar, and let stand 5 minutes more. Strain into a container, squeezing tea bags thoroughly. Wrap container and refrigerate until very cold, about 1 hour.', 'To serve, fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in tea; top with a generous splash of coconut milk.']

title: Thai Pasta Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'low-sodium soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'balsamic vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chili-garlic sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'seasoned rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}]
directions: ['To make the dressing: Whisk sesame oil, vegetable oil, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, fish sauce, chili-garlic sauce, lime juice, rice vinegar, and sugar together in a small bowl until well combined. Set aside.', 'Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook pasta at a boil, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 to 12 minutes. Drain pasta, rinse with cold water, and return to the pot.', 'Drizzle dressing over pasta and stir gently to combine. Add peas, carrots, bell pepper, green onions, cilantro, peanuts, and red pepper flakes; stir until well combined.', 'Serve at room temperature with lime wedges, or chill in the refrigerator and serve cold.']

title: Thai-Inspired Potato Salad Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cool Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2 1/2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'Yukon gold potatoes'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1/4', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '1/8', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'baking soda'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, divided'}]
directions: ['Combine potatoes, 2 teaspoons salt, coriander, turmeric, and baking soda in a saucepan, with enough water to cover by 1 inch. Bring to a simmer, and cook just until barely tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Drain well.', 'Line a sheet pan with foil, and grease generously with 1 tablespoon oil; transfer potatoes onto pan, skin side down. Let cool, cover, and refrigerate until chilled.', 'Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). Brush tops of potatoes with remaining tablespoon oil, and season generously with remaining 1 teaspoon salt.', 'Bake potatoes in the preheated oven until browned and crusty, about 35 minutes. Let cool to just warm or room temperature.', 'Meanwhile, add garlic, ginger, rice vinegar, lime juice, tamarind paste, fish sauce, salt, pepper, brown sugar, vegetable oil, and Sriracha to a small bowl; whisk to combine, and set aside.', 'Add potatoes to a bowl with red onions, bell peppers, jalapeno peppers, herbs, and peanuts. Pour in dressing and mix thoroughly. Transfer to a serving platter or bowl and serve immediately.']

title: Instant Pot Thai Chicken Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'carrots, peeled and cut into matchstick-size pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'red bell pepper, cut into short thin strips'}, {'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'sliced shiitake mushrooms'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts, halved horizontally'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Thai red curry paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(32 ounce) carton', 'Name': 'Swanson® Chicken Broth (4 cups)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'Name': 'unsweetened coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'grated lime zest'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}]
directions: ['Place the carrots, red pepper, mushrooms, chicken, curry paste, sugar, and Swanson® Chicken Broth into a 6-quart Instant Pot®.', 'Lock the lid and close the pressure release valve. Pressure cook on High pressure, setting the timer to 4 minutes (timer will begin counting down once pressure is reached- it takes about 15 minutes). title: Sweet Chili Thai Sauce Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '24'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '3 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'rice vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'hot chile pepper, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'ketchup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'cornstarch'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'water, or as needed'}]

title: Authentic Pad Thai Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried rice noodles'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'distilled white vinegar'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tamarind paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, sliced into thin strips'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'large', 'Name': 'eggs, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'coarsely ground peanuts'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'bean sprouts'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh chives'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'paprika, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'medium', 'Name': 'lime, cut into wedges'}]
directions: ['Place rice noodles into a large bowl and cover with several inches of room temperature water; let soak for 30 to 60 minutes. Drain.', 'Whisk 1/2 cup sugar, vinegar, fish sauce, and tamarind paste together in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer, then remove from the heat.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from the heat.', 'Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in eggs; scramble until eggs are nearly cooked through, about 2 minutes. Add chicken and rice noodles and stir until well combined.', 'Stir in tamarind mixture, 1 1/2 tablespoons sugar, and salt; cook until noodles are tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in peanuts and cook until heated through, 1 to 2 minutes. Garnish with bean sprouts, chives, and paprika; serve with lime wedges.']

title: Asian Coconut Rice Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'uncooked jasmine rice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'Name': 'light or full-fat coconut milk, well shaken and stirred'}, {'Quantity': '1 ¼', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'kosher salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'coconut oil'}]
directions: ['Gather the ingredients.', 'Place rice in a fine mesh strainer, and rinse with cold water, stirring rice using your fingers to remove excess starch, until water from rice runs clear, about 1 minute.', 'Place rinsed rice, coconut milk, water, sugar, and salt in a medium saucepan; stir until sugar dissolves, about 1 minute.', 'Bring mixture in saucepan to a boil over medium heat. Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer, undisturbed, for 11 minutes. Turn off heat; steam, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Uncover and gently stir in coconut oil.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken (Pad Krapow Gai) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '2'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '⅓', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'oyster sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'soy sauce, or as needed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs, coarsely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced shallots'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'minced Thai chilies, Serrano, or other hot pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'very thinly sliced fresh basil leaves'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'hot cooked rice'}]
directions: ['Gather ingredients.', 'Whisk chicken broth, oyster sauce, soy sauce, fish sauce, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a bowl until well blended.', 'Heat large skillet over high heat. Drizzle in oil. Add chicken and stir fry until it loses its raw color, 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Stir in shallots, garlic, and sliced chilies. Continue cooking on high heat until some of the juices start to caramelize in the bottom of the pan, about 2 or 3 more minutes.', 'Add about a tablespoon of the sauce mixture to the skillet; cook and stir until sauce begins to caramelize, about 1 minute.', 'Pour in the rest of the sauce. Cook and stir until sauce has deglazed the bottom of the pan. Continue to cook until sauce glazes onto the meat, 1 or 2 more minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Stir in basil. Cook and stir until basil is wilted, about 20 seconds. Serve with rice.', 'Serve hot and enjoy!']

title: The Best Thai Coconut Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]

title: Thai Sweet Sticky Rice With Mango (Khao Neeo Mamuang) Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '3 cups'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'uncooked glutinous sticky white rice, rinsed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'coconut milk, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'tapioca starch'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'mangos, peeled and sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'toasted sesame seeds'}]

title: Pad Thai Recipe

title: How to Make Beef Satay Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 skewers'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'packed brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'minced onion'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'ground coriander'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'grated fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'ground cumin'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'Quantity': '⅛', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': '2-inch piece of fresh lemon grass (white part only)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'beef top sirloin, trimmed'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': '4 12-inch long metal skewers'}]
directions: ['Whisk together brown sugar, fish sauce, garlic, onion, oil, soy sauce, coriander, ginger, cumin, turmeric, and cayenne pepper in a mixing bowl until smooth.', "Bruise lemongrass by hitting it lightly several times with the back of a large chef's knife; mince lemongrass and add to marinade.", 'Cut beef sirloin into strips about 2 1/2-inches long and 1/8 inch-thick. Stir beef into marinade until beef is completely coated, about 1 minute. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 to 4 hours.', 'Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. Lightly oil the grate.', 'Remove beef from marinade and shake off excess marinade. Thread 1/4 of the meat onto each metal skewer. Discard remaining marinade.', 'Arrange skewers on the preheated grill; cook until meat stops sticking to the grill, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip skewers and continue cooking until meat is well browned and shows grill marks, 2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Flip skewers once more; cook until meat is still slightly pink, about 2 minutes. Transfer skewers to a platter; let rest for 2 minutes before serving.']

title: Thai Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs 5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'hot pepper sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'minced fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless chicken thighs'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onion, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'crunchy peanut butter'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'green onions, chopped'}]

title: Slow Cooker Chicken Massaman Curry Recipe

ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red potatoes, peeled and cubed'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'carrots, cut into bite-size chunks'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'mixed red, yellow, and orange bell peppers, cut into bite-sized chunks (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'onions, cut into chunks'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'Thai red curry paste (such as Maesri Masaman Curry)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fresh ginger paste (such as Gourmet Garden)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'lemongrass paste (such as Gourmet Garden)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) cans', 'Name': 'coconut milk, divided'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chicken stock, such as (Kitchen Basics)'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'peanut butter'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'lemon juice'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'brown sugar, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry roasted peanuts, chopped, divided'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cooked jasmine rice'}]
directions: ['Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat in a large, heavy-bottomed skillet. Add chicken pieces in batches, cooking until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes per side. Place browned chicken in the bottom of a slow cooker. Place potatoes, carrots, and bell peppers on top of the meat in the slow cooker.', 'Heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in the skillet and add onion. Cook until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Add to slow cooker. Add red curry paste, ginger paste, and lemongrass paste to the skillet and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Pour in 1 can coconut milk; reduce heat to medium-low and let simmer until reduced by half, about 10 minutes.', 'Whisk in remaining 1 can coconut milk, chicken broth, and peanut butter. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer until liquid begins to thicken, about 5 minutes. Pour sauce over ingredients in the slow cooker; stir gently to combine.', 'Set slow cooker to Low and cook until vegetables are tender and chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 4 to 6 hours.', '20 minutes before serving season with lemon juice, fish sauce, and brown sugar. Stir in 1/2 cup of chopped peanuts. Serve with hot cooked rice and sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup of peanuts.']

title: Authentic Thai Green Curry Recipe

title: Homemade Tom Yum Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '50 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'raw shrimp, unpeeled and deveined'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'limes, juiced with pulp'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'Thai chile peppers, quartered (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'stalks', 'Name': 'lemongrass, quartered'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '(¼-inch-thick) slices', 'Name': 'fresh ginger root'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tom yum paste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'chile sauce'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'baby bella mushrooms, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, thinly sliced'}]
directions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Combine vegetable broth and shrimp in a large pot over medium-high heat. Bring to a low boil for 10 minutes, then lower heat and simmer for 10 minutes.', 'Remove shrimp from broth; remove and discard shells. Set cooked shrimp aside.', 'Add lime juice and pulp, chile peppers, lemongrass, ginger, tom yum paste, fish sauce, sugar, and chile sauce to broth; cook for 10 minutes.', 'Remove chile peppers, lemongrass, and ginger slices with a slotted spoon and discard. Return cooked shrimp to broth and remove the pot from heat.', 'Ladle soup into bowls. Top with mushrooms and green onions.']

title: Authentic Pad Thai Noodles Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '2 hrs'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '4 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '⅔', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dried rice vermicelli'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'peanut oil'}, {'Quantity': '⅔', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'thinly sliced firm tofu'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'large egg, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'vegetable broth'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'salt'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried red chili flakes'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped peanuts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'bean sprouts, divided'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, whites cut thinly across and greens sliced into thin lengths - divided'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped peanuts'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'limes, cut into wedges for garnish'}]
directions: ['Soak rice vermicelli noodles in a bowl filled with hot water until softened, 30 minutes to 1 hour. Drain and set aside.', 'Heat peanut oil over medium heat in a large wok.', 'Cook and stir tofu in the wok, turning the pieces until they are golden on all sides.', 'Remove tofu with a slotted spoon and drain on plate lined with paper towels.', 'Pour all but 1 tablespoon of used oil from the wok into a small bowl; it will be used again in a later step.', 'Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil in the wok over medium heat until it starts to sizzle.', 'Pour in beaten egg and lightly toss in the hot oil to scramble the egg.', 'Remove egg from the wok and set aside.', 'Pour reserved peanut oil in the small bowl back into the wok.', 'Toss garlic and drained noodles in wok until they are coated with oil.', 'Stir in vegetable broth, lime juice, soy sauce, and sugar. Toss and gently push noodles around the pan to coat with sauce.', 'Gently mix in tofu, scrambled egg, salt, chili flakes, and 3 tablespoons peanuts; toss to mix all ingredients.', 'Mix in bean sprouts and green onions, reserving about 1 tablespoon of each for garnish. Cook and stir until bean sprouts have softened slightly, 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Arrange noodles on a warm serving platter and garnish with 3 tablespoons peanuts and reserved bean sprouts and green onions. Place lime wedges around the edges of the platter.']

title: Instant Pot Red Thai Curry Chicken Recipe

ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'cooking oil'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'red curry paste, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'thin chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch strips'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'Name': 'unsweetened light coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fish sauce, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'palm sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced yellow onion'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced red bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced yellow bell pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'sliced orange bell pepper'}]
directions: ["Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot) and select Sauté function. Add oil and red curry paste to the hot pot; sauté for 30 seconds. title: Thai Monkfish Curry Recipe

title: Thai Hot and Sour Soup Recipe

title: The Best Thai Curry-Peanut Sauce Recipe

title: Chef John's Drunken Noodles Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '8', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried rice noodles'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'oyster sauce'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'Asian fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'maple syrup'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'cold water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'sesame oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'shallots, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': "chile padi (bird's eye chiles), thinly sliced"}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '2 ½', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into strips (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'Chinese broccoli, sliced (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'scallions, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'fresh Thai basil leaves'}]
directions: ['Gather the ingredients.', 'Soak rice noodles in hot water until flexible, 10 to 15 minutes. Occasionally move the noodles around to separate them. title: Instant Pot Thai-Style Green Curry Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '25 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '5 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '40 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(13.5 ounce) can', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chicken broth'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'green curry paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'dried basil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'pound', 'Name': 'skinless, boneless chicken thighs, chopped into bite-sized pieces'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'jalapeño chile pepper, seeded and minced'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, zested'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'grated fresh ginger'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'snow peas'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red bell pepper, cut into thin strips'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped cilantro'}]
directions: ['Whisk coconut milk, chicken broth, curry paste, soy sauce, fish sauce, brown sugar, and basil together in a bowl until smooth; set aside.', 'Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot) and select Sauté function. Heat oil in the pot; add chicken and sauté, stirring occasionally, until browned, 3 to 4 minutes. Stir in jalapeño, garlic, lime zest, and ginger; cook and stir 1 minute. Press Cancel.', "Stir coconut curry mixture into the pot with a wooden spoon until well combined, scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pot. Close and lock the lid. Select High pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 6 minutes. Allow 10 minutes for pressure to build.", "Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Select Sauté function. Add snow peas and bell pepper; cook until vegetables are crisp-tender, 3 to 4 minutes. Press Cancel. Garnish curry with chopped cilantro."]

title: Khao Soi Soup Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}, {'Label': 'Yield:', 'Value': '6 servings'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallots, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'red curry paste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'curry powder'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'coconut milk'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'chopped cooked chicken, or more to taste'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'sea salt'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'lime juice'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'whole dried Thai chile peppers'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'small', 'Name': 'shallots, cut into quarters'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'head', 'Name': 'bok choy, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'Name': 'rice noodles'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'pickled mustard cabbage, thinly sliced (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'coarsely chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, cut into wedges'}]
directions: ['Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a wok or large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir chopped shallots and garlic until garlic starts to turn golden, 2 to 4 minutes. Add red curry paste and curry powder; cook and stir until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Add coconut milk, water, chicken, and sea salt; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium low and simmer soup.', 'Mix fish sauce, sugar, and lime juice into soup and simmer until heated through, about 10 minutes more.', 'Heat 1/2 cup oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; fry Thai chile peppers until browned, 2 to 4 minutes. Transfer chile peppers to soup, reserving oil in skillet. Fry quartered shallots and bok choy in hot oil until browned, 2 to 4 minutes; transfer to soup and reserve oil in skillet.', 'Place noodles in a large bowl and cover with hot water. Set aside until noodles are softened, about 15 minutes. Drain and rinse thoroughly. Add 3/4 of the noodles to the soup. Fry the remaining rice noodles in the hot oil until crisp, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Divide soup among 6 bowls and top with fried noodles, pickled cabbage, cilantro, and lime wedges.']

title: Classic Chicken Pad Thai Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '45 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '4'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '10', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'dried rice noodles'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'brown sugar'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'soy sauce, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce, or to taste'}, {'Quantity': '5', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'tamarind paste'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'Quantity': '12', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'chicken breast, thinly sliced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '(7 ounce) package', 'Name': 'firm tofu, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, chopped'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'shrimp paste'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'eggs'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'chopped spring onions'}, {'Quantity': '¾', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'dry roasted peanuts'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'bean sprouts'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'lime, cut into wedges'}]
directions: ['Soak rice noodles in a bowl of water for 15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, combine brown sugar, soy sauce, fish sauce, and tamarind paste in a bowl. Whisk well and set aside.', 'Heat oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add chicken. Stir-fry for 1 minute. Add tofu. Cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 4 minutes.', 'Add garlic and shrimp paste to the wok and stir well. Cook for 2 minutes, then add fish sauce mixture and drained noodles. Cook until the noodles are tender, 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Push noodles to one side of the wok. Crack the eggs into the other side. Scramble until firm, about 3 minutes. Stir into the noodles. Serve with peanuts, bean sprouts, and lime wedges.']

title: Thai Fried Rice with Pineapple and Chicken Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '10 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '30 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '6'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'slices', 'Name': 'bacon, diced'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'shallots, sliced'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'chicken breast, cut into small cubes'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'curry powder, divided'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'vegetable oil, or as needed (Optional)'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'egg yolks, beaten'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': 'cups', 'Name': 'cooked jasmine rice'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'red Thai bird chile pepper, finely chopped'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'whole cilantro leaves'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'soy sauce'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '½', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '4', 'Unit': 'ounces', 'Name': 'tiger prawns, peeled and deveined'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'chopped fresh pineapple'}, {'Quantity': '3', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'green onions, finely chopped'}]
directions: ['Place bacon in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir until crisp, about 10 minutes. Remove bacon with a slotted spoon onto a paper towel-lined plate; set aside. Reserve bacon drippings in the wok.', 'Cook and stir shallots in bacon drippings over medium-high heat until fragrant and light brown, 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Stir chicken into shallots and cook, without stirring, until browned on one side, 45 seconds to 1 minute; stir. Continue cooking until chicken is browned, about 1 minute. Add 2 teaspoons curry powder; stir until chicken is coated.', 'Make a well in the center of chicken and pour oil into the center of the well; add egg yolks. Cook and stir egg yolks until set, 1 to 2 minutes. Add rice and stir, breaking up rice.', 'Mix chile pepper, cilantro, soy sauce, remaining 2 teaspoons curry powder, fish sauce, and sugar into rice mixture; add shrimp and cook until shrimp is cooked through and pink, about 2 minutes. Fold pineapple, green onions, and bacon into rice mixture.']

title: Thai-Style Ground Pork Skewers Recipe
time: [{'Label': 'Prep Time:', 'Value': '20 mins'}, {'Label': 'Cook Time:', 'Value': '15 mins'}, {'Label': 'Additional Time:', 'Value': '1 hr'}, {'Label': 'Total Time:', 'Value': '1 hr 35 mins'}, {'Label': 'Servings:', 'Value': '8'}]
ingredients: [{'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'pounds', 'Name': 'ground pork'}, {'Quantity': '¼', 'Unit': 'cup', 'Name': 'white sugar'}, {'Quantity': '2', 'Unit': 'tablespoons', 'Name': 'fish sauce'}, {'Quantity': '6', 'Unit': 'cloves', 'Name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'sea salt'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'teaspoon', 'Name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'Quantity': '1 ½', 'Unit': 'teaspoons', 'Name': 'baking powder'}, {'Quantity': '1', 'Unit': 'tablespoon', 'Name': 'water'}, {'Quantity': '', 'Unit': '', 'Name': 'wooden skewers, soaked in water'}]
directions: ['Combine pork, sugar, fish sauce, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Mix together thoroughly. Dissolve baking powder in 1 tablespoon water and blend completely into pork mixture. Repeat with remaining pork and skewers.', 'Grill skewers, turning as needed, until browned on all sides and no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes. title: Thai Carrot Salad Recipe

title: Thai Red Curry Chicken Soup Recipe

title: Authentic Thai Coconut Soup Recipe

title: Slow Cooker Thai Peanut Pork Recipe
